h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0001^ea^ ^a^V1.0001^ea^ ^a^P1.0001^ea^ ^a^M1.0001^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho a~n~nataraa devataa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m jetavana.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho saa devataa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```katha.m nu tva.m, maarisa, oghamatarii'ti? `appati.t.tha.m khvaaha.m, aavuso, anaayuuha.m ^a^V1.0002^ea^ oghamatari'nti. `yathaa katha.m pana tva.m, maarisa, appati.t.tha.m anaayuuha.m oghamatarii'ti? `yadaakhvaaha.m, aavuso, santi.t.thaami tadaassu sa.msiidaami ^a^T1.0002^ea^; yadaakhvaaha.m, aavuso, aayuuhaami tadaassu nibbuyhaami {nivuyhaami (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}. eva.m khvaaha.m, aavuso, appati.t.tha.m anaayuuha.m oghamatari'''nti.
[25] idamavoca ^a^M1.0002^ea^ saa devataa. samanu~n~no satthaa ahosi. atha kho saa devataa -- ``samanu~n~no me satthaa''ti bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayiiti.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^P1.0002^ea^. atha kho a~n~nataraa devataa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m jetavana.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho saa devataa bhagavanta.m etadavoca --
[03] ``jaanaasi no tva.m, maarisa, sattaana.m nimokkha.m pamokkha.m viveka''nti?
[03] ``jaanaami khvaaha.m, aavuso, sattaana.m nimokkha.m pamokkha.m viveka''nti.
[03] ``yathaa katha.m pana tva.m, maarisa, jaanaasi sattaana.m nimokkha.m pamokkha.m viveka''nti?

[03] ``nandiibhavaparikkhayaa ^a^T1.0003^ea^ {nandibhavaparikkhayaa (syaa0 ka.m0)}, sa~n~naavi~n~naa.nasa"nkhayaa, vedanaana.m nirodhaa upasamaa -- eva.m khvaaha.m, aavuso, jaanaami sattaana.m nimokkha.m pamokkha.m viveka''nti.
[03] 3^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V1.0003^ea^. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho saa devataa bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[03] 4^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M1.0003^ea^. ekamanta.m ^a^T1.0004^ea^ ^a^P1.0003^ea^ .thitaa kho saa devataa bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[03] 5^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V1.0004^ea^. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho saa devataa bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``kati chinde kati jahe, kati cuttari bhaavaye.
[21] ``pa~nca chinde pa~nca jahe, pa~nca cuttari bhaavaye.
[03] 6^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ekamanta.m ^a^T1.0005^ea^ .thitaa kho saa devataa bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[03] 7^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M1.0004^ea^. ekamanta.m ^a^P1.0004^ea^ .thitaa kho saa devataa bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[22] suttaa te nappabujjhanti, kaalo tesa.m pabujjhitu''nti..
[22] te sambuddhaa sammada~n~naa, caranti visame sama''nti..
[03] 8^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho saa devataa bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[22] suttaa te nappabujjhanti, kaalo tesa.m pabujjhitu''nti..
[22] te sambuddhaa sammada~n~naa, caranti visame sama''nti..
[03] 9^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho saa devataa bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[03] 10^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V1.0006^ea^ ^a^M1.0005^ea^. ekamanta.m ^a^P1.0005^ea^ .thitaa kho saa devataa bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[22] etena baalaa sussanti, na.lova harito luto''ti..
[21] ogha.m nimokkha.m upaneyya.m, accenti katichindi ca.
[22] ara~n~ne dasamo vutto, vaggo tena pavuccati..

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0008^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa ^a^V1.0007^ea^ aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, a~n~nataraa taavati.msakaayikaa devataa nandane vane accharaasa"nghaparivutaa dibbehi pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappitaa sama"ngiibhuutaa paricaariyamaanaa {paricaariyamaanaa (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``na ^a^M1.0006^ea^ te sukha.m pajaananti, ye na passanti nandana.m.
[03] ``eva.m ^a^P1.0006^ea^ vutte, bhikkhave, a~n~nataraa devataa ta.m devata.m gaathaaya paccabhaasi --
[21] ``na tva.m baale pajaanaasi, yathaa arahata.m vaco.
[27] aniccaa sabbasa"nkhaaraa {sabbe sa"nkhaaraa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}, uppaadavayadhammino.
[03] 12^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ekamanta.m ^a^T1.0009^ea^ .thitaa kho saa devataa bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[27] gomaa {gomiko (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} gohi tatheva nandati.
[22] na hi so nandati yo niruupadhii''ti..
[22] na hi so socati yo niruupadhii''ti..
[03] 13^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho saa devataa bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[22] natthi suuriyasamaa {suriyasamaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} aabhaa, samuddaparamaa saraa''ti..
[22] natthi pa~n~naasamaa aabhaa, vu.t.thi ve paramaa saraa''ti..
[03] 14^b^.^eb^ ``khattiyo ^a^T1.0010^ea^ ^a^M1.0007^ea^ dvipada.m se.t.tho, baliibaddo {balivaddo (sii0 pii0), balibaddo (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} catuppada.m.
[22] komaarii se.t.thaa bhariyaana.m, yo ca puttaana pubbajo''ti..
[22] sussuusaa se.t.thaa bhariyaana.m, yo ca puttaanamassavo''ti..
[22] sa.nateva brahaara~n~na.m {mahaara~n~na.m (ka0 sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, ta.m bhaya.m pa.tibhaati ma''nti..
[22] sa.nateva brahaara~n~na.m, saa rati pa.tibhaati ma''nti..
[03] 16^b^.^eb^ ``niddaa ^a^V1.0009^ea^ tandii vijambhitaa {tandi vijambhikaa (sii0 pii0)}, aratii bhattasammado.
[22] viiriyena {viriyena (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} na.m pa.naametvaa, ariyamaggo visujjhatii''ti..
[22] bahuuhi tattha sambaadhaa, yattha baalo visiidatii''ti..
[21] ``katiha.m careyya saama~n~na.m, citta.m ce na nivaaraye.
[22] yo ninda.m apabodhati {apabodheti (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, asso bhadro kasaamivaa''ti..
[22] anta.m dukkhassa pappuyya, caranti visame sama''nti..
[21] ``kacci ^a^V1.0010^ea^ ^a^P1.0008^ea^ te ku.tikaa natthi, kacci natthi kulaavakaa.
[22] kacci santaanakaa natthi, kacci muttosi bandhanaa''ti..
[27] ``taggha me ku.tikaa natthi, taggha natthi kulaavakaa.
[22] taggha santaanakaa natthi, taggha muttomhi bandhanaa''ti..
[21] ``kintaaha.m ^a^T1.0012^ea^ ku.tika.m bruumi, ki.m te bruumi kulaavaka.m.
[22] ki.m te santaanaka.m bruumi, kintaaha.m bruumi bandhana''nti..
[22] putte santaanake bruusi, ta.nha.m me bruusi bandhana''nti..
[21] ``saahu te ku.tikaa natthi, saahu natthi kulaavakaa.
[22] saahu santaanakaa natthi, saahu muttosi bandhanaa''ti..

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati tapodaaraame. atha kho aayasmaa samiddhi rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya yena tapodaa tenupasa"nkami gattaani parisi~ncitu.m. tapode gattaani parisi~ncitvaa paccuttaritvaa ekaciivaro a.t.thaasi gattaani pubbaapayamaano. atha kho a~n~nataraa devataa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m tapoda.m obhaasetvaa yena aayasmaa samiddhi tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa vehaasa.m .thitaa aayasmanta.m samiddhi.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``abhutvaa ^a^M1.0009^ea^ bhikkhasi bhikkhu, na hi bhutvaana bhikkhasi.
[22] bhutvaana bhikkhu bhikkhassu, maa ta.m kaalo upaccagaa''ti..
[21] ``kaala.m ^a^T1.0013^ea^ ^a^V1.0011^ea^ ^a^P1.0009^ea^ voha.m na jaanaami, channo kaalo na dissati.
[22] tasmaa abhutvaa bhikkhaami, maa ma.m kaalo upaccagaa''ti..

[03] atha kho saa devataa pathaviya.m {pa.thaviya.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pati.t.thahitvaa aayasmanta.m samiddhi.m etadavoca -- ``daharo tva.m bhikkhu, pabbajito susu kaa.lakeso, bhadrena yobbanena samannaagato, pa.thamena vayasaa, anikkii.litaavii kaamesu. bhu~nja, bhikkhu, maanusake kaame; maa sandi.t.thika.m hitvaa kaalika.m anudhaavii''ti.

[03] ``na khvaaha.m, aavuso, sandi.t.thika.m hitvaa kaalika.m anudhaavaami. kaalika~nca khvaaha.m, aavuso, hitvaa sandi.t.thika.m anudhaavaami. kaalikaa hi, aavuso, kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa; aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. sandi.t.thiko aya.m dhammo akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii''ti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhu, kaalikaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo? katha.m sandi.t.thiko aya.m dhammo akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii''ti?

[03] ``aha.m kho, aavuso, navo acirapabbajito adhunaagato ima.m dhammavinaya.m. na taaha.m {na khvaaha.m (sii0 pii0)} sakkomi vitthaarena aacikkhitu.m. aya.m so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho raajagahe viharati tapodaaraame. ta.m bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m puccha. yathaa te bhagavaa byaakaroti tathaa na.m dhaareyyaasii''ti.

[03] ``na kho, bhikkhu, sukaro so bhagavaa amhehi upasa"nkamitu.m ^a^T1.0014^ea^, a~n~naahi mahesakkhaahi devataahi parivuto. sace kho tva.m, bhikkhu, ta.m bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m puccheyyaasi, mayampi aagaccheyyaama dhammassavanaayaa''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa samiddhi tassaa devataaya pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m ^a^P1.0010^ea^ nisinno kho aayasmaa samiddhi bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``idhaaha.m ^a^V1.0012^ea^ ^a^M1.0010^ea^, bhante, rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya yena tapodaa tenupasa"nkami.m gattaani parisi~ncitu.m. tapode gattaani parisi~ncitvaa paccuttaritvaa ekaciivaro a.t.thaasi.m gattaani pubbaapayamaano. atha kho, bhante, a~n~nataraa devataa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m tapoda.m obhaasetvaa yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa vehaasa.m .thitaa imaaya gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``abhutvaa bhikkhasi bhikkhu, na hi bhutvaana bhikkhasi.
[22] bhutvaana bhikkhu bhikkhassu, maa ta.m kaalo upaccagaa''ti..
[03] ``eva.m vutte aha.m, bhante, ta.m devata.m gaathaaya paccabhaasi.m --
[21] ``kaala.m voha.m na jaanaami, channo kaalo na dissati.
[22] tasmaa abhutvaa bhikkhaami, maa ma.m kaalo upaccagaa''ti..

[03] ``atha kho, bhante, saa devataa pathaviya.m pati.t.thahitvaa ma.m etadavoca -- `daharo ^a^T1.0015^ea^ tva.m, bhikkhu, pabbajito susu kaa.lakeso, bhadrena yobbanena samannaagato, pa.thamena vayasaa, anikkii.litaavii kaamesu. bhu~nja, bhikkhu, maanusake kaame; maa sandi.t.thika.m hitvaa kaalika.m anudhaavii'''ti.

[03] ``eva.m vuttaaha.m, bhante, ta.m devata.m etadavoca.m -- `na khvaaha.m, aavuso, sandi.t.thika.m hitvaa kaalika.m anudhaavaami; kaalika~nca khvaaha.m, aavuso, hitvaa sandi.t.thika.m anudhaavaami. kaalikaa hi, aavuso, kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa; aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. sandi.t.thiko aya.m dhammo akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii'''ti.

[03] ``eva.m vutte, bhante, saa devataa ma.m etadavoca -- `katha~nca, bhikkhu, kaalikaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa; aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo? katha.m sandi.t.thiko ^a^P1.0011^ea^ aya.m dhammo akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii'ti? eva.m vuttaaha.m, bhante ^a^V1.0013^ea^, ta.m devata.m etadavoca.m -- `aha.m kho, aavuso, navo acirapabbajito adhunaagato ima.m dhammavinaya.m, na taaha.m sakkomi vitthaarena aacikkhitu.m. aya.m so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho raajagahe viharati tapodaaraame. ta.m bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m puccha. yathaa te bhagavaa byaakaroti tathaa na.m dhaareyyaasii'''ti.

[03] ``eva.m ^a^M1.0011^ea^ vutte, bhante, saa devataa ma.m etadavoca -- `na kho, bhikkhu, sukaro so bhagavaa amhehi upasa"nkamitu.m, a~n~naahi mahesakkhaahi devataahi parivuto. sace kho, tva.m bhikkhu, ta.m bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m puccheyyaasi, mayampi aagaccheyyaama ^a^T1.0016^ea^ dhammassavanaayaa'ti. sace, bhante, tassaa devataaya sacca.m vacana.m, idheva saa devataa aviduure''ti.
[03] eva.m vutte, saa devataa aayasmanta.m samiddhi.m etadavoca -- ``puccha, bhikkhu, puccha, bhikkhu, yamaha.m anuppattaa''ti.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa ta.m devata.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[27] ta~nhi tassa na hotiiti, yena na.m vajjaa na tassa atthi.

[03] ``na khvaaha.m, bhante, imassa bhagavataa sa"nkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaami. saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa tathaa bhaasatu yathaaha.m imassa bhagavataa sa"nkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m jaaneyya''nti.
[27] yo ma~n~natii so vivadetha {sopi vadetha (ka0)} tena.

[03] ``imassaapi ^a^T1.0017^ea^ khvaaha.m, bhante, bhagavataa sa"nkhittena bhaasitassa na vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaami. saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa tathaa bhaasatu yathaaha.m imassa bhagavataa sa"nkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m jaaneyya''nti.
[21] ``pahaasi sa"nkha.m na vimaanamajjhagaa, acchecchi {acchejji (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} ta.nha.m idha naamaruupe.
[27] ta.m chinnagantha.m anigha.m niraasa.m, pariyesamaanaa naajjhagamu.m.
[26] devaa manussaa idha vaa hura.m vaa, saggesu vaa sabbanivesanesu.
[03] ``imassa ^a^M1.0012^ea^ khvaaha.m, bhante, bhagavataa sa"nkhittena bhaasitassa eva.m vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaami --
[27] khattiyo sa.namaano ca, niddaatandii ca dukkara.m.
[22] hirii ku.tikaa navamo, dasamo vutto samiddhinaati..
[03] 21^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V1.0015^ea^ ^a^P1.0013^ea^. ekamanta.m ^a^T1.0019^ea^ .thitaa kho saa devataa bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``anto ^a^T1.0020^ea^ ja.taa bahi ja.taa, ja.taaya ja.titaa pajaa.
[22] ta.m ta.m gotama pucchaami, ko ima.m vija.taye ja.ta''nti..
[21] ``siile ^a^V1.0016^ea^ pati.t.thaaya naro sapa~n~no, citta.m pa~n~na~nca bhaavaya.m.
[22] aataapii nipako bhikkhu, so ima.m vija.taye ja.ta.m..
[21] ``yesa.m raago ca doso ca, avijjaa ca viraajitaa.
[22] pa.tigha.m ruupasa~n~naa ca, etthesaa chijjate {vija.te (ka0)} ja.taa''ti..
[26] maana.m nu kho so upagamma bhikkhu,
[21] ``kati ^a^T1.0022^ea^ lokasmi.m pajjotaa, yehi loko pakaasati {pabhaasati (ka0 sii0)}.
[22] bhagavanta.m {bhavanta.m (ka0)} pu.t.thumaagamma, katha.m jaanemu ta.m maya''nti..
[22] sambuddho tapata.m se.t.tho, esaa aabhaa anuttaraa''ti..
[21] ``kuto ^a^M1.0015^ea^ saraa nivattanti, kattha va.t.ta.m na vattati.
[21] ``yattha aapo ca pathavii, tejo vaayo na gaadhati.
[27] ato saraa nivattanti, ettha va.t.ta.m na vattati.
[22] kedha ta.nha.m {rodhata.nha.m (syaa0 ka.m0), gedhata.nha.m (ka0)} pajahi.msu {pavaahi.msu (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, ke lokasmi.m anussukaa''ti..
[21] ``hitvaa ^a^T1.0023^ea^ agaara.m pabbajitaa, hitvaa putta.m pasu.m viya.m.
[22] ettha chanda.m viraajetvaa, eva.m dukkhaa pamuccatii''ti..

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0024^ea^ ^a^V1.0020^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho sambahulaa satullapakaayikaa devataayo abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m jetavana.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m ^a^P1.0017^ea^ .thitaa kho ekaa devataa bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[22] sata.m saddhammama~n~naaya, seyyo hoti na paapiyo''ti..
[03] atha kho aparaa devataa bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[22] sata.m saddhammama~n~naaya, pa~n~naa labbhati {pa~n~na.m labhati (syaa0 ka.m0)} naa~n~nato''ti..
[03] atha kho aparaa devataa bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[03] atha ^a^M1.0017^ea^ kho aparaa devataa bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[03] atha ^a^V1.0021^ea^ kho aparaa devataa bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[03] atha kho aparaa devataa bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[03] atha kho aparaa devataa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kassa nu kho, bhagavaa, subhaasita''nti? sabbaasa.m vo subhaasita.m pariyaayena, api ca mamapi su.naatha --
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa taa devataayo bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayi.msuuti.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho sambahulaa satullapakaayikaa devataayo abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m jetavana.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho ekaa devataa bhagavato santike ima.m ^a^T1.0026^ea^ gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``maccheraa ^a^V1.0022^ea^ ca pamaadaa ca, eva.m daana.m na diiyati {diyyati (ka0)}.
[03] atha ^a^M1.0018^ea^ kho aparaa devataa bhagavato santike imaa gaathaayo abhaasi --
[21] ``yasseva bhiito na dadaati maccharii, tadevaadadato bhaya.m.
[27] jighacchaa ca pipaasaa ca, yassa bhaayati maccharii.

[03] ``acchariya.m ^a^P1.0058^ea^, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaavasubhaasitamida.m, bhante, bhagavataa --
[22] tameva anna.m bhajati, asmi.m loke paramhi ca..

[03] ``bhuutapubbaaha.m, bhante, sirii {serii (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} naama raajaa ahosi.m daayako daanapati daanassa va.n.navaadii. tassa mayha.m, bhante, catuusu dvaaresu daana.m diiyittha sama.na-braahma.na-kapa.naddhika-vanibbakayaacakaana.m. atha kho ^a^T1.0083^ea^ ma.m, bhante, itthaagaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa etadavoca {itthaagaaraa upasa"nkamitvaa etadavocu.m (ka0)} -- `devassa kho {devasseva kho (ka0 sii0)} daana.m diiyati; amhaaka.m daana.m na diiyati. saadhu mayampi deva.m nissaaya daanaani dadeyyaama, pu~n~naani kareyyaamaa'ti. tassa mayha.m, bhante, etadahosi -- `aha.m khosmi daayako daanapati daanassa va.n.navaadii. daana.m dassaamaati vadante kinti vadeyya'nti? so khvaaha.m, bhante, pa.thama.m dvaara.m itthaagaarassa adaasi.m. tattha itthaagaarassa daana.m diiyittha; mama daana.m pa.tikkami.

[03] ``atha kho ma.m, bhante, khattiyaa anuyantaa upasa"nkamitvaa etadavocu.m -- `devassa kho daana.m diiyati; itthaagaarassa daana.m diiyati; amhaaka.m daana.m na diiyati. saadhu mayampi deva.m nissaaya daanaani dadeyyaama, pu~n~naani kareyyaamaa'ti ^a^V1.0072^ea^. tassa mayha.m, bhante, etadahosi -- `aha.m khosmi daayako daanapati daanassa va.n.navaadii. daana.m dassaamaati vadante kinti vadeyya'nti ^a^M1.0058^ea^? so khvaaha.m, bhante, dutiya.m dvaara.m khattiyaana.m anuyantaana.m adaasi.m. tattha khattiyaana.m anuyantaana.m daana.m diiyittha, mama daana.m pa.tikkami.

[03] ``atha kho ma.m, bhante, balakaayo upasa"nkamitvaa etadavoca -- `devassa kho daana.m diiyati; itthaagaarassa daana.m diiyati; khattiyaana.m anuyantaana.m daana.m diiyati; amhaaka.m daana.m na diiyati. saadhu mayampi deva.m nissaaya daanaani dadeyyaama, pu~n~naani kareyyaamaa'ti. tassa ^a^P1.0059^ea^ mayha.m, bhante, etadahosi -- `aha.m khosmi daayako daanapati daanassa va.n.navaadii. daana.m dassaamaati vadante ^a^T1.0084^ea^ kinti vadeyya'nti? so khvaaha.m bhante, tatiya.m dvaara.m balakaayassa adaasi.m. tattha balakaayassa daana.m diiyittha, mama daana.m pa.tikkami.

[03] ``atha kho ma.m, bhante, braahma.nagahapatikaa upasa"nkamitvaa etadavocu.m -- `devassa kho daana.m diiyati; itthaagaarassa daana.m diiyati; khattiyaana.m anuyantaana.m daana.m diiyati; balakaayassa daana.m diiyati; amhaaka.m daana.m na diiyati. saadhu mayampi deva.m nissaaya daanaani dadeyyaama, pu~n~naani kareyyaamaa'ti. tassa mayha.m, bhante, etadahosi -- `aha.m khosmi daayako daanapati daanassa va.n.navaadii. daana.m dassaamaati vadante kinti vadeyya'nti? so khvaaha.m, bhante, catuttha.m dvaara.m braahma.nagahapatikaana.m adaasi.m. tattha braahma.nagahapatikaana.m daana.m diiyittha, mama daana.m pa.tikkami.

[03] ``atha kho ma.m, bhante, purisaa upasa"nkamitvaa etadavocu.m -- `na kho daani devassa koci daana.m diiyatii'ti. eva.m vuttaaha.m, bhante, te purise etadavoca.m -- `tena hi, bha.ne, yo baahiresu janapadesu aayo sa~njaayati tato upa.d.dha.m antepure pavesetha, upa.d.dha.m tattheva daana.m detha sama.na-braahma.na-kapa.naddhika-vanibbaka-yaacakaana'nti ^a^V1.0073^ea^. so khvaaha.m, bhante, eva.m diigharatta.m kataana.m pu~n~naana.m eva.m diigharatta.m kataana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m pariyanta.m naadhigacchaami -- ettaka.m pu~n~nanti vaa ettako pu~n~navipaakoti vaa ettaka.m sagge .thaatabbanti vaati. acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaavasubhaasitamida.m, bhante, bhagavataa --
[22] tameva anna.m bhajati, asmi.m loke paramhi ca..
[03] 105^b^.^eb^ ekamanta.m ^a^M1.0059^ea^ ^a^P1.0060^ea^ .thito kho gha.tiikaaro devaputto bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``ke ca te ataru.m pa"nka.m, maccudheyya.m suduttara.m.
[22] ke hitvaa maanusa.m deha.m, dibbayoga.m upaccagu''nti..
[21] ``upako palaga.n.do {phalaga.n.do (ka0)} ca, pukkusaati ca te tayo.
[27] bhaddiyo kha.n.dadevo ca, baahuraggi ca sa"ngiyo {baahudantii ca pi"ngiyo (sii0 syaa0)}.
[22] te hitvaa maanusa.m deha.m, dibbayoga.m upaccagu''nti..
[22] ta.m te dhamma.m idha~n~naaya, acchidu.m bhavabandhana''nti..
[22] kassa tva.m dhammama~n~naaya, vaaca.m bhaasasi iidisa''nti..
[22] ahuvaa te sagaameyyo, ahuvaa te pure sakhaa..
[22] ahuvaa me sagaameyyo, ahuvaa me pure sakhaa''ti..

[03] 106^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V1.0075^ea^ ^a^P1.0061^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m sambahulaa bhikkhuu, kosalesu viharanti himavantapasse ara~n~naku.tikaaya uddhataa unna.laa capalaa mukharaa viki.n.navaacaa mu.t.thassatino asampajaanaa asamaahitaa vibbhantacittaa paakatindriyaa.
[03] atha kho ^a^T1.0087^ea^ jantu devaputto tadahuposathe pannarase yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[22] apaviddhaa anaathaa te, yathaa petaa tatheva te {tatheva ca (sii0)}..
[21] ``ye kho pamattaa viharanti, te me sandhaaya bhaasita.m.
[22] ye appamattaa viharanti, namo tesa.m karomaha''nti..

[03] 107^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ekamanta.m .thito kho rohitasso devaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``yattha nu kho, bhante, na jaayati na jiiyati na miiyati {na jiyyati na miyyati (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} na cavati na upapajjati, sakkaa nu kho so, bhante, gamanena lokassa ^a^M1.0061^ea^ anto ~naatu.m vaa da.t.thu.m vaa paapu.nitu.m ^a^V1.0076^ea^ vaa''ti? ``yattha kho, aavuso, na jaayati na jiiyati na miiyati na cavati na upapajjati, naaha.m ta.m gamanena lokassa anta.m ~naateyya.m da.t.theyya.m ^a^T1.0088^ea^ patteyyanti vadaamii''ti.

[03] ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaavasubhaasitamida.m, bhante, bhagavataa -- `yattha kho, aavuso, na jaayati na jiiyati na miiyati na cavati na upapajjati, naaha.m ta.m gamanena lokassa anta.m ~naateyya.m da.t.theyya.m patteyyanti vadaamii'ti.

[03] ``bhuutapubbaaha.m, bhante, rohitasso naama isi ahosi.m bhojaputto iddhimaa vehaasa"ngamo. tassa mayha.m, bhante, evaruupo ^a^P1.0062^ea^ javo ahosi; seyyathaapi naama da.lhadhammaa {da.lhadhammo (sabbattha) .tiikaa ca moggallaanabyaakara.na.m ca oloketabba.m} dhanuggaho susikkhito katahattho katayoggo katuupaasano lahukena asanena appakasireneva tiriya.m taalacchaaya.m atipaateyya. tassa mayha.m, bhante, evaruupo padaviitihaaro ahosi; seyyathaapi naama puratthimaa samuddaa pacchimo samuddo. tassa mayha.m, bhante, evaruupa.m icchaagata.m uppajji -- `aha.m gamanena lokassa anta.m paapu.nissaamii'ti. so khvaaha.m, bhante, evaruupena javena samannaagato evaruupena ca padaviitihaarena a~n~natreva asita-piita-khaayita-saayitaa a~n~natra uccaara-passaavakammaa a~n~natra niddaakilamathapa.tivinodanaa vassasataayuko vassasatajiivii vassasata.m gantvaa appatvaava lokassa anta.m antaraava kaala"nkato.

[03] ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaavasubhaasitamida.m, bhante, bhagavataa -- `yattha kho, aavuso, na jaayati na jiiyati na miiyati na cavati na upapajjati, naaha.m ta.m gamanena lokassa anta.m ~naateyya.m da.t.theyya.m patteyyanti vadaamii'''ti.

[03] ``na kho ^a^T1.0089^ea^ panaaha.m, aavuso, appatvaa lokassa anta.m dukkhassa antakiriya.m vadaami. api ca khvaaha.m, aavuso, imasmi.myeva byaamamatte ka.levare sasa~n~nimhi samanake loka~nca pa~n~napemi lokasamudaya~nca lokanirodha~nca lokanirodhagaamini~nca pa.tipadanti.
[22] na ca appatvaa lokanta.m, dukkhaa atthi pamocana.m..
[03] 108^b^.^eb^ ekamanta.m .thito kho nando devaputto bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[03] 109^b^.^eb^ ekamanta.m .thito kho nandivisaalo devaputto bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --

[03] 110^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V1.0078^ea^. atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m aananda.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``tuyhampi no, aananda, saariputto ruccatii''ti?

[03] ``kassa ^a^M1.0063^ea^ hi naama, bhante, abaalassa adu.t.thassa amuu.lhassa avipallatthacittassa aayasmaa saariputto na rucceyya? pa.n.dito, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto ^a^T1.0091^ea^. mahaapa~n~no, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. puthupa~n~no, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. haasapa~n~no {haasupa~n~no (sii0)}, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. javanapa~n~no, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. tikkhapa~n~no, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. nibbedhikapa~n~no, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. appiccho, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. santu.t.tho, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. pavivitto, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. asa.msa.t.tho, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. aaraddhaviiriyo, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. vattaa, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. vacanakkhamo, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. codako, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. paapagarahii, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. kassa hi naama, bhante, abaalassa adu.t.thassa amuu.lhassa avipallatthacittassa aayasmaa saariputto na rucceyyaa''ti?

[03] ``evameta.m ^a^P1.0064^ea^, aananda, evameta.m, aananda! kassa hi naama, aananda, abaalassa adu.t.thassa amuu.lhassa avipallatthacittassa saariputto na rucceyya? pa.n.dito, aananda, saariputto. mahaapa~n~no, aananda, saariputto. puthupa~n~no, aananda, saariputto. haasapa~n~no, aananda, saariputto. javanapa~n~no, aananda, saariputto. tikkhapa~n~no, aananda, saariputto. nibbedhikapa~n~no, aananda, saariputto. appiccho, aananda, saariputto. santu.t.tho, aananda, saariputto. pavivitto, aananda, saariputto. asa.msa.t.tho, aananda, saariputto. aaraddhaviiriyo, aananda, saariputto. vattaa, aananda, saariputto. vacanakkhamo, aananda, saariputto ^a^T1.0092^ea^. codako, aananda, saariputto. paapagarahii, aananda, saariputto. kassa hi naama, aananda, abaalassa adu.t.thassa amuu.lhassa avipallatthacittassa saariputto na rucceyyaa''ti?

[03] atha kho susimo {susiimo (sii0)} devaputto aayasmato saariputtassa va.n.ne bha~n~namaane mahatiyaa devaputtaparisaaya ^a^V1.0079^ea^ parivuto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho susimo devaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``evameta.m ^a^M1.0064^ea^, bhagavaa, evameta.m, sugata. kassa hi naama, bhante, abaalassa adu.t.thassa amuu.lhassa avipallatthacittassa aayasmaa saariputto na rucceyya? pa.n.dito, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. mahaapa~n~no, bhante, puthupa~n~no, bhante, haasapa~n~no, bhante, javanapa~n~no, bhante, tikkhapa~n~no, bhante, nibbedhikapa~n~no, bhante, appiccho, bhante, santu.t.tho, bhante, pavivitto, bhante, asa.msa.t.tho, bhante, aaraddhaviiriyo, bhante, vattaa, bhante, vacanakkhamo, bhante, codako, bhante, paapagarahii, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto. kassa hi naama, bhante, abaalassa adu.t.thassa amuu.lhassa avipallatthacittassa aayasmaa saariputto na rucceyya?

[03] ``ahampi hi, bhante, ya~n~nadeva devaputtaparisa.m upasa"nkami.m, etadeva bahula.m sadda.m su.naami -- `pa.n.dito aayasmaa saariputto; mahaapa~n~no aayasmaa, puthupa~n~no aayasmaa, haasapa~n~no aayasmaa, javanapa~n~no aayasmaa, tikkhapa~n~no aayasmaa, nibbedhikapa~n~no aayasmaa, appiccho aayasmaa, santu.t.tho aayasmaa, pavivitto aayasmaa, asa.msa.t.tho aayasmaa, aaraddhaviiriyo aayasmaa, vattaa aayasmaa, vacanakkhamo aayasmaa, codako aayasmaa, paapagarahii aayasmaa saariputto'ti ^a^T1.0093^ea^. kassa hi naama, bhante, abaalassa adu.t.thassa amuu.lhassa avipallatthacittassa aayasmaa saariputto na rucceyyaa''ti?
[03] atha kho susimassa devaputtassa devaputtaparisaa aayasmato saariputtassa va.n.ne bha~n~namaane attamanaa pamuditaa piitisomanassajaataa uccaavacaa va.n.nanibhaa upada.mseti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi naama ma.ni ve.luriyo subho jaatimaa a.t.tha.mso suparikammakato pa.n.dukambale nikkhitto bhaasate ca tapate ca virocati ca; evameva.m susimassa devaputtassa devaputtaparisaa ^a^P1.0065^ea^ aayasmato saariputtassa va.n.ne bha~n~namaane attamanaa pamuditaa piitisomanassajaataa uccaavacaa va.n.nanibhaa upada.mseti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi naama nikkha.m jambonada.m dakkhakammaaraputtaukkaamukhasukusalasampaha.t.tha.m pa.n.dukambale ^a^V1.0080^ea^ nikkhitta.m bhaasate ca tapate ca virocati ca; evameva.m susimassa devaputtassa devaputtaparisaa aayasmato saariputtassa va.n.ne bha~n~namaane attamanaa pamuditaa piitisomanassajaataa uccaavacaa va.n.nanibhaa upada.mseti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^M1.0065^ea^ naama saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalaahake deve rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m osadhitaarakaa bhaasate ca tapate ca virocati ca; evameva.m susimassa devaputtassa ^a^T1.0094^ea^ devaputtaparisaa aayasmato saariputtassa va.n.ne bha~n~namaane attamanaa pamuditaa piitisomanassajaataa uccaavacaa va.n.nanibhaa upada.mseti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi naama saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalaahake deve aadicco nabha.m abbhussakkamaano {abbhussukkamaano (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), abbhuggamamaano (dii0 ni0 2.258)} sabba.m aakaasagata.m tamagata.m abhivihacca bhaasate ca tapate ca virocati ca; evameva.m susimassa devaputtassa devaputtaparisaa aayasmato saariputtassa va.n.ne bha~n~namaane attamanaa pamuditaa piitisomanassajaataa uccaavacaa va.n.nanibhaa upada.mseti.
[03] atha kho susimo devaputto aayasmanta.m saariputta.m aarabbha bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[03] atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m aarabbha susima.m devaputta.m gaathaaya paccabhaasi --
[22] appiccho sorato danto, kaala.m ka"nkhati sudanto'' {kaala.m ka"nkhati bhatako sudanto (sii0), kaala.m ka"nkhati bhaavito sudanto (syaa0 ka.m0), kaala.m ka"nkhati bhatiko sudanto (pii0)} ti..

[03] 111^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho sambahulaa naanaatitthiyasaavakaa devaputtaa ^a^T1.0095^ea^ asamo ca sahali {sahalii (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} ca niiko {ni"nko (sii0 pii0), niko (syaa0 ka.m0)} ca aako.tako ca vegabbhari ca {ve.tambarii ca (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} maa.navagaamiyo ca abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa ^a^V1.0081^ea^ kevalakappa.m ^a^P1.0066^ea^ ve.luvana.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ^a^M1.0066^ea^ ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thito kho asamo devaputto puura.na.m kassapa.m aarabbha bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[27] na paapa.m samanupassati, pu~n~na.m vaa pana attano.
[22] sa ve vissaasamaacikkhi, satthaa arahati maanana''nti..
[03] atha kho sahali devaputto makkhali.m gosaala.m aarabbha bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[22] na hi nuuna taadisa.m karoti {na ha nuna taadii pakaroti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} paapa''nti..
[03] atha kho niiko devaputto niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m {naathaputta.m (sii0)} aarabbha bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[22] di.t.tha.m suta~nca aacikkha.m, na hi nuuna kibbisii siyaa''ti..
[03] atha kho aako.tako devaputto naanaatitthiye aarabbha bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[22] na hi nuuna te sappurisehi duure''ti..
[03] atha kho vegabbhari devaputto aako.taka.m devaputta.m gaathaaya paccabhaasi --
[03] atha ^a^M1.0067^ea^ ^a^P1.0067^ea^ kho maaro paapimaa begabbhari.m devaputta.m anvaavisitvaa bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[03] atha ^a^T1.0097^ea^ kho bhagavaa, `maaro aya.m paapimaa' iti viditvaa, maara.m paapimanta.m gaathaaya paccabhaasi --
[21] ``ye keci ruupaa idha vaa hura.m vaa,
[03] atha kho maa.navagaamiyo devaputto bhagavanta.m aarabbha bhagavato santike imaa gaathaayo abhaasi --
[21] sivo khemo ca serii ca, gha.tii jantu ca rohito.
[22] nando nandivisaalo ca, susimo naanaatitthiyena te dasaati..

[03] 112^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0098^ea^ ^a^V1.0084^ea^ ^a^M1.0068^ea^ ^a^P1.0068^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``bhavampi no gotamo anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddhoti pa.tijaanaatii''ti? ``ya~nhi ta.m, mahaaraaja, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya `anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'ti, mameva {mama.m (sabbattha)} ta.m sammaa vadamaano vadeyya. aha~nhi, mahaaraaja, anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho''ti.

[03] ``yepi te, bho gotama, sama.nabraahma.naa sa"nghino ga.nino ga.naacariyaa ~naataa yasassino titthakaraa saadhusammataa bahujanassa, seyyathida.m -- puura.no kassapo, makkhali gosaalo, niga.n.tho naa.taputto, sa~ncayo bela.t.thaputto, pakudho kaccaayano, ajito kesakambalo; tepi mayaa ^a^T1.0099^ea^ `anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddhoti pa.tijaanaathaa'ti pu.t.thaa samaanaa anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddhoti na pa.tijaananti. ki.m pana bhava.m gotamo daharo ceva jaatiyaa navo ca pabbajjaayaa''ti?

[03] ``cattaaro ^a^P1.0069^ea^ kho me, mahaaraaja, daharaati na u~n~naatabbaa, daharaati na paribhotabbaa. katame cattaaro? khattiyo kho, mahaaraaja, daharoti na u~n~naatabbo, daharoti na paribhotabbo. urago kho, mahaaraaja, daharoti na u~n~naatabbo, daharoti na paribhotabbo. aggi ^a^V1.0085^ea^ kho, mahaaraaja, daharoti na u~n~naatabbo, daharoti na paribhotabbo. bhikkhu, kho, mahaaraaja, daharoti na u~n~naatabbo, daharoti na paribhotabbo. ime kho, mahaaraaja, cattaaro daharaati na u~n~naatabbaa, daharaati na paribhotabbaa''ti.

[03] 115^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T1.0103^ea^. ekamanta.m nisinno kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca ^a^V1.0088^ea^ -- ``idha mayha.m, bhante, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `kesa.m nu kho piyo attaa, kesa.m appiyo attaa'ti? tassa mayha.m, bhante, etadahosi -- `ye ca kho keci kaayena duccarita.m caranti, vaacaaya duccarita.m caranti, manasaa duccarita.m caranti; tesa.m appiyo attaa'. ki~ncaapi te eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `piyo no attaa'ti, atha kho tesa.m appiyo attaa. ta.m kissa hetu? ya~nhi appiyo appiyassa ^a^P1.0072^ea^ kareyya, ta.m te attanaava attano karonti; tasmaa tesa.m appiyo attaa. ye ca kho keci kaayena sucarita.m caranti, vaacaaya sucarita.m caranti, manasaa sucarita.m caranti; tesa.m piyo attaa. ki~ncaapi te eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `appiyo no attaa'ti; atha kho tesa.m piyo attaa. ta.m kissa hetu? ya~nhi piyo piyassa kareyya, ta.m te attanaava attano karonti; tasmaa tesa.m piyo attaa''ti.

[03] 119^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^P1.0075^ea^. tena kho pana samayena raajaa pasenadi kosalo mallikaaya deviyaa saddhi.m uparipaasaadavaragato hoti. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo mallika.m devi.m etadavoca -- ``atthi nu kho te, mallike, koca~n~no attanaa piyataro''ti? ``natthi kho me, mahaaraaja, koca~n~no attanaa piyataro. tuyha.m pana, mahaaraaja, attha~n~no ^a^M1.0075^ea^ koci attanaa piyataro''ti? ``mayhampi kho, mallike, nattha~n~no koci attanaa piyataro''ti.

[03] ``sa.mvaasena kho, mahaaraaja, siila.m veditabba.m. ta~nca kho diighena addhunaa, na ittara.m; manasikarotaa, no amanasikarotaa; pa~n~navataa, no duppa~n~nena. sa.mvohaarena kho, mahaaraaja, soceyya.m veditabba.m. ta~nca kho diighena addhunaa, na ittara.m; manasikarotaa, no amanasikarotaa; pa~n~navataa, no duppa~n~nena. aapadaasu kho, mahaaraaja, thaamo veditabbo. so ca kho diighena addhunaa, na ittara.m; manasikarotaa, no amanasikarotaa; pa~n~navataa, no duppa~n~nena. saakacchaaya ^a^P1.0079^ea^, kho, mahaaraaja, pa~n~naa veditabbaa. saa ca kho diighena addhunaa, na ittara.m; manasikarotaa, no ^a^T1.0115^ea^ amanasikarotaa; pa~n~navataa, no duppa~n~nenaa''ti.

[03] ``acchariya.m ^a^V1.0096^ea^, bhante, abbhuta.m bhante! yaava subhaasitamida.m, bhante, bhagavataa -- `dujjaana.m kho eta.m, mahaaraaja, tayaa gihinaa kaamabhoginaa puttasambaadhasayana.m ajjhaavasantena kaasikacandana.m paccanubhontena maalaagandhavilepana.m dhaarayantena jaataruuparajata.m saadiyantena -- ime vaa arahanto, ime vaa arahattamagga.m samaapannaa'ti. sa.mvaasena kho, mahaaraaja, siila.m veditabba.m. ta~nca kho diighena addhunaa, na ittara.m; manasikarotaa, no amanasikarotaa; pa~n~navataa, no duppa~n~nena. sa.mvohaarena kho mahaaraaja ^a^M1.0079^ea^, soceyya.m veditabba.m. ta~nca kho diighena addhunaa, na ittara.m; manasikarotaa, no amanasikarotaa; pa~n~navataa, no duppa~n~nena. aapadaasu kho, mahaaraaja, thaamo veditabbo. so ca kho diighena addhunaa, na ittara.m; manasikarotaa, no amanasikarotaa; pa~n~navataa, no duppa~n~nena. saakacchaaya kho, mahaaraaja, pa~n~naa veditabbaa. saa ca kho diighena addhunaa, na ittara.m; manasikarotaa, no amanasikarotaa; pa~n~navataa, no duppa~n~nenaa''ti.

[03] ``ete, bhante, mama purisaa caraa ocarakaa janapada.m ocaritvaa aagacchanti. tehi pa.thama.m oci.n.na.m aha.m pacchaa osaapayissaami {oyaayissaami (sii0), ohayissaami (syaa0 ka.m0)}. idaani te, bhante, ta.m rajojalla.m pavaahetvaa sunhaataa suvilittaa kappitakesamassuu odaatavatthaa {odaatavatthavasanaa (sii0)} pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappitaa sama"ngiibhuutaa paricaaressantii''ti.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m imaa gaathaayo abhaasi --

[03] 123^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V1.0097^ea^. tena kho pana samayena pa~ncanna.m raajuuna.m pasenadipamukhaana.m pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappitaana.m sama"ngiibhuutaana.m paricaarayamaanaana.m ayamantaraakathaa udapaadi -- ``ki.m nu kho kaamaana.m agga''nti? tatrekacce {tatreke (sii0 pii0)} evamaaha.msu -- ``ruupaa kaamaana.m agga''nti. ekacce evamaaha.msu ^a^M1.0080^ea^ -- ``saddaa kaamaana.m agga''nti. ekacce evamaaha.msu -- ``gandhaa kaamaana.m agga''nti. ekacce evamaaha.msu -- ``rasaa kaamaana.m agga''nti. ekacce evamaaha.msu ^a^P1.0080^ea^ -- ``pho.t.thabbaa kaamaana.m agga''nti. yato kho te raajaano naasakkhi.msu a~n~nama~n~na.m sa~n~naapetu.m.

[03] atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo te raajaano etadavoca -- ``aayaama, maarisaa, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkamissaama; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etamattha.m pa.tipucchissaama. yathaa no bhagavaa byaakarissati tathaa na.m dhaaressaamaa''ti {dhaareyyaamaati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. ``eva.m, maarisaa''ti kho te raajaano ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa paccassosu.m.

[03] atha kho te pa~nca raajaano pasenadipamukhaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinno kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca ^a^T1.0117^ea^ -- ``idha, bhante, amhaaka.m pa~ncanna.m raajuuna.m pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappitaana.m sama"ngiibhuutaana.m paricaarayamaanaana.m ayamantaraakathaa udapaadi -- `ki.m nu kho kaamaana.m agga'nti? ekacce evamaaha.msu -- `ruupaa kaamaana.m agga'nti. ekacce evamaaha.msu -- `saddaa kaamaana.m agga'nti. ekacce evamaaha.msu -- `gandhaa kaamaana.m agga'nti. ekacce evamaaha.msu -- `rasaa kaamaana.m agga'nti. ekacce evamaaha.msu -- `pho.t.thabbaa kaamaana.m agga'nti. ki.m nu kho, bhante, kaamaana.m agga''nti?

[03] ``manaapapariyanta.m khvaaha.m, mahaaraaja, pa~ncasu kaamagu.nesu agganti vadaami. teva {te ca (sii0 pii0 ka0), ye ca (syaa0 ka.m0)}, mahaaraaja, ruupaa ekaccassa manaapaa honti, teva {te ca (sii0 pii0 ka0)} ruupaa ekaccassa amanaapaa honti. yehi ca yo ruupehi attamano hoti paripu.n.nasa"nkappo, so tehi ruupehi a~n~na.m ruupa.m uttaritara.m vaa pa.niitatara.m vaa na pattheti. te tassa ruupaa paramaa honti. te tassa ruupaa anuttaraa honti.

[03] ``teva ^a^V1.0098^ea^, mahaaraaja, saddaa ekaccassa manaapaa honti, teva saddaa ekaccassa amanaapaa honti. yehi ca yo saddehi attamano hoti paripu.n.nasa"nkappo, so tehi saddehi a~n~na.m sadda.m uttaritara.m vaa ^a^M1.0081^ea^ pa.niitatara.m vaa na pattheti. te tassa saddaa paramaa honti. te tassa saddaa anuttaraa honti.

[03] ``teva, mahaaraaja, gandhaa ekaccassa manaapaa honti, teva gandhaa ekaccassa amanaapaa honti. yehi ca yo gandhehi attamano hoti paripu.n.nasa"nkappo, so tehi gandhehi a~n~na.m gandha.m uttaritara.m vaa pa.niitatara.m vaa na pattheti. te tassa gandhaa paramaa honti. te tassa gandhaa anuttaraa honti.

[03] ``teva, mahaaraaja, rasaa ekaccassa manaapaa honti, teva rasaa ekaccassa amanaapaa honti. yehi ca yo rasehi attamano hoti paripu.n.nasa"nkappo, so tehi rasehi a~n~na.m rasa.m uttaritara.m vaa pa.niitatara.m vaa na pattheti. te tassa rasaa paramaa honti. te tassa rasaa anuttaraa honti.

[03] ``teva, mahaaraaja, pho.t.thabbaa ekaccassa manaapaa honti, teva pho.t.thabbaa ekaccassa amanaapaa honti. yehi ^a^P1.0081^ea^ ca yo pho.t.thabbehi attamano hoti paripu.n.nasa"nkappo, so tehi pho.t.thabbehi a~n~na.m pho.t.thabba.m uttaritara.m vaa pa.niitatara.m vaa na pattheti. te tassa ^a^T1.0118^ea^ pho.t.thabbaa paramaa honti. te tassa pho.t.thabbaa anuttaraa hontii''ti.

[03] ``ekamidaaha.m, mahaaraaja, samaya.m sakkesu viharaami nagaraka.m naama sakyaana.m nigamo. atha kho, mahaaraaja, aanando bhikkhu yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho, mahaaraaja, aanando bhikkhu ma.m etadavoca -- `upa.d.dhamida.m, bhante, brahmacariyassa -- yadida.m kalyaa.namittataa kalyaa.nasahaayataa kalyaa.nasampava"nkataa'''ti.

[03] ``eva.m vuttaaha.m, mahaaraaja, aananda.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca.m -- `maa heva.m, aananda, maa heva.m, aananda! sakalameva hida.m, aananda, brahmacariya.m -- yadida.m kalyaa.namittataa ^a^P1.0088^ea^ kalyaa.nasahaayataa kalyaa.nasampava"nkataa. kalyaa.namittasseta.m, aananda, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m kalyaa.nasahaayassa kalyaa.nasampava"nkassa ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavessati ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikarissati'''.

[03] ``katha~nca, aananda, bhikkhu kalyaa.namitto kalyaa.nasahaayo kalyaa.nasampava"nko ^a^T1.0128^ea^ ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti, ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroti? idhaananda, bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti ^a^V1.0106^ea^ vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m, sammaasa"nkappa.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaavaaca.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaakammanta.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaaaajiiva.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaavaayaama.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaasati.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. eva.m kho, aananda, bhikkhu kalyaa.namitto kalyaa.nasahaayo kalyaa.nasampava"nko ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaveti, ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bahuliikaroti. tadaminaapeta.m, aananda, pariyaayena veditabba.m yathaa sakalamevida.m brahmacariya.m -- yadida.m kalyaa.namittataa kalyaa.nasahaayataa kalyaa.nasampava"nkataa''ti.

[03] ``mama~nhi, aananda, kalyaa.namitta.m aagamma jaatidhammaa sattaa jaatiyaa parimuccanti, jaraadhammaa sattaa jaraaya parimuccanti, byaadhidhammaa sattaa byaadhito parimuccanti, mara.nadhammaa sattaa mara.nena parimuccanti, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasadhammaa sattaa sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasehi parimuccanti. iminaa kho eta.m, aananda, pariyaayena veditabba.m yathaa sakalamevida.m ^a^M1.0089^ea^ brahmacariya.m -- yadida.m kalyaa.namittataa kalyaa.nasahaayataa kalyaa.nasampava"nkataa''ti.

[03] ``evameta.m, mahaaraaja, evameta.m, mahaaraaja! asappuriso kho, mahaaraaja, u.laare bhoge labhitvaa nevattaana.m sukheti pii.neti, na maataapitaro sukheti pii.neti, na puttadaara.m sukheti pii.neti, na daasakammakaraporise ^a^T1.0131^ea^ sukheti pii.neti, na mittaamacce sukheti pii.neti, na sama.nabraahma.nesu uddhaggika.m dakkhi.na.m pati.t.thaapeti sovaggika.m sukhavipaaka.m saggasa.mvattanika.m. tassa te bhoge eva.m sammaa aparibhu~njiyamaane {aparibhu~njamaano (sabbattha)} raajaano vaa haranti coraa vaa haranti aggi vaa .dahati udaka.m vaa vahati appiyaa vaa daayaadaa haranti. eva.msa te {eva.m sante (sii0 pii0)}, mahaaraaja, bhogaa sammaa aparibhu~njiyamaanaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, no paribhoga.m.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, mahaaraaja, amanussa.t.thaane pokkhara.nii acchodakaa siitodakaa saatodakaa setodakaa supatitthaa rama.niiyaa. ta.m jano neva hareyya na piveyya na nahaayeyya na yathaapaccaya.m vaa kareyya. eva~nhi ta.m, mahaaraaja, udaka.m sammaa aparibhu~njiyamaana.m {aparibhu~njamaana.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} parikkhaya.m gaccheyya ^a^M1.0091^ea^, no paribhoga.m. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, asappuriso u.laare bhoge labhitvaa nevattaana.m sukheti pii.neti, na maataapitaro sukheti pii.neti, na puttadaara.m sukheti pii.neti, na daasakammakaraporise sukheti pii.neti, na mittaamacce sukheti pii.neti, na sama.nabraahma.nesu uddhaggika.m dakkhi.na.m pati.t.thaapeti sovaggika.m sukhavipaaka.m saggasa.mvattanika.m. tassa te bhoge eva.m sammaa aparibhu~njiyamaane raajaano vaa haranti coraa vaa haranti aggi vaa .dahati udaka.m vaa vahati appiyaa vaa daayaadaa haranti. eva.msa te {eva.m sante (sii0 pii0)}, mahaaraaja, bhogaa sammaa aparibhu~njiyamaanaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, no paribhoga.m.

[03] ``ya.m kho so, mahaaraaja, se.t.thi gahapati taggarasikhi.m paccekasambuddha.m pi.n.dapaatena pa.tipaadesi, tassa kammassa vipaakena sattakkhattu.m sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajji. tasseva ^a^T1.0134^ea^ kammassa vipaakaavasesena imissaayeva saavatthiyaa ^a^M1.0093^ea^ sattakkhattu.m se.t.thitta.m kaaresi. ya.m kho so, mahaaraaja, se.t.thi gahapati datvaa pacchaa vippa.tisaarii ahosi -- `varameta.m pi.n.dapaata.m daasaa vaa kammakaraa vaa bhu~njeyyu'nti, tassa kammassa vipaakena naassu.laaraaya bhattabhogaaya citta.m namati, naassu.laaraaya vatthabhogaaya citta.m namati, naassu.laaraaya yaanabhogaaya citta.m namati, naassu.laaraana.m pa~ncanna.m kaamagu.naana.m bhogaaya citta.m namati. ya.m kho so, mahaaraaja, se.t.thi gahapati bhaatu ca pana ekaputtaka.m saapateyyassa kaara.naa jiivitaa voropesi, tassa kammassa vipaakena bahuuni vassaani bahuuni vassasataani bahuuni vassasahassaani bahuuni vassasatasahassaani niraye paccittha. tasseva kammassa vipaakaavasesena ida.m sattama.m aputtaka.m saapateyya.m raajakosa.m paveseti. tassa kho, mahaaraaja, se.t.thissa gahapatissa puraa.na~nca pu~n~na.m parikkhii.na.m, nava~nca pu~n~na.m anupacita.m. ajja pana, mahaaraaja, se.t.thi gahapati mahaaroruve niraye paccatii''ti ^a^V1.0111^ea^. ``eva.m, bhante, se.t.thi gahapati mahaaroruva.m niraya.m upapanno''ti. ``eva.m ^a^P1.0093^ea^, mahaaraaja, se.t.thi gahapati mahaaroruva.m niraya.m upapanno''ti. idamavoca...pe0....

[03] 132^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T1.0136^ea^ ^a^V1.0112^ea^ ^a^M1.0094^ea^. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``cattaarome, mahaaraaja, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? tamotamaparaayano, tamojotiparaayano, jotitamaparaayano, jotijotiparaayano''.

[03] ``katha~nca, mahaaraaja puggalo tamotamaparaayano hoti? idha, mahaaraaja, ekacco puggalo niice kule paccaajaato hoti, ca.n.daalakule vaa venakule {ve.nakule (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaa nesaadakule vaa rathakaarakule vaa pukkusakule vaa dalidde appannapaanabhojane kasiravuttike ^a^P1.0094^ea^, yattha kasirena ghaasacchaado labbhati. so ca hoti dubba.n.no duddasiko oko.timako bavhaabaadho {bahvaabaadho (ka0)} kaa.no vaa ku.nii vaa kha~njo vaa pakkhahato vaa, na laabhii annassa paanassa vatthassa yaanassa maalaagandhavilepanassa seyyaavasathapadiipeyyassa. so kaayena duccarita.m carati, vaacaaya duccarita.m carati, manasaa duccarita.m carati. so kaayena duccarita.m caritvaa vaacaaya duccarita.m caritvaa manasaa duccarita.m caritvaa, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, mahaaraaja ^a^T1.0137^ea^, puriso andhakaaraa vaa andhakaara.m gaccheyya, tamaa vaa tama.m gaccheyya, lohitamalaa vaa lohitamala.m gaccheyya. tathuupamaaha.m, mahaaraaja, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. eva.m kho, mahaaraaja, puggalo tamotamaparaayano hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, mahaaraaja, puggalo tamojotiparaayano hoti? idha, mahaaraaja, ekacco puggalo niice kule paccaajaato hoti, ca.n.daalakule vaa venakule vaa nesaadakule vaa rathakaarakule vaa pukkusakule vaa dalidde appannapaanabhojane kasiravuttike, yattha kasirena ghaasacchaado labbhati. so ca kho hoti dubba.n.no duddasiko ^a^M1.0095^ea^ oko.timako bavhaabaadho, kaa.no vaa ^a^V1.0113^ea^ ku.nii vaa kha~njo vaa pakkhahato vaa, na laabhii annassa paanassa vatthassa yaanassa maalaagandhavilepanassa seyyaavasathapadiipeyyassa. so kaayena sucarita.m carati, vaacaaya sucarita.m carati, manasaa sucarita.m carati. so kaayena sucarita.m caritvaa vaacaaya sucarita.m caritvaa manasaa sucarita.m caritvaa, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati.

[21] ``a.d.dho ce puriso raaja, saddho hoti amaccharii.

[03] 133^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T1.0141^ea^. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m bhagavaa ^a^P1.0097^ea^ etadavoca -- ``handa, kuto nu tva.m, mahaaraaja, aagacchasi divaadivassaa''ti?

[03] ``ayyikaa ^a^V1.0116^ea^ me, bhante, kaala"nkataa ji.n.naa vu.d.dhaa mahallikaa addhagataa vayoanuppattaa viisavassasatikaa jaatiyaa. ayyikaa kho pana me, bhante, piyaa hoti manaapaa. hatthiratanena cepaaha.m, bhante, labheyya.m `maa me ayyikaa kaalamakaasii'ti, hatthiratanampaaha.m dadeyya.m -- `maa me ayyikaa kaalamakaasii'ti. assaratanena cepaaha.m, bhante, labheyya.m `maa me ayyikaa kaalamakaasii'ti, assaratanampaaha.m dadeyya.m -- `maa me ayyikaa kaalamakaasii'ti. gaamavarena cepaaha.m bhante, labheyya.m `maa me ayyikaa kaalamakaasii'ti, gaamavarampaaha.m dadeyya.m -- `maa me ayyikaa kaalamakaasii'ti. janapadapadesena {janapadena (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} cepaaha.m, bhante, labheyya.m ^a^M1.0098^ea^ `maa me ayyikaa kaalamakaasii'ti, janapadapadesampaaha.m dadeyya.m -- `maa me ayyikaa kaalamakaasii'ti. `sabbe sattaa, mahaaraaja, mara.nadhammaa mara.napariyosaanaa mara.na.m anatiitaa'ti. `acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaavasubhaasitamida.m, bhante, bhagavataa -- sabbe sattaa mara.nadhammaa mara.napariyosaanaa mara.na.m anatiitaa'''ti.

[03] ``evameta.m, mahaaraaja, evameta.m, mahaaraaja! sabbe sattaa mara.nadhammaa ^a^T1.0142^ea^ mara.napariyosaanaa mara.na.m anatiitaa. seyyathaapi, mahaaraaja, yaani kaanici kumbhakaarabhaajanaani aamakaani ceva pakkaani ca sabbaani taani bhedanadhammaani bhedanapariyosaanaani bhedana.m anatiitaani; evameva kho, mahaaraaja, sabbe sattaa mara.nadhammaa mara.napariyosaanaa mara.na.m anatiitaa''ti. idamavoca...pe0...

[03] 134^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^P1.0098^ea^. ekamanta.m nisinno kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca ^a^V1.0117^ea^ -- ``kati nu kho, bhante, lokassa dhammaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjanti ahitaaya dukkhaaya aphaasuvihaaraayaa''ti? ``tayo kho, mahaaraaja, lokassa dhammaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjanti ahitaaya dukkhaaya aphaasuvihaaraaya. katame tayo? lobho kho, mahaaraaja, lokassa dhammo, uppajjamaano uppajjati ahitaaya dukkhaaya aphaasuvihaaraaya. doso ^a^T1.0143^ea^ kho, mahaaraaja, lokassa dhammo, uppajjamaano uppajjati ahitaaya dukkhaaya aphaasuvihaaraaya. moho kho, mahaaraaja, lokassa dhammo, uppajjamaano uppajjati ahitaaya dukkhaaya aphaasuvihaaraaya. ime kho, mahaaraaja, tayo lokassa dhammaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjanti ahitaaya dukkhaaya aphaasuvihaaraayaa''ti. idamavoca...pe0...
[21] ``lobho ^a^M1.0099^ea^ doso ca moho ca, purisa.m paapacetasa.m.

[03] 135^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ekamanta.m nisinno kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kattha nu kho, bhante, daana.m daatabba''nti? ``yattha kho, mahaaraaja, citta.m pasiidatii''ti. ``kattha pana, bhante, dinna.m mahapphala''nti? ``a~n~na.m kho eta.m, mahaaraaja, kattha daana.m daatabba.m, a~n~na.m paneta.m kattha dinna.m mahapphalanti? siilavato kho, mahaaraaja, dinna.m mahapphala.m, no tathaa dussiile. tena hi, mahaaraaja, ta~n~nevettha pa.tipucchissaami. yathaa, te khameyya, tathaa na.m byaakareyyaasi. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, idha tyassa yuddha.m paccupa.t.thita.m sa"ngaamo samupabyuu.lho {samuupabbuu.lho (sii0), samupabbu.lho (pii0)}. atha aagaccheyya khattiyakumaaro asikkhito akatahattho akatayoggo akatuupaasano ^a^P1.0099^ea^ bhiiru chambhii utraasii palaayii. bhareyyaasi ta.m purisa.m, attho ca te taadisena purisenaa''ti? ``naaha.m, bhante, bhareyya.m ta.m purisa.m, na ca me attho taadisena purisenaa''ti. ``atha aagaccheyya braahma.nakumaaro asikkhito...pe0... atha aagaccheyya vessakumaaro asikkhito...pe0... atha aagaccheyya suddakumaaro asikkhito...pe0... na ca me attho taadisena purisenaa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, idha tyassa yuddha.m paccupa.t.thita.m sa"ngaamo samupabyuu.lho. atha aagaccheyya ^a^V1.0118^ea^ khattiyakumaaro susikkhito katahattho katayoggo katuupaasano abhiiru acchambhii anutraasii apalaayii. bhareyyaasi ta.m purisa.m, attho ca te taadisena purisenaa''ti? ``bhareyyaaha.m, bhante ^a^T1.0144^ea^, ta.m purisa.m, attho ca me taadisena purisenaa''ti. ``atha aagaccheyya braahma.nakumaaro...pe0... atha aagaccheyya vessakumaaro...pe0... atha aagaccheyya suddakumaaro susikkhito katahattho katayoggo katuupaasano abhiiru acchambhii anutraasii apalaayii. bhareyyaasi ta.m purisa.m, attho ca te taadisena purisenaa''ti? ``bhareyyaaha.m, bhante, ta.m purisa.m, attho ca me taadisena purisenaa''ti.

[03] ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yasmaa kasmaa cepi {yasmaa cepi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} kulaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti, so ca hoti pa~nca"ngavippahiino pa~nca"ngasamannaagato, tasmi.m ^a^M1.0100^ea^ dinna.m mahapphala.m hoti. katamaani pa~nca"ngaani pahiinaani honti? kaamacchando pahiino hoti, byaapaado pahiino hoti, thinamiddha.m pahiina.m hoti, uddhaccakukkucca.m pahiina.m hoti, vicikicchaa pahiinaa hoti. imaani pa~nca"ngaani pahiinaani honti. katamehi pa~ncaha"ngehi ^a^T1.0145^ea^ samannaagato hoti? asekkhena siilakkhandhena samannaagato hoti, asekkhena samaadhikkhandhena samannaagato hoti, asekkhena pa~n~naakkhandhena samannaagato ^a^P1.0100^ea^ hoti, asekkhena vimuttikkhandhena samannaagato hoti, asekkhena vimutti~naa.nadassanakkhandhena samannaagato hoti. imehi pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato hoti. iti pa~nca"ngavippahiine pa~nca"ngasamannaagate dinna.m mahapphala''nti. idamavoca bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa --
[21] ``issatta.m {issattha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} balaviiriya~nca {balaviriya~nca (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, yasmi.m vijjetha maa.nave.
[22] ta.m yuddhattho bhare raajaa, naasuura.m jaatipaccayaa..
[22] papa~nca vivane kayiraa, dugge sa"nkamanaani ca..
[27] ta.m ^a^T1.0146^ea^ hissa gajjita.m hoti, devasseva pavassato.

[03] 136^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M1.0101^ea^. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``handa, kuto nu tva.m, mahaaraaja, aagacchasi divaa divassaa''ti? ``yaani taani, bhante, ra~n~na.m khattiyaana.m muddhaavasittaana.m issariyamadamattaana.m kaamagedhapariyu.t.thitaana.m janapadatthaavariyappattaana.m mahanta.m pathavima.n.dala.m abhivijiya ajjhaavasantaana.m raajakara.niiyaani bhavanti, tesu khvaaha.m, etarahi ussukkamaapanno''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, idha te puriso aagaccheyya ^a^P1.0101^ea^ puratthimaaya disaaya saddhaayiko paccayiko. so ta.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `yagghe, mahaaraaja, jaaneyyaasi, aha.m aagacchaami puratthimaaya disaaya. tatthaddasa.m mahanta.m pabbata.m abbhasama.m sabbe paa.ne nippothento aagacchati. ya.m te, mahaaraaja, kara.niiya.m, ta.m karohii'ti. atha dutiyo puriso aagaccheyya pacchimaaya disaaya...pe0... atha tatiyo puriso aagaccheyya uttaraaya disaaya...pe0... atha catuttho puriso aagaccheyya dakkhi.naaya disaaya saddhaayiko paccayiko. so ta.m ^a^T1.0147^ea^ upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `yagghe mahaaraaja, jaaneyyaasi, aha.m aagacchaami ^a^V1.0120^ea^ dakkhi.naaya disaaya. tatthaddasa.m mahanta.m pabbata.m abbhasama.m sabbe paa.ne nippothento aagacchati. ya.m te, mahaaraaja, kara.niiya.m ta.m karohii'ti. evaruupe te, mahaaraaja, mahati mahabbhaye samuppanne daaru.ne manussakkhaye {manussakaaye (ka0)} dullabhe manussatte kimassa kara.niiya''nti?

[03] ``evaruupe me, bhante, mahati mahabbhaye samuppanne daaru.ne manussakkhaye dullabhe manussatte kimassa kara.niiya.m a~n~natra dhammacariyaaya a~n~natra samacariyaaya a~n~natra kusalakiriyaaya a~n~natra pu~n~nakiriyaayaa''ti?

[03] ``aarocemi kho te, mahaaraaja, pa.tivedemi kho te, mahaaraaja, adhivattati kho ta.m, mahaaraaja, jaraamara.na.m. adhivattamaane ce te, mahaaraaja, jaraamara.ne kimassa kara.niiya''nti? ``adhivattamaane ca me, bhante, jaraamara.ne kimassa kara.niiya.m a~n~natra dhammacariyaaya samacariyaaya kusalakiriyaaya pu~n~nakiriyaaya? yaani taani, bhante, ra~n~na.m khattiyaana.m muddhaavasittaana.m issariyamadamattaana.m ^a^M1.0102^ea^ kaamagedhapariyu.t.thitaana.m janapadatthaavariyappattaana.m mahanta.m pathavima.n.dala.m abhivijiya ajjhaavasantaana.m hatthiyuddhaani bhavanti; tesampi, bhante, hatthiyuddhaana.m natthi gati natthi visayo adhivattamaane jaraamara.ne. yaanipi taani, bhante, ra~n~na.m khattiyaana.m muddhaavasittaana.m...pe0... ajjhaavasantaana.m assayuddhaani bhavanti...pe0... rathayuddhaani bhavanti ^a^T1.0148^ea^ ...pe0... pattiyuddhaani bhavanti; tesampi ^a^P1.0102^ea^, bhante, pattiyuddhaana.m natthi gati natthi visayo adhivattamaane jaraamara.ne. santi kho pana, bhante, imasmi.m raajakule mantino mahaamattaa, ye pahonti {yesa.m honti (ka0)} aagate paccatthike mantehi bhedayitu.m. tesampi, bhante, mantayuddhaana.m natthi gati natthi visayo adhivattamaane jaraamara.ne. sa.mvijjati kho pana, bhante, imasmi.m raajakule pahuuta.m hira~n~nasuva.n.na.m bhuumigata~nceva vehaasa.t.tha~nca, yena maya.m pahoma aagate paccatthike dhanena upalaapetu.m. tesampi, bhante, dhanayuddhaana.m natthi gati natthi visayo adhivattamaane jaraamara.ne. adhivattamaane ca me, bhante, jaraamara.ne kimassa kara.niiya.m a~n~natra dhammacariyaaya samacariyaaya kusalakiriyaaya pu~n~nakiriyaayaa''ti?

[03] ``evameta.m, mahaaraaja, evameta.m, mahaaraaja! adhivattamaane jaraamara.ne kimassa kara.niiya.m a~n~natra dhammacariyaaya samacariyaaya kusalakiriyaaya pu~n~nakiriyaayaa''ti? idamavoca bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa --
[21] ``eva.m jaraa ca maccu ca, adhivattanti paa.nine {paa.nino (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}.
[21] ``na tattha hatthiina.m bhuumi, na rathaana.m na pattiyaa.
[22] na caapi mantayuddhena, sakkaa jetu.m dhanena vaa..
[22] buddhe dhamme ca sa"nghe ca, dhiiro saddha.m nivesaye..
[21] ``yo ^a^M1.0103^ea^ dhamma.m cari {dhammacaarii (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} kaayena, vaacaaya uda cetasaa.
[22] idheva na.m pasa.msanti, pecca sagge pamodatii''ti..
[21] puggalo ayyikaa loko, issatta.m {issattha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} pabbatuupamaa.

[03] 137^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0150^ea^ ^a^V1.0122^ea^ ^a^P1.0103^ea^ ^a^M1.0104^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa uruvelaaya.m viharati najjaa nera~njaraaya tiire ajapaalanigrodhamuule pa.thamaabhisambuddho. atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``mutto vatamhi taaya dukkarakaarikaaya. saadhu mutto vatamhi taaya anatthasa.mhitaaya dukkarakaarikaaya. saadhu vatamhi mutto bodhi.m samajjhaga''nti {saadhu .thito sato bodhi.m samajjheganti (sii0 pii0), saadhu vatamhi satto bodhisamajjhaguuti (syaa0 ka.m0)}.
[03] atha kho maaro paapimaa bhagavato cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[22] asuddho ma~n~nasi suddho, suddhimaggaa aparaddho'' {suddhimaggamaparaddho (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} ti..
[01] atha kho bhagavaa ``maaro aya.m paapimaa'' iti viditvaa maara.m paapimanta.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --

[22] sabba.m natthaavaha.m hoti, phiyaaritta.mva dhammani {vammani (sii0), dhammani.m (pii0), jammani.m (ka0) etthaaya.m dhammasaddo sakkate dhanvana.m-saddena sadiso maruvaacakoti veditabbo, yathaa da.lhadhammaatipada.m}..
[22] pattosmi parama.m suddhi.m, nihato tvamasi antakaa''ti..
[03] atha ^a^V1.0123^ea^ kho maaro paapimaa ``jaanaati ma.m bhagavaa, jaanaati ma.m sugato''ti, dukkhii dummano tatthevantaradhaayiiti.

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0105^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa uruvelaaya.m viharati najjaa nera~njaraaya tiire ajapaalanigrodhamuule pa.thamaabhisambuddho ^a^P1.0104^ea^. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya.m abbhokaase nisinno hoti, devo ca ekameka.m phusaayati. atha kho maaro paapimaa bhagavato bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.msa.m uppaadetukaamo mahanta.m hatthiraajava.n.na.m abhinimminitvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami. seyyathaapi naama mahaaari.t.thako ma.ni, evamassa siisa.m hoti. seyyathaapi naama suddha.m ruupiya.m, evamassa dantaa honti. seyyathaapi naama mahatii na"ngaliisaa {na"ngalasiisaa (pii0 ka0)}, evamassa so.n.do hoti. atha kho bhagavaa ``maaro aya.m paapimaa'' iti viditvaa maara.m paapimanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[22] ala.m te tena paapima, nihato tvamasi antakaa''ti..
[03] atha ^a^T1.0152^ea^ kho maaro paapimaa ``jaanaati ma.m bhagavaa, jaanaati ma.m sugato''ti dukkhii dummano tatthevantaradhaayiiti.

[03] 139^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa uruvelaaya.m viharati najjaa nera~njaraaya tiire ajapaalanigrodhamuule pa.thamaabhisambuddho. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya.m abbhokaase nisinno hoti, devo ca ekameka.m phusaayati. atha kho maaro paapimaa, bhagavato bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.msa.m uppaadetukaamo, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato aviduure uccaavacaa va.n.nanibhaa upada.mseti, subhaa ceva asubhaa ca. atha kho bhagavaa ``maaro aya.m paapimaa'' iti viditvaa maara.m paapimanta.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[22] ala.m te tena paapima, nihato tvamasi antaka..
[21] ``ye ^a^M1.0106^ea^ ca kaayena vaacaaya, manasaa ca susa.mvutaa.
[22] na te maaravasaanugaa, na te maarassa baddhaguu'' {baddhabhuu (ka0), paccaguu (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} ti..

[03] 140^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^P1.0105^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa baaraa.nasiya.m viharati isipatane migadaaye. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti ^a^T1.0153^ea^ te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``mayha.m kho, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikaaraa yoniso sammappadhaanaa anuttaraa vimutti anuppattaa, anuttaraa vimutti sacchikataa. tumhepi, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikaaraa yoniso sammappadhaanaa anuttara.m vimutti.m anupaapu.naatha, anuttara.m vimutti.m sacchikarothaa''ti. atha kho maaro paapimaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``baddhosi maarapaasena, ye dibbaa ye ca maanusaa.
[21] ``muttaaha.m {muttoha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} maarapaasena, ye dibbaa ye ca maanusaa.

[03] 141^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V1.0125^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa baaraa.nasiya.m viharati isipatane migadaaye. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``muttaaha.m, bhikkhave, sabbapaasehi ye dibbaa ye ca maanusaa. tumhepi, bhikkhave, muttaa sabbapaasehi ye dibbaa ye ca maanusaa. caratha, bhikkhave, caarika.m bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya ^a^T1.0154^ea^ sukhaaya devamanussaana.m. maa ekena dve agamittha. desetha, bhikkhave, dhamma.m aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m ^a^M1.0107^ea^ kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasetha. santi sattaa apparajakkhajaatikaa, assavanataa dhammassa ^a^P1.0106^ea^ parihaayanti. bhavissanti dhammassa a~n~naataaro. ahampi, bhikkhave, yena uruvelaa senaanigamo tenupasa"nkamissaami dhammadesanaayaa''ti. atha kho maaro paapimaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``baddhosi sabbapaasehi, ye dibbaa ye ca maanusaa.
[21] ``muttaaha.m sabbapaasehi, ye dibbaa ye ca maanusaa.

[03] 142^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya.m abbhokaase nisinno hoti, devo ca ekameka.m phusaayati.

[03] atha ^a^T1.0155^ea^ ^a^V1.0126^ea^ kho maaro paapimaa bhagavato bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.msa.m uppaadetukaamo mahanta.m sapparaajava.n.na.m abhinimminitvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami. seyyathaapi naama mahatii ekarukkhikaa naavaa, evamassa kaayo hoti. seyyathaapi naama mahanta.m so.n.dikaaki.la~nja.m, evamassa pha.no hoti. seyyathaapi naama mahatii kosalikaa ka.msapaati, evamassa akkhiini bhavanti. seyyathaapi naama deve ga.laga.laayante vijjullataa niccharanti, evamassa mukhato jivhaa niccharati. seyyathaapi naama kammaaragaggariyaa dhamamaanaaya saddo hoti, evamassa assaasapassaasaana.m saddo hoti.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa ``maaro aya.m paapimaa'' iti viditvaa maara.m paapimanta.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[27] atho .da.msasariisapaa {.da.msa siri.msapaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bahuu.
[03] atha kho maaro paapimaa ``jaanaati ma.m bhagavaa, jaanaati ma.m sugato''ti dukkhii dummano tatthevantaradhaayiiti.

[03] 143^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V1.0127^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho bhagavaa bahudevaratti.m abbhokaase ca"nkamitvaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paade pakkhaaletvaa vihaara.m pavisitvaa dakkhi.nena passena siihaseyya.m kappesi paade paada.m accaadhaaya sato sampajaano u.t.thaanasa~n~na.m manasi karitvaa. atha kho maaro paapimaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[27] kimida.m soppasi dubbhago {dubbhato (syaa0 ka.m0), dubbhayo (pii0)} viya.

[03] 144^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0109^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho maaro paapimaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``nandati puttehi puttimaa, gomaa gobhi tatheva nandati.
[22] upadhiihi ^a^P1.0108^ea^ narassa nandanaa, na hi so nandati yo niruupadhii''ti..
[21] ``socati ^a^V1.0128^ea^ puttehi puttimaa, gomaa gobhi tatheva socati.
[22] upadhiihi narassa socanaa, na hi so socati yo niruupadhii''ti..
[03] atha kho maaro paapimaa ``jaanaati ma.m bhagavaa, jaanaati ma.m sugato''ti dukkhii dummano tatthevantaradhaayiiti.

[03] atha kho maaro paapimaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[03] 146^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V1.0129^ea^ ^a^M1.0110^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tatra kho bhagavaa...pe0... etadavoca --

[22] pa.timallo hi te atthi, vijitaavii nu ma~n~nasii''ti..

[27] atthaa nu te sampacuraa na santi.
[03] atha ^a^T1.0163^ea^ kho maaro paapimaa ``jaanaati ma.m bhagavaa, jaanaati ma.m sugato''ti dukkhii dummano tatthevantaradhaayiiti.
[03] 150^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu viharati ekasaalaaya.m braahma.nagaame. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa mahatiyaa gihiparisaaya parivuto dhamma.m deseti.

[22] tena ta.m baadhayissaami, na me sama.na mokkhasii''ti..

[03] 152^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^P1.0112^ea^. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m upaadaaya bhikkhuuna.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandasseti samaadapeti {samaadaapeti (?)} samuttejeti sampaha.mseti. te ca bhikkhuu a.t.thi.m katvaa {a.t.thikatvaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} manasi ^a^M1.0114^ea^ katvaa sabbacetasaa {sabbacetaso (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), sabba.m cetasaa (ka0)} samannaaharitvaa ohitasotaa dhamma.m su.nanti.

[03] atha kho maarassa paapimato etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho sama.no gotamo pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m upaadaaya bhikkhuuna.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandasseti samaadapeti samuttejeti sampaha.mseti. te ca bhikkhuu a.t.thi.m katvaa manasi katvaa sabbacetasaa samannaaharitvaa ohitasotaa ^a^V1.0134^ea^ dhamma.m su.nanti. ya.mnuunaaha.m yena sama.no gotamo tenupasa"nkameyya.m vicakkhukammaayaa''ti.

[03] tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa pattaa abbhokaase nikkhittaa honti. atha ^a^T1.0165^ea^ kho maaro paapimaa baliibaddava.n.na.m abhinimminitvaa yena te pattaa tenupasa"nkami. atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``bhikkhu, bhikkhu, eso baliibaddo patte bhindeyyaa''ti. eva.m vutte bhagavaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``na so, bhikkhu, baliibaddo. maaro eso paapimaa tumhaaka.m vicakkhukammaaya aagato''ti. atha kho bhagavaa ``maaro aya.m paapimaa'' iti viditvaa maara.m paapimanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[22] nesohamasmi neta.m me, eva.m tattha virajjati..

[03] 153^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tena ^a^P1.0113^ea^ kho pana samayena bhagavaa channa.m phassaayatanaana.m upaadaaya bhikkhuuna.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandasseti samaadapeti samuttejeti sampaha.mseti. te ca bhikkhuu a.t.thi.m katvaa manasi katvaa sabbacetasaa samannaaharitvaa ohitasotaa dhamma.m su.nanti.

[03] atha ^a^M1.0115^ea^ kho maarassa paapimato etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho sama.no gotamo channa.m phassaayatanaana.m upaadaaya bhikkhuuna.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandasseti samaadapeti samuttejeti sappaha.mseti ^a^T1.0166^ea^. te ca bhikkhuu a.t.thi.m katvaa manasi katvaa sabbacetasaa samannaaharitvaa ohitasotaa ^a^V1.0135^ea^ dhamma.m su.nanti. ya.mnuunaaha.m yena sama.no gotamo tenupasa"nkameyya.m vicakkhukammaayaa''ti. atha kho maaro paapimaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato aviduure mahanta.m bhayabherava.m saddamakaasi, apissuda.m pathavii ma~n~ne undriiyati {udriiyati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii) u + dara + ya + ti = udriiyati}. atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``bhikkhu, bhikkhu, esaa pathavii ma~n~ne undriiyatii''ti. eva.m vutte, bhagavaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``nesaa bhikkhu pathavii undriiyati. maaro eso paapimaa tumhaaka.m vicakkhukammaaya aagato''ti. atha kho bhagavaa ``maaro aya.m paapimaa'' iti viditvaa maara.m paapimanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``ruupaa saddaa rasaa gandhaa, phassaa dhammaa ca kevalaa.
[22] eta.m lokaamisa.m ghora.m, ettha loko vimucchito..

[03] 154^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa magadhesu viharati pa~ncasaalaaya.m braahma.nagaame. tena ^a^P1.0114^ea^ kho pana samayena pa~ncasaalaaya.m braahma.nagaame kumaarikaana.m ^a^T1.0167^ea^ paahunakaani bhavanti. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya pa~ncasaala.m braahma.nagaama.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. tena kho pana samayena pa~ncasaaleyyakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa maarena paapimataa anvaavi.t.thaa bhavanti -- maa sama.no gotamo pi.n.damalatthaati.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa yathaadhotena pattena pa~ncasaala.m braahma.nagaama.m pi.n.daaya paavisi tathaadhotena {yathaadhotena (?)} pattena pa.tikkami. atha kho maaro paapimaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``api ^a^M1.0116^ea^ tva.m, sama.na, pi.n.damalatthaa''ti? ``tathaa nu tva.m, paapima, akaasi yathaaha.m pi.n.da.m ^a^V1.0136^ea^ na labheyya''nti. ``tena hi, bhante, bhagavaa dutiyampi pa~ncasaala.m braahma.nagaama.m pi.n.daaya pavisatu. tathaaha.m karissaami yathaa bhagavaa pi.n.da.m lacchatii''ti.
[22] ki.m nu ma~n~nasi paapima, na me paapa.m vipaccati..
[21] ``susukha.m vata jiivaama, yesa.m no natthi ki~ncana.m.
[03] atha kho maaro paapimaa ``jaanaati ma.m bhagavaa, jaanaati ma.m sugato''ti dukkhii dummano tatthevantaradhaayiiti.

[03] 155^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa bhikkhuuna.m nibbaanapa.tisa.myuttaaya dhammiyaa kathaaya sandasseti samaadapeti samuttejeti sampaha.mseti ^a^T1.0168^ea^. te ca bhikkhuu a.t.thi.m katvaa manasi katvaa sabbacetasaa samannaaharitvaa ohitasotaa dhamma.m su.nanti.

[03] atha ^a^P1.0115^ea^ kho maarassa paapimato etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho sama.no gotamo bhikkhuuna.m nibbaanapa.tisa.myuttaaya dhammiyaa kathaaya...pe0... ya.mnuunaaha.m yena sama.no gotamo tenupasa"nkameyya.m vicakkhukammaayaa''ti. atha kho maaro paapimaa kassakava.n.na.m abhinimminitvaa mahanta.m na"ngala.m khandhe karitvaa diighapaacanaya.t.thi.m gahetvaa ha.taha.takeso saa.nasaa.tinivattho kaddamamakkhitehi paadehi yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``api, sama.na, baliibadde addasaa''ti? ``ki.m pana, paapima, te baliibaddehii''ti? ``mameva, sama.na, cakkhu, mama ruupaa, mama cakkhusamphassavi~n~naa.naayatana.m. kuhi.m me, sama.na, gantvaa mokkhasi? mameva, sama.na, sota.m, mama saddaa...pe0... mameva, sama.na, ghaana.m, mama gandhaa; mameva, sama.na, jivhaa, mama rasaa; mameva, sama.na, kaayo, mama pho.t.thabbaa; mameva, sama.na, mano, mama dhammaa, mama manosamphassavi~n~naa.naayatana.m. kuhi.m me, sama.na, gantvaa mokkhasii''ti?

[03] ``taveva ^a^V1.0137^ea^ ^a^M1.0117^ea^, paapima, cakkhu, tava ruupaa, tava cakkhusamphassavi~n~naa.naayatana.m. yattha ca kho, paapima, natthi cakkhu, natthi ruupaa, natthi cakkhusamphassavi~n~naa.naayatana.m, agati tava tattha, paapima. taveva, paapima ^a^T1.0169^ea^, sota.m, tava saddaa, tava sotasamphassavi~n~naa.naayatana.m. yattha ca kho, paapima, natthi sota.m, natthi saddaa, natthi sotasamphassavi~n~naa.naayatana.m, agati tava tattha, paapima. taveva ^a^P1.0116^ea^, paapima, ghaana.m, tava gandhaa, tava ghaanasamphassavi~n~naa.naayatana.m. yattha ca kho, paapima, natthi ghaana.m, natthi gandhaa, natthi ghaanasamphassavi~n~naa.naayatana.m, agati tava tattha, paapima. taveva, paapima, jivhaa, tava rasaa, tava jivhaasamphassavi~n~naa.naayatana.m...pe0... taveva, paapima, kaayo, tava pho.t.thabbaa, tava kaayasamphassavi~n~naa.naayatana.m...pe0... taveva, paapima, mano, tava dhammaa, tava manosamphassavi~n~naa.naayatana.m. yattha ca kho, paapima, natthi mano, natthi dhammaa, natthi manosamphassavi~n~naa.naayatana.m, agati tava tattha, paapimaa''ti.
[21] ``ya.m vadanti mama yidanti, ye vadanti mamanti ca.
[22] ettha ce te mano atthi, na me sama.na mokkhasii''ti..
[21] ``ya.m vadanti na ta.m mayha.m, ye vadanti na te aha.m.
[22] eva.m paapima jaanaahi, na me maggampi dakkhasii''ti..

[03] 156^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu viharati himavantapadese {himavantapasse (sii0)} ara~n~naku.tikaaya.m. atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso ^a^T1.0170^ea^ parivitakko udapaadi -- ``sakkaa nu kho rajja.m kaaretu.m ahana.m aghaataya.m ajina.m ajaapaya.m asoca.m asocaapaya.m dhammenaa''ti?

[03] atha kho maaro paapimaa bhagavato cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kaaretu, bhante, bhagavaa rajja.m, kaaretu, sugato, rajja.m ahana.m aghaataya.m ajina.m ajaapaya.m asoca.m asocaapaya.m dhammenaa''ti. ``ki.m pana me tva.m, paapima, passasi ya.m ma.m tva.m eva.m vadesi -- `kaaretu, bhante, bhagavaa rajja.m, kaaretu sugato ^a^V1.0138^ea^, rajja.m ahana.m aghaataya.m ajina.m ajaapaya.m asoca.m asocaapaya.m ^a^M1.0118^ea^ dhammenaa'''ti? ``bhagavataa kho, bhante, cattaaro iddhipaadaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa. aaka"nkhamaano ca, bhante, bhagavaa himavanta.m pabbataraaja.m suva.n.na.m tveva adhimucceyya suva.n.na~nca panassaa''ti {suva.n.napabbatassaati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0), suva.n.na~nca pabbatassaati (pii0)}.
[03] atha kho ^a^T1.0171^ea^ maaro paapimaa ``jaanaati ma.m bhagavaa, jaanaati ma.m sugato''ti dukkhii dummano tatthevantaradhaayiiti.
[27] patta.m aayatana.m pi.n.da.m, kassaka.m rajjena te dasaati..

[03] 157^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0172^ea^ ^a^V1.0139^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati silaavatiya.m. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu bhagavato aviduure appamattaa aataapino pahitattaa viharanti. atha kho maaro paapimaa braahma.nava.n.na.m abhinimminitvaa mahantena ja.ta.n.duvena ajinakkhipanivattho ji.n.no gopaanasiva"nko ghurughurupassaasii udumbarada.n.da.m gahetvaa yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``daharaa bhavanto ^a^M1.0119^ea^ pabbajitaa susuu kaa.lakesaa bhadrena yobbanena samannaagataa pa.thamena vayasaa anikkii.litaavino kaamesu. bhu~njantu bhavanto maanusake kaame. maa sandi.t.thika.m hitvaa kaalika.m anudhaavitthaa''ti. ``na kho maya.m, braahma.na, sandi.t.thika.m hitvaa kaalika.m anudhaavaama. kaalika~nca kho maya.m, braahma.na, hitvaa sandi.t.thika.m anudhaavaama. kaalikaa hi, braahma.na, kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. sandi.t.thiko aya.m dhammo akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii''ti. eva.m ^a^P1.0118^ea^ vutte, maaro paapimaa siisa.m okampetvaa jivha.m nillaaletvaa tivisaakha.m nalaa.te nalaa.tika.m vu.t.thaapetvaa da.n.damolubbha pakkaami.

[01] atha ^a^T1.0173^ea^ kho te bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``idha maya.m, bhante, bhagavato aviduure appamattaa aataapino pahitattaa viharaama. atha kho, bhante, a~n~nataro braahma.no mahantena ja.ta.n.duvena ajinakkhipanivattho ji.n.no gopaanasiva"nko ghurughurupassaasii udumbarada.n.da.m gahetvaa yena maya.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa amhe etadavoca -- `daharaa bhavanto pabbajitaa susuu kaa.lakesaa bhadrena yobbanena samannaagataa pa.thamena vayasaa anikkii.litaavino kaamesu. bhu~njantu bhavanto maanusake kaame. maa sandi.t.thika.m hitvaa kaalika.m anudhaavitthaa'ti. eva.m vutte, maya.m, bhante, ta.m braahma.na.m etadavocumha -- `na kho maya.m, braahma.na, sandi.t.thika.m hitvaa kaalika.m anudhaavaama. kaalika~nca kho maya.m, braahma.na, hitvaa sandi.t.thika.m anudhaavaama. kaalikaa hi, braahma.na, kaamaa ^a^V1.0140^ea^ vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. sandi.t.thiko aya.m dhammo akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii'ti. eva.m vutte, bhante, so braahma.no siisa.m okampetvaa jivha.m nillaaletvaa tivisaakha.m nalaa.te nalaa.tika.m vu.t.thaapetvaa da.n.damolubbha pakkanto''ti.
[03] ``neso, bhikkhave, braahma.no. maaro eso paapimaa tumhaaka.m vicakkhukammaaya aagato''ti. atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa ^a^T1.0174^ea^ taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --

[03] 158^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^P1.0119^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati silaavatiya.m. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa samiddhi bhagavato aviduure appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharati. atha kho aayasmato samiddhissa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``laabhaa vata me, suladdha.m vata me, yassa me satthaa araha.m sammaasambuddho. laabhaa vata me, suladdha.m vata me, yvaaha.m eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye pabbajito. laabhaa vata me, suladdha.m vata me, yassa me sabrahmacaarino siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa''ti. atha kho maaro paapimaa aayasmato samiddhissa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya yenaayasmaa samiddhi tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmato samiddhissa aviduure mahanta.m bhayabherava.m saddamakaasi, apissuda.m pathavii ma~n~ne undriiyati.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa samiddhi yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno ^a^T1.0175^ea^ aayasmaa samiddhi bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idhaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato aviduure appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharaami. tassa mayha.m, bhante, rahogatassa ^a^V1.0141^ea^ pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `laabhaa vata me, suladdha.m vata me, yassa me satthaa araha.m sammaasambuddho. laabhaa vata me, suladdha.m vata me, yvaaha.m eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye pabbajito. laabhaa vata me, suladdha.m vata me, yassa me sabrahmacaarino siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa'ti. tassa mayha.m, bhante, aviduure mahaabhayabheravasaddo ahosi, apissuda.m pathavii ma~n~ne undriiyatii''ti.

[03] ``nesaa, samiddhi, pathavii undriiyati. maaro eso paapimaa tuyha.m vicakkhukammaaya aagato. gaccha tva.m, samiddhi, tattheva appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharaahii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa samiddhi bhagavato pa.tissutvaa ^a^M1.0121^ea^ ^a^P1.0120^ea^ u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. dutiyampi kho aayasmaa samiddhi tattheva appamatto aataapii pahitatto vihaasi. dutiyampi kho aayasmato samiddhissa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa...pe0... dutiyampi kho maaro paapimaa aayasmato samiddhissa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya...pe0... apissuda.m pathavii ma~n~ne undriiyati. atha kho aayasmaa samiddhi maara.m ^a^T1.0176^ea^ paapimanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[27] sati pa~n~naa ca me buddhaa, citta~nca susamaahita.m.
[22] kaama.m karassu ruupaani, neva ma.m byaadhayissasii''ti..
[03] atha kho maaro paapimaa ``jaanaati ma.m samiddhi bhikkhuu''ti dukkhii dummano tatthevantaradhaayiiti.
