[03] 159^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa godhiko isigilipasse viharati kaa.lasilaaya.m. atha kho aayasmaa godhiko appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto saamayika.m cetovimutti.m phusi. atha kho aayasmaa godhiko tamhaa saamayikaaya cetovimuttiyaa parihaayi ^a^V1.0142^ea^. dutiyampi kho aayasmaa godhiko appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto saamayika.m cetovimutti.m phusi. dutiyampi kho aayasmaa godhiko tamhaa saamayikaaya cetovimuttiyaa parihaayi. tatiyampi kho aayasmaa godhiko appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto saamayika.m cetovimutti.m phusi. tatiyampi kho aayasmaa godhiko tamhaa...pe0... parihaayi. catutthampi kho aayasmaa godhiko appamatto...pe0... vimutti.m phusi ^a^T1.0177^ea^. catutthampi kho aayasmaa godhiko tamhaa...pe0... parihaayi. pa~ncamampi ^a^P1.0121^ea^ kho aayasmaa godhiko...pe0... cetovimutti.m phusi. pa~ncamampi kho aayasmaa...pe0... vimuttiyaa parihaayi. cha.t.thampi kho aayasmaa godhiko appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto saamayika.m cetovimutti.m phusi. cha.t.thampi kho aayasmaa godhiko tamhaa saamayikaaya cetovimuttiyaa parihaayi. sattamampi ^a^M1.0122^ea^ kho aayasmaa godhiko appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto saamayika.m cetovimutti.m phusi.

[03] atha kho aayasmato godhikassa etadahosi -- ``yaava cha.t.tha.m khvaaha.m saamayikaaya cetovimuttiyaa parihiino. ya.mnuunaaha.m sattha.m aahareyya''nti. atha kho maaro paapimaa aayasmato godhikassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[03] tena kho pana samayena aayasmato godhikena sattha.m aaharita.m hoti. atha kho bhagavaa ``maaro aya.m paapimaa'' iti viditvaa maara.m ^a^T1.0178^ea^ paapimanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --

[03] atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aayaama, bhikkhave, yena isigilipassa.m kaa.lasilaa tenupasa"nkamissaama yattha godhikena kulaputtena sattha.m aaharita''nti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa sambahulehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m yena isigilipassa.m kaa.lasilaa tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m godhika.m duuratova ma~ncake vivattakkhandha.m semaana.m {seyyamaana.m (syaa0 ka.m0), soppamaana.m (ka0)}. tena ^a^P1.0122^ea^ kho pana samayena dhuumaayitatta.m timiraayitatta.m gacchateva purima.m disa.m, gacchati pacchima.m disa.m, gacchati uttara.m disa.m, gacchati dakkhi.na.m disa.m, gacchati uddha.m, gacchati adho, gacchati anudisa.m.

[03] atha ^a^M1.0123^ea^ kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, eta.m dhuumaayitatta.m timiraayitatta.m gacchateva purima.m disa.m, gacchati pacchima.m disa.m, gacchati uttara.m disa.m, gacchati dakkhi.na.m disa.m, gacchati uddha.m, gacchati adho, gacchati anudisa''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``eso kho, bhikkhave, maaro paapimaa godhikassa kulaputtassa vi~n~naa.na.m samanvesati -- `kattha godhikassa kulaputtassa vi~n~naa.na.m pati.t.thita'nti? appati.t.thitena ca, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.nena godhiko kulaputto parinibbuto''ti. atha ^a^T1.0179^ea^ kho maaro paapimaa beluvapa.n.duvii.na.m aadaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``uddha.m adho ca tiriya.m, disaa anudisaa svaha.m.
[22] anvesa.m naadhigacchaami, godhiko so kuhi.m gato''ti..
[21] ``yo {so (sii0 pii0)} dhiiro dhitisampanno, jhaayii jhaanarato sadaa.
[22] tato so dummano yakkho, tatthevantaradhaayathaa''ti {tatthevantaradhaayithaati (syaa0 ka.m0), tattheva antaradhaayiiti (ka0)}..

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa uruvelaaya.m viharati najjaa nera~njaraaya tiire ajapaalanigrodhe. tena kho pana samayena maaro paapimaa sattavassaani bhagavanta.m anubandho hoti otaaraapekkho otaara.m alabhamaano. atha kho maaro paapimaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``ya.m vadanti mama yidanti, ye vadanti mamanti ca.
[22] ettha ce te mano atthi, na me sama.na mokkhasii''ti..
[21] ``ya.m ^a^V1.0145^ea^ vadanti na ta.m mayha.m, ye vadanti na te aha.m.
[22] eva.m paapima jaanaahi, na me maggampi dakkhasii''ti..
[22] tesaaha.m pu.t.tho akkhaami, ya.m sacca.m ta.m niruupadhi''nti..

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhante, gaamassa vaa nigamassa vaa aviduure pokkhara.nii. tatrassa kakka.tako. atha kho, bhante, sambahulaa kumaarakaa vaa kumaarikaayo vaa tamhaa gaamaa vaa nigamaa vaa nikkhamitvaa yena saa pokkhara.nii tenupasa"nkameyyu.m; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m kakka.taka.m udakaa uddharitvaa thale pati.t.thapeyyu.m. ya.m yadeva hi so, bhante, kakka.tako a.la.m abhininnaameyya ta.m tadeva te kumaarakaa vaa ^a^T1.0181^ea^ kumaarikaayo vaa ka.t.thena vaa kathalaaya vaa sa~nchindeyyu.m sambha~njeyyu.m sampalibha~njeyyu.m. eva~nhi so, bhante, kakka.tako sabbehi a.lehi sa~nchinnehi sambhaggehi sampalibhaggehi abhabbo ta.m pokkhara.ni.m otaritu.m. evameva kho, bhante, yaani kaanici visuukaayikaani {yaani visukaayikaani (sii0 pii0 ka0)} visevitaani vipphanditaani, sabbaani taani {kaanici kaanici sabbaani (sii0 pii0 ka0)} bhagavataa sa~nchinnaani sambhaggaani ^a^P1.0124^ea^ sampalibhaggaani. abhabbo daanaaha.m, bhante, puna bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitu.m yadida.m otaaraapekkho''ti. atha kho maaro paapimaa bhagavato santike imaa nibbejaniiyaa gaathaayo abhaasi --
[22] apettha mudu.m vindema, api assaadanaa siyaa..

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V1.0146^ea^ kho maaro paapimaa bhagavato santike imaa nibbejaniiyaa gaathaayo abhaasitvaa tamhaa .thaanaa apakkamma bhagavato aviduure pathaviya.m palla"nkena nisiidi tu.nhiibhuuto ma"nkubhuuto pattakkhandho adhomukho pajjhaayanto appa.tibhaano ka.t.thena bhuumi.m vilikhanto. atha kho ta.nhaa ca arati ca ragaa ca maaradhiitaro yena maaro paapimaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa maara.m paapimanta.m gaathaaya ^a^T1.0182^ea^ ajjhabhaasi.msu --
[21] ``kenaasi dummano taata, purisa.m ka.m nu socasi.

[03] atha kho ta.nhaa ca arati ca ragaa ca maaradhiitaro yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``paade te, sama.na, paricaaremaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa na manasaakaasi, yathaa ta.m anuttare upadhisa"nkhaye vimutto.

[03] atha kho ta.nhaa ca arati ca ragaa ca maaradhiitaro ekamanta.m apakkamma eva.m samacintesu.m -- ``uccaavacaa kho purisaana.m adhippaayaa. ya.mnuuna maya.m ekasata.m ekasata.m kumaariva.n.nasata.m abhinimmineyyaamaa''ti. atha ^a^P1.0125^ea^ kho ta.nhaa ca arati ca ragaa ca maaradhiitaro ekasata.m ekasata.m kumaariva.n.nasata.m abhinimminitvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``paade te, sama.na, paricaaremaa''ti. tampi bhagavaa na manasaakaasi, yathaa ta.m anuttare upadhisa"nkhaye vimutto.

[03] atha kho ta.nhaa ca arati ca ragaa ca maaradhiitaro ekamanta.m apakkamma eva.m samacintesu.m -- ``uccaavacaa kho purisaana.m adhippaayaa ^a^T1.0183^ea^. ya.mnuuna maya.m ekasata.m ekasata.m avijaatava.n.nasata.m abhinimmineyyaamaa''ti. atha kho ta.nhaa ca arati ca ragaa ca maaradhiitaro ekasata.m ekasata.m ^a^M1.0126^ea^ avijaatava.n.nasata.m ^a^V1.0147^ea^ abhinimminitvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``paade te, sama.na, paricaaremaa''ti. tampi bhagavaa na manasaakaasi, yathaa ta.m anuttare upadhisa"nkhaye vimutto.

[01] atha kho ta.nhaa ca...pe0... ya.mnuuna maya.m ekasata.m ekasata.m saki.m vijaatava.n.nasata.m abhinimmineyyaamaati. atha kho ta.nhaa ca...pe0... saki.m vijaatava.n.nasata.m abhinimminitvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``paade te, sama.na, paricaaremaa''ti. tampi bhagavaa na manasaakaasi, yathaa ta.m anuttare upadhisa"nkhaye vimutto.

[03] atha kho ta.nhaa ca...pe0... ya.mnuuna maya.m ekasata.m ekasata.m duvijaatava.n.nasata.m abhinimmineyyaamaati. atha kho ta.nhaa ca...pe0... duvijaatava.n.nasata.m abhinimminitvaa yena bhagavaa...pe0... yathaa ta.m anuttare upadhisa"nkhaye vimutto. atha kho ta.nhaa ca...pe0... majjhimitthiva.n.nasata.m abhinimmineyyaamaati. atha kho ta.nhaa ca...pe0... majjhimitthiva.n.nasata.m abhinimminitvaa...pe0... anuttare upadhisa"nkhaye vimutto.

[03] atha kho ta.nhaa ca...pe0... mahitthiva.n.nasata.m abhinimmineyyaamaati ^a^T1.0184^ea^. atha kho ta.nhaa ca...pe0... mahitthiva.n.nasata.m abhinimminitvaa yena bhagavaa...pe0... anuttare upadhisa"nkhaye vimutto. atha kho ta.nhaa ca arati ca ragaa ca maaradhiitaro ekamanta.m apakkamma etadavocu.m -- sacca.m kira no pitaa avoca --

[03] ``ya~nhi maya.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa aviitaraaga.m iminaa upakkamena upakkameyyaama hadaya.m vaassa phaleyya, u.nha.m lohita.m vaa mukhato uggaccheyya, ummaada.m ^a^P1.0126^ea^ vaa paapu.neyya cittakkhepa.m ^a^V1.0148^ea^ vaa. seyyathaa vaa pana na.lo harito luto ussussati visussati milaayati; evameva ussusseyya visusseyya milaayeyyaa''ti.

[03] atha ^a^M1.0127^ea^ kho ta.nhaa ca arati ca ragaa ca maaradhiitaro yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho ta.nhaa maaradhiitaa bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[26] ekoha.m {ekaaha.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} jhaaya.m sukhamanubodhi.m,
[03] atha kho arati {arati ca (ka0)} maaradhiitaa bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[26] katha.m jhaayi.m {katha.m jhaaya.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), kathajjhaaya.m (ka0)} bahula.m kaamasa~n~naa,
[22] na kuppati na sarati na thino {na kuppatii nassaratii na thiino (sii0)}..
[03] atha ^a^M1.0128^ea^ ^a^P1.0127^ea^ kho ragaa {ragaaca (ka0)} maaradhiitaa bhagavato santike gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --

[03] atha kho ta.nhaa ca arati ca ragaa ca maaradhiitaro yena maaro paapimaa tenupasa"nkami.msu. addasaa kho maaro paapimaa ta.nha~nca arati~nca raga~nca maaradhiitaro duuratova aagacchantiyo. disvaana gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[22] giri.m nakhena khanatha, ayo dantehi khaadatha..
[21] ``sela.mva sirasuuhacca {sirasi uuhacca (sii0), sirasi ohacca (syaa0 ka.m0)}, paataale gaadhamesatha.
[22] taa tattha panudii satthaa, tuula.m bha.t.tha.mva maaluto''ti..
[22] dhiitara.m desita.m buddha, se.t.thena ima.m maarapa~ncakanti..

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0188^ea^ ^a^V1.0151^ea^ ^a^P1.0128^ea^ ^a^M1.0129^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho aa.lavikaa bhikkhunii pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaa yena andhavana.m tenupasa"nkami vivekatthinii. atha kho maaro paapimaa aa.lavikaaya bhikkhuniyaa bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.msa.m uppaadetukaamo vivekamhaa caavetukaamo yena aa.lavikaa bhikkhunii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aa.lavika.m bhikkhuni.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --

[03] atha kho aa.lavikaaya bhikkhuniyaa etadahosi -- ``ko nu khvaaya.m manusso vaa amanusso vaa gaatha.m bhaasatii''ti? atha kho aa.lavikaaya bhikkhuniyaa etadahosi -- ``maaro kho aya.m paapimaa mama bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.msa.m uppaadetukaamo vivekamhaa caavetukaamo gaatha.m bhaasatii''ti. atha kho aa.lavikaa bhikkhunii ``maaro aya.m paapimaa'' iti viditvaa maara.m paapimanta.m ^a^T1.0189^ea^ gaathaahi paccabhaasi --
[21] ``atthi nissara.na.m loke, pa~n~naaya me suphussita.m {suphassita.m (sii0 pii0)}.
[22] pamattabandhu paapima, na tva.m jaanaasi ta.m pada.m..
[22] ya.m tva.m kaamarati.m bruusi, arati mayha saa ahuu''ti..
[03] atha ^a^P1.0129^ea^ kho maaro paapimaa ``jaanaati ma.m aa.lavikaa bhikkhunii''ti dukkhii dummano tatthevantaradhaayiiti.

[03] 163^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M1.0130^ea^. atha kho somaa bhikkhunii pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaa yena andhavana.m tenupasa"nkami divaavihaaraaya. andhavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi. atha kho maaro paapimaa somaaya bhikkhuniyaa bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.msa.m uppaadetukaamo samaadhimhaa caavetukaamo yena somaa bhikkhunii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa soma.m bhikkhuni.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --

[03] atha kho somaaya bhikkhuniyaa etadahosi -- ``ko nu khvaaya.m manusso vaa amanusso vaa gaatha.m bhaasatii''ti? atha kho somaaya bhikkhuniyaa ^a^T1.0190^ea^ etadahosi -- ``maaro kho aya.m paapimaa mama bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.msa.m uppaadetukaamo samaadhimhaa caavetukaamo gaatha.m bhaasatii''ti. atha kho somaa bhikkhunii ``maaro aya.m paapimaa'' iti viditvaa maara.m paapimanta.m gaathaahi paccabhaasi --
[21] ``yassa ^a^V1.0153^ea^ nuuna siyaa eva.m, itthaaha.m purisoti vaa.
[22] ki~nci vaa pana a~n~nasmi {asmiiti (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, ta.m maaro vattumarahatii''ti..
[03] atha kho maaro paapimaa ``jaanaati ma.m somaa bhikkhunii''ti dukkhii dummano tatthevantaradhaayiiti.

[03] 164^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho kisaagotamii bhikkhunii pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaa ^a^P1.0130^ea^ yena andhavana.m tenupasa"nkami ^a^M1.0131^ea^, divaavihaaraaya. andhavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi. atha kho maaro paapimaa kisaagotamiyaa bhikkhuniyaa bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.msa.m uppaadetukaamo samaadhimhaa caavetukaamo yena kisaagotamii bhikkhunii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa kisaagotami.m bhikkhuni.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --

[03] atha kho kisaagotamiyaa bhikkhuniyaa etadahosi -- ``ko nu khvaaya.m manusso vaa amanusso vaa gaatha.m bhaasatii''ti? atha kho kisaagotamiyaa bhikkhuniyaa etadahosi -- ``maaro kho aya.m paapimaa mama bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.msa.m uppaadetukaamo samaadhimhaa caavetukaamo gaatha.m bhaasatii''ti.
[03] atha kho kisaagotamii bhikkhunii ``maaro aya.m paapimaa'' iti viditvaa maara.m paapimanta.m gaathaahi paccabhaasi --
[22] na socaami na rodaami, na ta.m bhaayaami aavuso..
[22] jetvaana maccuno {jetvaa namucino (sii0)} sena.m, viharaami anaasavaa''ti..
[03] atha kho maaro paapimaa ``jaanaati ma.m kisaagotamii bhikkhunii''ti dukkhii dummano tatthevantaradhaayiiti.

[03] 165^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho vijayaa bhikkhunii pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa...pe0... a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi. atha kho maaro paapimaa vijayaaya bhikkhuniyaa bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.msa.m uppaadetukaamo samaadhimhaa caavetukaamo yena vijayaa bhikkhunii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa vijaya.m bhikkhuni.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --

[03] atha kho vijayaaya bhikkhuniyaa etadahosi -- ``ko nu khvaaya.m manusso vaa amanusso vaa gaatha.m bhaasatii''ti? atha kho vijayaaya bhikkhuniyaa etadahosi -- ``maaro kho aya.m paapimaa mama bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.msa.m uppaadetukaamo samaadhimhaa caavetukaamo gaatha.m bhaasatii''ti. atha kho vijayaa bhikkhunii ``maaro aya.m paapimaa'' iti viditvaa maara.m paapimanta.m gaathaahi paccabhaasi --
[21] ``ruupaa saddaa rasaa gandhaa, pho.t.thabbaa ca manoramaa.
[21] ``ye ca ruupuupagaa sattaa, ye ca aruupa.t.thaayino {aaruppa.t.thaayino (sii0 pii0)}.
[22] yaa ca santaa samaapatti, sabbattha vihato tamo''ti..
[03] atha kho maaro paapimaa ``jaanaati ma.m vijayaa bhikkhunii''ti dukkhii dummano tatthevantaradhaayiiti.

[03] 166^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho uppalava.n.naa bhikkhunii pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa...pe0... a~n~natarasmi.m supupphitasaalarukkhamuule a.t.thaasi. atha ^a^T1.0193^ea^ kho maaro paapimaa uppalava.n.naaya bhikkhuniyaa bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.msa.m uppaadetukaamo samaadhimhaa caavetukaamo yena uppalava.n.naa bhikkhunii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa uppalava.n.na.m bhikkhuni.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --

[03] atha ^a^M1.0133^ea^ kho uppalava.n.naaya bhikkhuniyaa etadahosi -- ``ko ^a^P1.0132^ea^ nu khvaaya.m manusso vaa amanusso vaa gaatha.m bhaasatii''ti? atha kho uppalava.n.naaya bhikkhuniyaa etadahosi -- ``maaro kho aya.m paapimaa mama bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.msa.m uppaadetukaamo samaadhimhaa caavetukaamo gaatha.m bhaasatii''ti. atha kho uppalava.n.naa bhikkhunii ``maaro aya.m paapimaa'' iti viditvaa maara.m paapimanta.m gaathaahi paccabhaasi --
[03] atha kho maaro paapimaa ``jaanaati ma.m uppalava.n.naa bhikkhunii''ti dukkhii dummano tatthevantaradhaayiiti.

[03] 167^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho caalaa bhikkhunii pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa...pe0... a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi. atha kho maaro paapimaa yena caalaa bhikkhunii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa caala.m bhikkhuni.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu tva.m, bhikkhuni, na rocesii''ti? ``jaati.m khvaaha.m, aavuso, na rocemii''ti.
[21] ``ki.m nu jaati.m na rocesi, jaato kaamaani bhu~njati.
[22] ko nu ta.m idamaadapayi, jaati.m maa roca {maa rocesi (sii0 pii0)} bhikkhunii''ti..
[21] ``jaatassa mara.na.m hoti, jaato dukkhaani phussati {passati (sii0 pii0)}.
[22] bandha.m vadha.m pariklesa.m, tasmaa jaati.m na rocaye..
[21] ``ye ^a^V1.0157^ea^ ^a^P1.0133^ea^ ca ruupuupagaa sattaa, ye ca aruupa.t.thaayino.
[03] atha kho maaro paapimaa ``jaanaati ma.m caalaa bhikkhunii''ti dukkhii dummano tatthevantaradhaayiiti.

[03] 168^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T1.0195^ea^. atha kho upacaalaa bhikkhunii pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa...pe0... a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi. atha kho maaro paapimaa yena upacaalaa bhikkhunii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa upacaala.m bhikkhuni.m etadavoca -- ``kattha nu tva.m, bhikkhuni, uppajjitukaamaa''ti? ``na khvaaha.m, aavuso, katthaci uppajjitukaamaa''ti.
[21] ``taavati.msaa ca yaamaa ca, tusitaa caapi devataa.
[21] ``taavati.msaa ca yaamaa ca, tusitaa caapi devataa.
[21] ``sabbo aadiipito {sabbova aaditto (syaa0 ka.m0)} loko, sabbo loko padhuupito.
[22] sabbo pajjalito {pajjalito (sabbattha)} loko, sabbo loko pakampito..
[22] agati yattha maarassa, tattha me nirato mano''ti..
[03] atha ^a^V1.0158^ea^ kho maaro paapimaa ``jaanaati ma.m upacaalaa bhikkhunii''ti dukkhii dummano tatthevantaradhaayiiti.

[03] 169^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M1.0135^ea^. atha kho siisupacaalaa {siisuupacaalaa (sii0)} bhikkhunii pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa ^a^T1.0196^ea^ ...pe0... a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi. atha kho maaro paapimaa yena siisupacaalaa bhikkhunii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa siisupacaala.m bhikkhuni.m etadavoca -- ``kassa nu tva.m, bhikkhuni, paasa.n.da.m rocesii''ti? ``na khvaaha.m, aavuso, kassaci paasa.n.da.m rocemii''ti.
[21] ``ka.m nu uddissa mu.n.daasi, sama.nii viya dissasi.
[22] na ca rocesi paasa.n.da.m, kimiva carasi momuuhaa''ti..
[22] na tesa.m dhamma.m rocemi, te dhammassa akovidaa..
[22] so mayha.m bhagavaa satthaa, tassa rocemi saasana''nti..
[03] atha kho maaro paapimaa ``jaanaati ma.m siisupacaalaa bhikkhunii''ti dukkhii dummano tatthevantaradhaayiiti.

[03] 170^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V1.0159^ea^. atha kho selaa bhikkhunii pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa...pe0... a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi. atha kho maaro paapimaa selaaya bhikkhuniyaa bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.msa.m uppaadetukaamo...pe0... sela.m ^a^T1.0197^ea^ bhikkhuni.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``kenida.m pakata.m bimba.m, kvanu {kvannu (sii0 pii0), kvaci (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} bimbassa kaarako.
[22] kvanu bimba.m samuppanna.m, kvanu bimba.m nirujjhatii''ti..

[03] atha kho selaaya bhikkhuniyaa etadahosi -- ``ko nu khvaaya.m manusso vaa amanusso vaa gaatha.m bhaasatii''ti? atha kho selaaya bhikkhuniyaa ^a^M1.0136^ea^ etadahosi -- ``maaro kho aya.m paapimaa mama bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.msa.m uppaadetukaamo samaadhimhaa caavetukaamo gaatha.m bhaasatii''ti. atha kho selaa bhikkhunii ``maaro aya.m paapimaa'' iti viditvaa maara.m paapimanta.m gaathaahi paccabhaasi --
[21] ``nayida.m attakata.m {nayida.m pakata.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} bimba.m, nayida.m parakata.m {nayida.m pakata.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} agha.m.
[21] ``eva.m khandhaa ca dhaatuyo, cha ca aayatanaa ime.
[03] atha kho maaro paapimaa ``jaanaati ma.m selaa bhikkhunii''ti dukkhii dummano tatthevantaradhaayiiti.

[03] 171^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V1.0160^ea^. atha kho vajiraa bhikkhunii pubba.nhasamaya.m ^a^T1.0198^ea^ nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaa ^a^P1.0135^ea^ yena andhavana.m tenupasa"nkami divaavihaaraaya. andhavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi. atha kho maaro paapimaa vajiraaya bhikkhuniyaa bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.msa.m uppaadetukaamo samaadhimhaa caavetukaamo yena vajiraa bhikkhunii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa vajira.m bhikkhuni.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[22] kuva.m satto samuppanno, kuva.m satto nirujjhatii''ti..

[03] atha kho vajiraaya bhikkhuniyaa etadahosi -- ``ko nu khvaaya.m manusso vaa amanusso vaa gaatha.m bhaasatii''ti? atha kho vajiraaya bhikkhuniyaa etadahosi -- ``maaro kho aya.m paapimaa mama bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.msa.m uppaadetukaamo samaadhimhaa caavetukaamo gaatha.m bhaasatii''ti. atha kho ^a^M1.0137^ea^ vajiraa bhikkhunii ``maaro aya.m paapimaa'' iti viditvaa, maara.m paapimanta.m gaathaahi paccabhaasi --
[21] ``ki.m nu sattoti paccesi, maara di.t.thigata.m nu te.
[21] ``yathaa hi a"ngasambhaaraa, hoti saddo ratho iti.
[22] eva.m khandhesu santesu, hoti sattoti sammuti {sammati (syaa0 ka.m0)}..
[21] ``dukkhameva ^a^T1.0199^ea^ hi sambhoti, dukkha.m ti.t.thati veti ca.
[22] naa~n~natra dukkhaa sambhoti, naa~n~na.m dukkhaa nirujjhatii''ti..
[03] atha ^a^V1.0161^ea^ kho maaro paapimaa ``jaanaati ma.m vajiraa bhikkhunii''ti dukkhii dummano tatthevantaradhaayiiti.
[21] aa.lavikaa ca somaa ca, gotamii vijayaa saha.
[21] uppalava.n.naa ca caalaa, upacaalaa siisupacaalaa ca.

[03] 172^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0200^ea^ ^a^V1.0162^ea^ ^a^P1.0136^ea^ ^a^M1.0138^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa uruvelaaya.m viharati najjaa nera~njaraaya tiire ajapaalanigrodhamuule pa.thamaabhisambuddho. atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``adhigato kho myaaya.m dhammo gambhiiro duddaso duranubodho santo pa.niito atakkaavacaro nipu.no pa.n.ditavedaniiyo. aalayaraamaa kho panaaya.m pajaa aalayarataa aalayasammuditaa. aalayaraamaaya kho pana pajaaya aalayarataaya aalayasammuditaaya duddasa.m ida.m .thaana.m yadida.m idappaccayataapa.ticcasamuppaado. idampi kho .thaana.m duddasa.m yadida.m sabbasa"nkhaarasamatho sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggo ta.nhaakkhayo viraago nirodho nibbaana.m. aha~nceva kho pana dhamma.m deseyya.m; pare ca me na aajaaneyyu.m; so mamassa kilamatho, saa mamassa vihesaa''ti. apissu bhagavanta.m imaa anacchariyaa gaathaayo pa.tibha.msu pubbe assutapubbaa --
[22] raagarattaa na dakkhanti, tamokhandhena aavu.taa''ti {tamokkhandhena aavutaati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}..
[03] itiha ^a^P1.0137^ea^ bhagavato pa.tisa~ncikkhato appossukkataaya citta.m namati, no dhammadesanaaya.

[03] atha ^a^V1.0163^ea^ kho brahmuno sahampatissa bhagavato cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya etadahosi -- ``nassati vata bho loko, vinassati vata bho loko, yatra hi naama tathaagatassa arahato sammaasambuddhassa appossukkataaya citta.m namati {namissati (?)}, no dhammadesanaayaa''ti. atha ^a^M1.0139^ea^ kho brahmaa sahampati -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m {sammi~njita.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya evameva -- brahmaloke antarahito bhagavato purato paaturahosi. atha kho brahmaa sahampati eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa dakkhi.najaa.numa.n.dala.m pathaviya.m nihantvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``desetu, bhante, bhagavaa dhamma.m, desetu sugato dhamma.m. santi sattaa apparajakkhajaatikaa, assavanataa dhammassa parihaayanti. bhavissanti dhammassa a~n~naataaro''ti. idamavoca brahmaa sahampati, ida.m vatvaa athaapara.m etadavoca --
[26] desassu {desetu (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} bhagavaa dhamma.m,

[03] atha ^a^P1.0138^ea^ kho bhagavaa brahmuno ca ajjhesana.m viditvaa sattesu ca kaaru~n~nata.m pa.ticca buddhacakkhunaa ^a^V1.0164^ea^ loka.m volokesi. addasaa kho bhagavaa buddhacakkhunaa loka.m volokento satte apparajakkhe mahaarajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svaakaare dvaakaare suvi~n~naapaye duvi~n~naapaye, appekacce paralokavajjabhayadassaavine viharante, appekacce na paralokavajjabhayadassaavine ^a^M1.0140^ea^ {dassaavino (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} viharante. seyyathaapi naama uppaliniya.m vaa paduminiya.m vaa pu.n.dariikiniya.m vaa appekaccaani uppalaani vaa padumaani vaa pu.n.dariikaani vaa udake jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani udakaanuggataani anto nimuggaposiini, appekaccaani uppalaani vaa ^a^T1.0203^ea^ padumaani vaa pu.n.dariikaani vaa udake jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani samodaka.m .thitaani, appekaccaani uppalaani vaa padumaani vaa pu.n.dariikaani vaa udake jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani udakaa accuggamma .thitaani {ti.t.thanti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} anupalittaani udakena; evameva bhagavaa buddhacakkhunaa loka.m volokento addasa satte apparajakkhe mahaarajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svaakaare dvaakaare suvi~n~naapaye duvi~n~naapaye, appekacce paralokavajjabhayadassaavine viharante, appekacce na paralokavajjabhayadassaavine viharante. disvaana brahmaana.m sahampati.m gaathaaya paccabhaasi --
[03] atha kho brahmaa sahampati ``kataavakaaso khomhi bhagavataa dhammadesanaayaa''ti bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayiiti.

[03] 173^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa uruvelaaya.m viharati najjaa nera~njaraaya tiire ajapaalanigrodhamuule pa.thamaabhisambuddho. atha ^a^P1.0139^ea^ kho bhagavato rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``dukkha.m kho agaaravo viharati appatisso, ka.m nu khvaaha.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa {garukatvaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} upanissaaya vihareyya''nti?

[03] atha ^a^M1.0141^ea^ kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``aparipu.n.nassa kho siilakkhandhassa paaripuuriyaa a~n~na.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyya.m ^a^T1.0204^ea^ ^a^V1.0165^ea^. na kho panaaha.m passaami sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya attanaa siilasampannatara.m a~n~na.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa, yamaha.m sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyya.m.

[03] ``aparipu.n.nassa kho samaadhikkhandhassa paaripuuriyaa a~n~na.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyya.m. na kho panaaha.m passaami sadevake loke...pe0... attanaa samaadhisampannatara.m a~n~na.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa, yamaha.m sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyya.m.

[03] ``aparipu.n.nassa pa~n~naakkhandhassa paaripuuriyaa a~n~na.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyya.m. na kho panaaha.m passaami sadevake...pe0... attanaa pa~n~naasampannatara.m a~n~na.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa, yamaha.m sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyya.m.

[03] ``aparipu.n.nassa kho vimuttikkhandhassa paaripuuriyaa a~n~na.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyya.m. na kho panaaha.m passaami sadevake...pe0... attanaa vimuttisampannatara.m a~n~na.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa, yamaha.m sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyya.m.

[03] ``aparipu.n.nassa kho vimutti~naa.nadassanakkhandhassa paaripuuriyaa a~n~na.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa ^a^T1.0205^ea^ sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyya.m. na kho panaaha.m passaami sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya attanaa vimutti~naa.nadassanasampannatara.m a~n~na.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa, yamaha.m sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyya.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m yvaaya.m dhammo mayaa abhisambuddho tameva dhamma.m sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyya''nti.

[03] atha kho brahmaa sahampati bhagavato cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya evameva -- brahmaloke ^a^V1.0166^ea^ antarahito bhagavato purato paaturahosi. atha kho brahmaa sahampati eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``evameta.m ^a^P1.0140^ea^, bhagavaa, evameta.m, sugata! yepi te, bhante, ahesu.m atiitamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa, tepi ^a^M1.0142^ea^ bhagavanto dhamma~n~neva sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihari.msu; yepi te, bhante, bhavissanti anaagatamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa tepi bhagavanto dhamma~n~neva sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharissanti. bhagavaapi, bhante, etarahi araha.m sammaasambuddho dhamma~n~neva sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharatuu''ti. idamavoca brahmaa sahampati, ida.m vatvaa athaapara.m etadavoca --
[21] ``ye ^a^T1.0206^ea^ ca atiitaa sambuddhaa, ye ca buddhaa anaagataa.
[22] yo cetarahi sambuddho, bahuuna.m {bahunna.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} sokanaasano..
[21] ``sabbe saddhammagaruno, viha.msu {vihari.msu (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} viharanti ca.

[03] 174^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarissaa braahma.niyaa brahmadevo naama putto bhagavato santike agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa brahmadevo eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. ``khii.naa jaati ^a^V1.0167^ea^, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa brahmadevo arahata.m ahosi.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa brahmadevo pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. saavatthiya.m sapadaana.m pi.n.daaya caramaano yena sakamaatu nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami. tena ^a^P1.0141^ea^ kho pana ^a^T1.0207^ea^ samayena aayasmato brahmadevassa maataa braahma.nii brahmuno aahuti.m nicca.m pagga.nhaati ^a^M1.0143^ea^. atha kho brahmuno sahampatissa etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho aayasmato brahmadevassa maataa braahma.nii brahmuno aahuti.m nicca.m pagga.nhaati. ya.mnuunaaha.m ta.m upasa"nkamitvaa sa.mvejeyya''nti. atha kho brahmaa sahampati -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya evameva -- brahmaloke antarahito aayasmato brahmadevassa maatu nivesane paaturahosi. atha kho brahmaa sahampati vehaasa.m .thito aayasmato brahmadevassa maatara.m braahma.ni.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[22] ki.m jappasi brahmapatha.m ajaana.m {ajaanantii (sii0 pii0 ka0)}..
[22] yo te so {te so (sii0 pii0), yo te sa (?)} pi.n.daaya ghara.m pavi.t.tho..

[03] 175^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena bakassa brahmuno evaruupa.m paapaka.m ^a^T1.0209^ea^ di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti -- ``ida.m nicca.m, ida.m dhuva.m, ida.m sassata.m, ida.m kevala.m, ida.m acavanadhamma.m, ida~nhi na jaayati na jiiyati na miiyati na cavati na upapajjati, ito ca pana~n~na.m uttari.m {uttari.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} nissara.na.m natthii''ti.

[03] atha ^a^V1.0169^ea^ kho bhagavaa bakassa brahmuno cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya evameva -- jetavane antarahito tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahosi. addasaa kho bako brahmaa bhagavanta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ehi kho maarisa, svaagata.m te, maarisa! cirassa.m kho maarisa! ima.m pariyaayamakaasi yadida.m idhaagamanaaya. ida~nhi, maarisa, nicca.m, ida.m dhuva.m, ida.m sassata.m, ida.m kevala.m, ida.m acavanadhamma.m, ida~nhi na jaayati na jiiyati na miiyati na cavati na upapajjati. ito ca pana~n~na.m uttari nissara.na.m natthii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, bhagavaa baka.m brahmaana.m etadavoca -- ``avijjaagato vata, bho, bako brahmaa; avijjaagato vata, bho, bako brahmaa. yatra ^a^M1.0145^ea^ hi naama anicca.myeva samaana.m niccanti vakkhati, adhuva.myeva samaana.m dhuvanti vakkhati, asassata.myeva samaana.m sassatanti vakkhati, akevala.myeva ^a^P1.0143^ea^ samaana.m kevalanti vakkhati, cavanadhamma.myeva samaana.m acavanadhammanti vakkhati. yattha ca pana jaayati ca jiiyati ca miiyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca, ta~nca tathaa vakkhati -- `ida~nhi na jaayati na jiiyati na miiyati na cavati na ^a^T1.0210^ea^ upapajjati'. santa~nca pana~n~na.m uttari nissara.na.m, `nattha~n~na.m uttari nissara.na'nti vakkhatii''ti.
[27] a~n~nepi {a~n~nampi (sii0 pii0)} jaanaasi tathaa hi buddho.

[03] 176^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V1.0171^ea^. tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa brahmuno evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti -- ``natthi so sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa yo idha aagaccheyyaa''ti. atha ^a^T1.0212^ea^ kho bhagavaa tassa brahmuno cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso...pe0... tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahosi. atha kho bhagavaa tassa brahmuno upari vehaasa.m palla"nkena nisiidi tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa.

[03] atha kho aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa etadahosi -- ``kaha.m nu kho bhagavaa etarahi viharatii''ti? addasaa kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano {mahaamoggalaano (ka0)} bhagavanta.m dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena tassa brahmuno upari vehaasa.m palla"nkena nisinna.m tejodhaatu.m samaapanna.m. disvaana -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya evameva -- jetavane antarahito tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahosi. atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ^a^M1.0147^ea^ puratthima.m disa.m nissaaya {upanissaaya (sii0)} tassa brahmuno upari vehaasa.m palla"nkena nisiidi tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa niicatara.m bhagavato.

[03] atha kho aayasmato mahaakassapassa etadahosi -- ``kaha.m nu kho bhagavaa etarahi viharatii''ti? addasaa kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo bhagavanta.m dibbena cakkhunaa...pe0... disvaana -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso...pe0... evameva -- jetavane ^a^P1.0145^ea^ antarahito tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahosi. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo dakkhi.na.m disa.m nissaaya tassa brahmuno upari vehaasa.m palla"nkena nisiidi tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa niicatara.m bhagavato.

[03] atha ^a^T1.0213^ea^ kho aayasmato mahaakappinassa etadahosi -- ``kaha.m nu kho bhagavaa etarahi viharatii''ti? addasaa kho aayasmaa mahaakappino bhagavanta.m dibbena cakkhunaa...pe0... tejodhaatu.m samaapanna.m. disvaana -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso...pe0... evameva -- jetavane antarahito tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahosi. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakappino pacchima.m disa.m nissaaya tassa brahmuno upari vehaasa.m palla"nkena nisiidi tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa niicatara.m bhagavato.

[03] atha ^a^V1.0172^ea^ kho aayasmato anuruddhassa etadahosi -- ``kaha.m nu kho bhagavaa etarahi viharatii''ti? addasaa kho aayasmaa anuruddho...pe0... tejodhaatu.m samaapanna.m. disvaana -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso...pe0... tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahosi. atha kho aayasmaa anuruddho uttara.m disa.m nissaaya tassa brahmuno upari vehaasa.m palla"nkena nisiidi tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa niicatara.m bhagavato.
[03] atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ta.m brahmaana.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``ajjaapi te aavuso saa di.t.thi, yaa te di.t.thi pure ahu.
[21] ``na me maarisa saa di.t.thi, yaa me di.t.thi pure ahu.
[22] svaaha.m ajja katha.m vajja.m, aha.m niccomhi sassato''ti..

[03] atha ^a^T1.0214^ea^ ^a^M1.0148^ea^ kho bhagavaa ta.m brahmaana.m sa.mvejetvaa -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya evameva -- tasmi.m brahmaloke antarahito jetavane paaturahosi. atha kho so brahmaa a~n~natara.m brahmapaarisajja.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, maarisa, yenaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m eva.m vadehi -- `atthi nu kho, maarisa moggallaana, a~n~nepi tassa bhagavato saavakaa eva.mmahiddhikaa eva.mmahaanubhaavaa ^a^P1.0146^ea^; seyyathaapi bhava.m moggallaano kassapo kappino anuruddho'''ti? ``eva.m, maarisaa''ti kho so brahmapaarisajjo tassa brahmuno pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m etadavoca -- ``atthi nu kho, maarisa moggallaana, a~n~nepi tassa bhagavato saavakaa eva.mmahiddhikaa eva.mmahaanubhaavaa; seyyathaapi bhava.m moggallaano kassapo kappino anuruddho''ti? atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ta.m brahmapaarisajja.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --

[03] atha ^a^T1.0215^ea^ kho so brahmapaarisajjo aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa yena so brahmaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m brahmaana.m etadavoca -- ``aayasmaa maarisa, mahaamoggallaano evamaaha --
[03] idamavoca so brahmapaarisajjo. attamano ca so brahmaa tassa brahmapaarisajjassa bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.

[03] 177^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa divaavihaaragato hoti pa.tisalliino. atha kho subrahmaa ca paccekabrahmaa suddhaavaaso ^a^M1.0149^ea^ ca paccekabrahmaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa pacceka.m dvaarabaaha.m {paccekadvaarabaaha.m (pii0 ka0)} upanissaaya a.t.tha.msu. atha kho subrahmaa paccekabrahmaa suddhaavaasa.m paccekabrahmaana.m etadavoca -- ``akaalo kho taava, maarisa, bhagavanta.m payirupaasitu.m; divaavihaaragato bhagavaa pa.tisalliino ca. asuko ca brahmaloko iddho ceva phiito ca, brahmaa ca tatra pamaadavihaara.m viharati. aayaama, maarisa, yena so brahmaloko tenupasa"nkamissaama; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m brahmaana.m sa.mvejeyyaamaa''ti. ``eva.m ^a^P1.0147^ea^, maarisaa''ti kho suddhaavaaso paccekabrahmaa subrahmuno paccekabrahmuno paccassosi.

[03] atha kho subrahmaa ca paccekabrahmaa ^a^T1.0216^ea^ suddhaavaaso ca paccekabrahmaa -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso...pe0... evameva -- bhagavato purato antarahitaa tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahesu.m. addasaa kho so brahmaa te brahmaano duuratova aagacchante. disvaana te brahmaano etadavoca -- ``handa kuto nu tumhe, maarisaa, aagacchathaa''ti? ``aagataa kho maya.m, maarisa, amha tassa bhagavato ^a^V1.0174^ea^ santikaa arahato sammaasambuddhassa. gaccheyyaasi pana tva.m, maarisa, tassa bhagavato upa.t.thaana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassaa''ti?

[03] eva.m vutto {eva.m vutte (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} kho so brahmaa ta.m vacana.m anadhivaasento sahassakkhattu.m attaana.m abhinimminitvaa subrahmaana.m paccekabrahmaana.m etadavoca -- ``passasi me no tva.m, maarisa, evaruupa.m iddhaanubhaava''nti? ``passaami kho tyaaha.m, maarisa, evaruupa.m iddhaanubhaava''nti. ``so khvaaha.m, maarisa, eva.mmahiddhiko eva.mmahaanubhaavo kassa a~n~nassa sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa vaa upa.t.thaana.m gamissaamii''ti?

[03] atha kho subrahmaa paccekabrahmaa dvisahassakkhattu.m attaana.m abhinimminitvaa ta.m brahmaana.m etadavoca -- ``passasi me no tva.m, maarisa, evaruupa.m iddhaanubhaava''nti? ``passaami kho tyaaha.m, maarisa, evaruupa.m iddhaanubhaava''nti. ``tayaa ca kho, maarisa, mayaa ca sveva bhagavaa mahiddhikataro ceva mahaanubhaavataro ca. gaccheyyaasi tva.m, maarisa, tassa bhagavato upa.t.thaana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassaa''ti? atha ^a^T1.0217^ea^ kho so brahmaa subrahmaana.m paccekabrahmaana.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[26] tayida.m vimaana.m jalate ca {jalateva (pii0 ka0)} brahme,

[03] atha kho subrahmaa ca paccekabrahmaa suddhaavaaso ca paccekabrahmaa ta.m brahmaana.m sa.mvejetvaa tatthevantaradhaayi.msu ^a^V1.0175^ea^. agamaasi ca kho so brahmaa aparena samayena bhagavato upa.t.thaana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassaati.

[03] 178^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa divaavihaaragato hoti pa.tisalliino. atha kho subrahmaa ca paccekabrahmaa suddhaavaaso ca paccekabrahmaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa pacceka.m dvaarabaaha.m nissaaya a.t.tha.msu. atha kho subrahmaa paccekabrahmaa kokaalika.m bhikkhu.m aarabbha ^a^T1.0218^ea^ bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[22] appameyya.m pamaayina.m, nivuta.m ta.m ma~n~ne puthujjana''nti..

[03] 179^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa divaavihaaragato hoti pa.tisalliino. atha kho subrahmaa ca paccekabrahmaa suddhaavaaso ca paccekabrahmaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa pacceka.m dvaarabaaha.m nissaaya a.t.tha.msu. atha kho suddhaavaaso paccekabrahmaa katamodakatissaka.m {katamorakatissaka.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} bhikkhu.m aarabbha bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[22] appameyya.m pamaayina.m, nivuta.m ta.m ma~n~ne akissava''nti..

[03] 180^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. tena kho pana samayena kokaaliko bhikkhu aabaadhiko hoti dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. atha kho turuu {tudu (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} paccekabrahmaa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.no kevalakappa.m jetavana.m obhaasetvaa yena kokaaliko bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa vehaasa.m ^a^V1.0176^ea^ .thito kokaalika.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``pasaadehi, kokaalika, saariputtamoggallaanesu citta.m. pesalaa saariputtamoggallaanaa''ti. ``kosi tva.m, aavuso''ti? ``aha.m turuu paccekabrahmaa''ti. ``nanu tva.m, aavuso, bhagavataa ^a^T1.0219^ea^ anaagaamii byaakato, atha ki~ncarahi idhaagato? passa, yaava~nca te ida.m aparaddha''nti.
[21] ``purisassa hi jaatassa, ku.thaarii {dudhaarii (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} jaayate mukhe.
[22] yaaya chindati attaana.m, baalo dubbhaasita.m bha.na.m..
[26] yamariyagarahii {yamariye garahii (syaa0 ka.m0), yamariya.m garaha.m (ka0)} niraya.m upeti,

[03] 181^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M1.0152^ea^. atha kho kokaaliko bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami ^a^P1.0150^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho kokaaliko bhikkhu ^a^V1.0177^ea^ bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``paapicchaa, bhante, saariputtamoggallaanaa paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gataa''ti. eva.m ^a^T1.0220^ea^ vutte, bhagavaa kokaalika.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``maa heva.m, kokaalika, avaca; maa heva.m, kokaalika, avaca. pasaadehi, kokaalika, saariputtamoggallaanesu citta.m. pesalaa saariputtamoggallaanaa''ti. dutiyampi kho kokaaliko bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ki~ncaapi me, bhante, bhagavaa saddhaayiko paccayiko; atha kho paapicchaava bhante, saariputtamoggallaanaa paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gataa''ti. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa kokaalika.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``maa heva.m, kokaalika, avaca; maa heva.m, kokaalika, avaca. pasaadehi, kokaalika, saariputtamoggallaanesu citta.m. pesalaa saariputtamoggallaanaa''ti. tatiyampi kho kokaaliko bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ki~ncaapi...pe0... icchaana.m vasa.m gataa''ti. tatiyampi kho bhagavaa kokaalika.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``maa heva.m...pe0... pesalaa saariputtamoggallaanaa''ti.

[03] atha kho kokaaliko bhikkhu u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. acirapakkantassa ca kokaalikassa bhikkhuno saasapamattiihi pii.lakaahi {pi.lakaahi (sii0 pii0)} sabbo kaayo phu.to ahosi. saasapamattiyo hutvaa muggamattiyo ahesu.m, muggamattiyo hutvaa kalaayamattiyo ahesu.m, kalaayamattiyo hutvaa kola.t.thimattiyo ahesu.m, kola.t.thimattiyo hutvaa kolamattiyo ahesu.m, kolamattiyo hutvaa aamalakamattiyo ahesu.m, aamalakamattiyo hutvaa beluvasalaa.tukamattiyo ahesu.m, beluvasalaa.tukamattiyo hutvaa billamattiyo ahesu.m, billamattiyo ^a^T1.0221^ea^ hutvaa pabhijji.msu. pubba~nca lohita~nca pagghari.msu. atha kho kokaaliko bhikkhu teneva aabaadhena kaalamakaasi ^a^P1.0151^ea^. kaala"nkato ca kokaaliko bhikkhu paduma.m niraya.m upapajji saariputtamoggallaanesu citta.m aaghaatetvaa.

[03] atha ^a^M1.0153^ea^ kho brahmaa sahampati abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.no kevalakappa.m jetavana.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho brahmaa sahampati bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kokaaliko, bhante, bhikkhu kaala"nkato. kaala"nkato ca, bhante, kokaaliko bhikkhu paduma.m niraya.m upapanno saariputtamoggallaanesu citta.m aaghaatetvaa''ti. idamavoca brahmaa sahampati, ida.m vatvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayiiti.

[03] atha ^a^V1.0178^ea^ kho bhagavaa tassaa rattiyaa accayena bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ima.m, bhikkhave, ratti.m brahmaa sahampati abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.no kevalakappa.m jetavana.m obhaasetvaa yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho, bhikkhave, brahmaa sahampati ma.m etadavoca -- `kokaaliko, bhante, bhikkhu kaala"nkato. kaala"nkato ca, bhante, kokaaliko bhikkhu paduma.m niraya.m upapanno saariputtamoggallaanesu citta.m aaghaatetvaa'ti. idamavoca, bhikkhave ^a^T1.0222^ea^, brahmaa sahampati, ida.m vatvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, a~n~nataro bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kiivadiigha.m nu kho, bhante, padume niraye aayuppamaa.na''nti? ``diigha.m kho, bhikkhu, padume niraye aayuppamaa.na.m. ta.m na sukara.m sa"nkhaatu.m -- ettakaani vassaani iti vaa, ettakaani vassasataani iti vaa, ettakaani vassasahassaani iti vaa, ettakaani vassasatasahassaani iti vaa''ti. ``sakkaa pana, bhante, upama.m kaatu''nti? ``sakkaa ^a^P1.0152^ea^, bhikkhuu''ti bhagavaa avoca --

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhu viisatikhaariko kosalako tilavaaho. tato puriso vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena ekameka.m tila.m uddhareyya; khippatara.m kho so, bhikkhu, viisatikhaariko kosalako tilavaaho iminaa upakkamena parikkhaya.m pariyaadaana.m gaccheyya, na tveva eko abbudo nirayo. seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, viisati abbudaa nirayaa, evameko nirabbudanirayo. seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, viisati nirabbudaa nirayaa, evameko ababo nirayo. seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, viisati ababaa nirayaa, evameko ^a^M1.0154^ea^ a.ta.to nirayo. seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, viisati a.ta.taa nirayaa, evameko ahaho nirayo. seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, viisati ahahaa nirayaa, evameko kumudo nirayo. seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, viisati kumudaa nirayaa, evameko sogandhiko nirayo. seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, viisati sogandhikaa nirayaa, evameko uppalanirayo. seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, viisati uppalaa nirayaa, evameko pu.n.dariko nirayo. seyyathaapi ^a^T1.0223^ea^, bhikkhu, viisati pu.n.darikaa nirayaa, evameko padumo nirayo. padume pana, bhikkhu, niraye kokaaliko bhikkhu upapanno saariputtamoggallaanesu citta.m aaghaatetvaa''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa, ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[27] bako ca brahmaa aparaa ca di.t.thi.
[22] turuu ca brahmaa aparo ca kokaalikoti..

[03] 182^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0225^ea^ ^a^V1.0180^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati sappiniitiire. atha kho brahmaa sana"nkumaaro abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.no kevalakappa.m sappiniitiira.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho brahmaa sana"nkumaaro bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[03] idamavoca brahmaa sana"nkumaaro. samanu~n~no satthaa ahosi. atha kho brahmaa sana"nkumaaro ``samanu~n~no me satthaa''ti bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayiiti.

[03] 183^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate acirapakkante devadatte. atha kho brahmaa sahampati abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.no kevalakappa.m gijjhakuu.ta.m ^a^T1.0226^ea^ pabbata.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m ^a^P1.0154^ea^ .thito kho brahmaa sahampati devadatta.m aarabbha bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``phala.m ^a^M1.0156^ea^ ve kadali.m hanti, phala.m ve.lu.m phala.m na.la.m.
[22] sakkaaro kaapurisa.m hanti, gabbho assatari.m yathaa''ti..

[03] 184^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V1.0181^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa maagadhesu viharati andhakavinde. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya.m abbhokaase nisinno hoti, devo ca ekameka.m phusaayati. atha kho brahmaa sahampati abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.no kevalakappa.m andhakavinda.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho brahmaa sahampati bhagavato santike imaa gaathaayo abhaasi --
[21] ``yattha bheravaa sariisapaa {siri.m sapaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)},
[21] ``bhiyyo {bhiiyo (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pa~ncasataa sekkhaa, dasaa ca dasadhaa dasa.
[21] ``athaaya.m ^a^V1.0182^ea^ ^a^M1.0157^ea^ {atthaaya.m-itipi dii0 ni0 2.290} itaraa pajaa, pu~n~nabhaagaati me mano.
[22] sa"nkhaatu.m nopi sakkomi, musaavaadassa ottapa''nti {ottapeti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), ottappeti (ka0)}..

[03] 185^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^P1.0155^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[01] ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, raajaa ahosi aru.navaa naama. ra~n~no kho pana, bhikkhave, aru.navato aru.navatii naama raajadhaanii ahosi. aru.navati.m kho pana, bhikkhave, raajadhaani.m {aru.navatiya.m kho pana bhikkhave raajadhaaniya.m (pii0 ka0)} sikhii bhagavaa ^a^T1.0228^ea^ araha.m sammaasambuddho upanissaaya vihaasi. sikhissa kho pana, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa abhibhuusambhava.m naama saavakayuga.m ahosi agga.m bhaddayuga.m. atha kho, bhikkhave, sikhii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho abhibhu.m bhikkhu.m aamantesi -- `aayaama, braahma.na, yena a~n~nataro brahmaloko tenupasa"nkamissaama, yaava bhattassa kaalo bhavissatii'ti. `eva.m, bhante'ti kho bhikkhave, abhibhuu bhikkhu sikhissa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa paccassosi. atha kho, bhikkhave, sikhii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho abhibhuu ca bhikkhu -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya evameva -- aru.navatiyaa raajadhaaniyaa antarahitaa tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahesu.m.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, sikhii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho abhibhu.m bhikkhu.m aamantesi -- `pa.tibhaatu, braahma.na, ta.m brahmuno ca brahmaparisaaya ca brahmapaarisajjaana~nca dhammii kathaa'ti. `eva.m, bhante'ti kho, bhikkhave, abhibhuu bhikkhu sikhissa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa pa.tissutvaa, brahmaana~nca brahmaparisa~nca brahmapaarisajje ca dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. tatra suda.m, bhikkhave, brahmaa ca brahmaparisaa ca brahmapaarisajjaa ^a^P1.0156^ea^ ca ujjhaayanti khiyyanti {khiiyanti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vipaacenti -- `acchariya.m vata ^a^M1.0158^ea^, bho, abbhuta.m vata bho, katha~nhi naama satthari sammukhiibhuute saavako dhamma.m desessatii'''ti ^a^T1.0229^ea^!

[01] ``atha ^a^V1.0183^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, sikhii bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho abhibhu.m bhikkhu.m aamantesi -- `ujjhaayanti kho te, braahma.na, brahmaa ca brahmaparisaa ca brahmapaarisajjaa ca -- acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho, katha~nhi naama satthari sammukhiibhuute saavako dhamma.m desessatiiti! tena hi tva.m braahma.na, bhiyyosomattaaya brahmaana~nca brahmaparisa~nca brahmapaarisajje ca sa.mvejehii'ti. `eva.m, bhante'ti kho, bhikkhave, abhibhuu bhikkhu sikhissa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa pa.tissutvaa dissamaanenapi kaayena dhamma.m desesi, adissamaanenapi kaayena dhamma.m desesi, dissamaanenapi he.t.thimena upa.d.dhakaayena adissamaanena uparimena upa.d.dhakaayena dhamma.m desesi, dissamaanenapi uparimena upa.d.dhakaayena adissamaanena he.t.thimena upa.d.dhakaayena dhamma.m desesi. tatra suda.m, bhikkhave, brahmaa ca brahmaparisaa ca brahmapaarisajjaa ca acchariyabbhutacittajaataa ahesu.m -- `acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho, sama.nassa mahiddhikataa mahaanubhaavataa'''ti!

[01] ``atha kho abhibhuu bhikkhu sikhi.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m etadavoca -- `abhijaanaami khvaaha.m, bhante, bhikkhusa"nghassa majjhe evaruupi.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa -- pahomi khvaaha.m aavuso, brahmaloke .thito sahassilokadhaatu.m ^a^T1.0230^ea^ {sahassiilokadhaatu.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} sarena vi~n~naapetu'nti. `etassa, braahma.na, kaalo, etassa, braahma.na, kaalo; ya.m tva.m, braahma.na, brahmaloke .thito sahassilokadhaatu.m sarena vi~n~naapeyyaasii'ti. `eva.m, bhante'ti kho, bhikkhave, abhibhuu bhikkhu sikhissa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa pa.tissutvaa brahmaloke .thito imaa gaathaayo abhaasi --

[01] ``atha ^a^M1.0159^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, sikhii ca bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho abhibhuu ca bhikkhu brahmaana~nca brahmaparisa~nca brahmapaarisajje ca sa.mvejetvaa -- seyyathaapi naama...pe0... tasmi.m brahmaloke antarahitaa aru.navatiyaa raajadhaaniyaa paaturahesu.m. atha kho, bhikkhave, sikhii bhagavaa ^a^V1.0184^ea^ araha.m sammaasambuddho bhikkhuu aamantesi -- `assuttha no, tumhe, bhikkhave, abhibhussa bhikkhuno brahmaloke .thitassa gaathaayo bhaasamaanassaa'ti? `assumha kho maya.m, bhante, abhibhussa bhikkhuno brahmaloke .thitassa gaathaayo bhaasamaanassaa'ti. `yathaa katha.m pana tumhe, bhikkhave, assuttha abhibhussa bhikkhuno brahmaloke .thitassa gaathaayo bhaasamaanassaa'''ti? eva.m kho maya.m, bhante, assumha abhibhussa bhikkhuno brahmaloke .thitassa gaathaayo bhaasamaanassa --

[03] ```eva.m kho maya.m, bhante, assumha abhibhussa bhikkhuno brahmaloke .thitassa gaathaayo bhaasamaanassaa'ti. `saadhu saadhu, bhikkhave; saadhu kho tumhe, bhikkhave! assuttha abhibhussa bhikkhuno brahmaloke .thitassa gaathaayo bhaasamaanassaa'''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa, attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.

[03] 186^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kusinaaraaya.m viharati upavattane mallaana.m saalavane antarena yamakasaalaana.m parinibbaanasamaye. atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``handa daani, bhikkhave ^a^P1.0158^ea^, aamantayaami vo -- `vayadhammaa sa"nkhaaraa, appamaadena sampaadethaa'ti. aya.m tathaagatassa pacchimaa vaacaa''.

[01] atha ^a^M1.0160^ea^ kho bhagavaa pa.thama.m jhaana.m {pa.thamajjhaana.m (syaa0 ka.m0) eva.m dutiya.m jhaana.m iccaadiisupi} samaapajji. pa.thamaa jhaanaa {pa.thamajjhaanaa (syaa0 ka.m0) eva.m dutiyaa jhaanaa iccaadiisupi} vu.t.thahitvaa dutiya.m jhaana.m samaapajji. dutiyaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa tatiya.m jhaana.m samaapajji. tatiyaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa catuttha.m ^a^V1.0185^ea^ jhaana.m samaapajji. catutthaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samaapajji. aakaasaana~ncaayatanaa vu.t.thahitvaa vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samaapajji. vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanaa vu.t.thahitvaa aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samaapajji. aaki~nca~n~naayatanaa vu.t.thahitvaa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samaapajji. nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanaa ^a^T1.0232^ea^ vu.t.thahitvaa sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajji.

[01] sa~n~naavedayitanirodhaa vu.t.thahitvaa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samaapajji. nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanaa vu.t.thahitvaa aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samaapajji. aaki~nca~n~naayatanaa vu.t.thahitvaa vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samaapajji. vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanaa vu.t.thahitvaa aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samaapajji. aakaasaana~ncaayatanaa vu.t.thahitvaa catuttha.m jhaana.m samaapajji. catutthaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa tatiya.m jhaana.m samaapajji. tatiyaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa dutiya.m jhaana.m samaapajji. dutiyaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa pa.thama.m jhaana.m samaapajji. pa.thamaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa dutiya.m jhaana.m samaapajji. dutiyaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa tatiya.m jhaana.m samaapajji. tatiyaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa catuttha.m jhaana.m samaapajji. catutthaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa samanantara.m bhagavaa parinibbaayi. parinibbute bhagavati saha parinibbaanaa brahmaa sahampati ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[03] parinibbute bhagavati saha parinibbaanaa sakko devaanamindo ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[03] parinibbute ^a^T1.0233^ea^ ^a^M1.0161^ea^ bhagavati saha parinibbaanaa aayasmaa aanando ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[03] parinibbute ^a^V1.0186^ea^ ^a^P1.0159^ea^ bhagavati saha parinibbaanaa aayasmaa anuruddho imaa gaathaayo abhaasi --
[22] anejo santimaarabbha, cakkhumaa parinibbuto {ya.m kaalamakarii muni (mahaaparinibbaanasutte)}..
[06] brahmasa.myutta.m samatta.m. {ito para.m marammapotthakesu evampi dissati --
[03] brahmaayaacana.m agaarava~nca, brahmadevo bako ca brahmaa.
[03] a~n~nataro ca brahmaakokaalika~nca, tissaka~nca turuu ca..

[03] 187^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0235^ea^ ^a^V1.0187^ea^ ^a^P1.0160^ea^ ^a^M1.0162^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhaaradvaajagottassa braahma.nassa dhana~njaanii {dhaana~njaanii (pii0 sii0 a.t.tha0)} naama braahma.nii abhippasannaa hoti buddhe ca dhamme ca sa"nghe ca. atha kho dhana~njaanii braahma.nii bhaaradvaajagottassa braahma.nassa bhatta.m upasa.mharantii upakkhalitvaa tikkhattu.m udaana.m udaanesi --

[01] eva.m vutte, bhaaradvaajagotto braahma.no dhana~njaani.m braahma.ni.m etadavoca -- ``evameva.m panaaya.m vasalii yasmi.m vaa tasmi.m vaa tassa mu.n.dakassa sama.nassa va.n.na.m bhaasati. idaani tyaaha.m, vasali, tassa satthuno vaada.m aaropessaamii''ti. ``na khvaaha.m ta.m, braahma.na, passaami sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya, yo tassa bhagavato vaada.m aaropeyya arahato sammaasambuddhassa. api ca tva.m, braahma.na, gaccha, gantvaa vijaanissasii''ti {gantvaapi jaanissasiiti (syaa0 ka.m0)}.

[03] atha ^a^T1.0236^ea^ kho bhaaradvaajagotto braahma.no kupito anattamano yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m ^a^P1.0161^ea^ nisinno kho bhaaradvaajagotto braahma.no bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``ki.msu ^a^V1.0188^ea^ chetvaa sukha.m seti, ki.msu chetvaa na socati.
[21] ``kodha.m ^a^M1.0163^ea^ chetvaa sukha.m seti, kodha.m chetvaa na socati.
[22] vadha.m ariyaa pasa.msanti, ta~nhi chetvaa na socatii''ti..

[03] eva.m vutte, bhaaradvaajagotto braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama! seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti; evameva.m bhotaa gotamena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. labheyyaaha.m bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajja.m, labheyya.m upasampada''nti.

[03] alattha kho bhaaradvaajagotto braahma.no bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, alattha upasampada.m. aciruupasampanno kho panaayasmaa bhaaradvaajo eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto ^a^T1.0237^ea^ aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa bhaaradvaajo arahata.m ahosiiti.

[03] 188^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. assosi kho akkosakabhaaradvaajo braahma.no -- ``bhaaradvaajagotto kira braahma.no sama.nassa gotamassa santike agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito''ti kupito anattamano yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^P1.0162^ea^ bhagavanta.m asabbhaahi pharusaahi vaacaahi akkosati paribhaasati.

[01] eva.m ^a^V1.0189^ea^ vutte, bhagavaa akkosakabhaaradvaaja.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, braahma.na, api nu kho te aagacchanti mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa atithiyo {atithayo (?)}''ti? ``appekadaa me, bho gotama, aagacchanti mittaamaccaa ^a^M1.0164^ea^ ~naatisaalohitaa atithiyo''ti. ```ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, braahma.na, api nu tesa.m anuppadesi khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa saayaniiya.m vaa'''ti? ```appekadaa nesaaha.m, bho gotama, anuppademi khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa saayaniiya.m vaa'''ti. ```sace kho pana te, braahma.na, nappa.tigga.nhanti ^a^T1.0238^ea^, kassa ta.m hotii'''ti? ```sace te, bho gotama, nappa.tigga.nhanti, amhaakameva ta.m hotii'''ti. ``evameva kho, braahma.na, ya.m tva.m amhe anakkosante akkosasi, arosente rosesi, abha.n.dante bha.n.dasi, ta.m te maya.m nappa.tigga.nhaama. taveveta.m, braahma.na, hoti; taveveta.m, braahma.na, hoti''.

[03] ``yo kho, braahma.na, akkosanta.m paccakkosati, rosenta.m pa.tiroseti, bha.n.danta.m pa.tibha.n.dati, aya.m vuccati, braahma.na, sambhu~njati viitiharatiiti. te maya.m tayaa neva sambhu~njaama na viitiharaama. taveveta.m, braahma.na, hoti; taveveta.m, braahma.na, hotii''ti. ``bhavanta.m kho gotama.m saraajikaa parisaa eva.m jaanaati -- `araha.m sama.no gotamo'ti. atha ca pana bhava.m gotamo kujjhatii''ti.
[22] janaa ma~n~nanti baaloti, ye dhammassa akovidaa''ti..

[03] eva.m ^a^V1.0190^ea^ ^a^P1.0163^ea^ vutte, akkosakabhaaradvaajo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... esaaha.m ^a^T1.0239^ea^ bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. labheyyaaha.m, bhante, bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajja.m, labheyya.m upasampada''nti.

[03] alattha kho akkosakabhaaradvaajo braahma.no bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, alattha upasampada.m. aciruupasampanno kho panaayasmaa akkosakabhaaradvaajo eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto ^a^M1.0165^ea^ nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa bhaaradvaajo arahata.m ahosiiti.

[03] 189^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. assosi kho asurindakabhaaradvaajo braahma.no -- ``bhaaradvaajagotto braahma.no kira sama.nassa gotamassa santike agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito''ti kupito anattamano yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m asabbhaahi pharusaahi vaacaahi akkosati paribhaasati. eva.m vutte, bhagavaa tu.nhii ahosi. atha kho asurindakabhaaradvaajo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``jitosi, sama.na, jitosi, sama.naa''ti.
[21] ``jaya.m ^a^T1.0240^ea^ ve ma~n~nati baalo, vaacaaya pharusa.m bha.na.m.
[22] jaya~ncevassa ta.m hoti, yaa titikkhaa vijaanato..
[22] janaa ma~n~nanti baaloti, ye dhammassa akovidaa''ti..

[03] eva.m ^a^P1.0164^ea^ vutte, asurindakabhaaradvaajo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa bhaaradvaajo arahata.m ahosii''ti.

[03] 190^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M1.0166^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. assosi kho bila"ngikabhaaradvaajo braahma.no -- ``bhaaradvaajagotto kira braahma.no sama.nassa gotamassa santike agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito''ti kupito anattamano yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa tu.nhiibhuuto ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. atha kho bhagavaa bila"ngikassa bhaaradvaajassa braahma.nassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya bila"ngika.m bhaaradvaaja.m braahma.na.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi ^a^T1.0241^ea^ --
[03] eva.m vutte, vila"ngikabhaaradvaajo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa bhaaradvaajo arahata.m ahosii''ti.

[03] 191^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho ahi.msakabhaaradvaajo braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m ^a^P1.0165^ea^ nisinno kho ahi.msakabhaaradvaajo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ahi.msakaaha.m, bho gotama, ahi.msakaaha.m, bho gotamaa''ti.
[21] ``yathaa ^a^T1.0242^ea^ ^a^V1.0192^ea^ naama.m tathaa cassa, siyaa kho tva.m ahi.msako.
[27] yo ca kaayena vaacaaya, manasaa ca na hi.msati.
[22] sa ve ahi.msako hoti, yo para.m na vihi.msatii''ti..
[03] eva.m vutte, ahi.msakabhaaradvaajo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa ahi.msakabhaaradvaajo arahata.m ahosii''ti.

[03] 192^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M1.0167^ea^. atha kho ja.taabhaaradvaajo braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho ja.taabhaaradvaajo braahma.no bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[22] ta.m ta.m gotama pucchaami, ko ima.m vija.taye ja.ta''nti..
[21] ``siile pati.t.thaaya naro sapa~n~no, citta.m pa~n~na~nca bhaavaya.m.
[22] aataapii nipako bhikkhu, so ima.m vija.taye ja.ta.m..
[21] ``yesa.m raago ca doso ca, avijjaa ca viraajitaa.
[22] pa.tigha.m ruupasa~n~naa ca, etthesaa chijjate ja.taa''ti..
[03] eva.m ^a^T1.0243^ea^ vutte, ja.taabhaaradvaajo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa bhaaradvaajo arahata.m ahosii''ti.

[03] 193^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V1.0193^ea^. atha kho suddhikabhaaradvaajo braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m ^a^P1.0166^ea^ nisinno kho suddhikabhaaradvaajo braahma.no bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``na braahma.no {naabraahma.no (?)} sujjhati koci, loke siilavaapi tapokara.m.
[22] vijjaacara.nasampanno, so sujjhati na a~n~naa itaraa pajaa''ti..
[21] ``bahumpi palapa.m jappa.m, na jaccaa hoti braahma.no.
[22] pappoti parama.m suddhi.m, eva.m jaanaahi braahma.naa''ti..
[03] eva.m vutte, suddhikabhaaradvaajo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa bhaaradvaajo arahata.m ahosii''ti.

[03] 194^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T1.0244^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aggikabhaaradvaajassa braahma.nassa sappinaa paayaso sannihito hoti -- ``aggi.m juhissaami, aggihutta.m paricarissaamii''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. raajagahe sapadaana.m pi.n.daaya caramaano yena aggikabhaaradvaajassa braahma.nassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami ^a^V1.0194^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. addasaa kho aggikabhaaradvaajo braahma.no bhagavanta.m pi.n.daaya .thita.m. disvaana bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``bahumpi palapa.m jappa.m, na jaccaa hoti braahma.no.
[03] eva.m ^a^V1.0195^ea^ vutte, aggikabhaaradvaajo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa aggikabhaaradvaajo arahata.m ahosii''ti.

[03] 195^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu viharati sundarikaaya nadiyaa tiire. tena kho pana samayena sundarikabhaaradvaajo braahma.no sundarikaaya nadiyaa tiire aggi.m juhati, aggihutta.m paricarati. atha kho sundarikabhaaradvaajo braahma.no aggi.m juhitvaa aggihutta.m paricaritvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa samantaa catuddisaa anuvilokesi -- ``ko nu kho ima.m habyasesa.m bhu~njeyyaa''ti? addasaa kho sundarikabhaaradvaajo braahma.no bhagavanta.m a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule sasiisa.m paaruta.m nisinna.m. disvaana vaamena hatthena ^a^T1.0246^ea^ habyasesa.m gahetvaa dakkhi.nena hatthena kama.n.dalu.m gahetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami. atha kho bhagavaa sundarikabhaaradvaajassa braahma.nassa padasaddena siisa.m vivari. atha kho sundarikabhaaradvaajo braahma.no `mu.n.do aya.m ^a^P1.0168^ea^ bhava.m, mu.n.dako aya.m bhava'nti tatova puna nivattitukaamo ahosi. atha kho sundarikabhaaradvaajassa braahma.nassa etadahosi -- `mu.n.daapi hi idhekacce braahma.naa bhavanti; ya.mnuunaaha.m ta.m upasa"nkamitvaa jaati.m puccheyya'nti.
[03] atha kho sundarikabhaaradvaajo braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- `ki.mjacco bhava'nti?

[03] ``atha kassa caaha.m, bho gotama, ima.m habyasesa.m dammii''ti? ``na khvaaha.m, braahma.na, passaami sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya yasseso habyaseso bhutto sammaa pari.naama.m gaccheyya ^a^P1.0169^ea^ a~n~natra, braahma.na, tathaagatassa vaa tathaagatasaavakassa vaa. tena hi tva.m, braahma.na, ta.m habyasesa.m appaharite vaa cha.d.dehi appaa.nake vaa udake opilaapehii''ti.

[03] atha kho sundarikabhaaradvaajo braahma.no ta.m habyasesa.m appaa.nake udake opilaapesi. atha kho so habyaseso udake pakkhitto cicci.taayati ^a^M1.0171^ea^ ci.tici.taayati sandhuupaayati sampadhuupaayati ^a^V1.0197^ea^. seyyathaapi naama ^a^T1.0248^ea^ phaalo {loho (ka0)} divasa.msantatto {divasasantatto (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} udake pakkhitto cicci.taayati ci.tici.taayati sandhuupaayati sampadhuupaayati; evameva so habyaseso udake pakkhitto cicci.taayati ci.tici.taayati sandhuupaayati sampadhuupaayati.

[03] atha kho sundarikabhaaradvaajo braahma.no sa.mviggo lomaha.t.thajaato yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thita.m kho sundarikabhaaradvaaja.m braahma.na.m bhagavaa gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[26] na hi tena suddhi.m kusalaa vadanti,
[27] ajjhattamevujjalayaami {ajjhattameva jalayaami (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} joti.m.
[03] eva.m ^a^M1.0172^ea^ vutte, sundarikabhaaradvaajo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa bhaaradvaajo arahata.m ahosii''ti.

[03] 196^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu viharati a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de. tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhaaradvaajagottassa braahma.nassa catuddasa baliibaddaa na.t.thaa honti. atha kho bhaaradvaajagotto braahma.no te baliibadde gavesanto yena so vanasa.n.do tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa addasa bhagavanta.m tasmi.m vanasa.n.de nisinna.m palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. disvaana yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato santike imaa gaathaayo abhaasi --
[21] ``na ^a^T1.0250^ea^ hi nuunimassa {nahanuunimassa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} sama.nassa, baliibaddaa catuddasa.
[22] ajjasa.t.thi.m na dissanti, tenaaya.m sama.no sukhii..
[22] ekapa.n.naa dupa.n.naa {dvipa.n.naa (sii0 pii0)} ca, tenaaya.m sama.no sukhii..
[21] ``na ^a^V1.0199^ea^ hi nuunimassa sama.nassa, vidhavaa satta dhiitaro.
[22] ekaputtaa duputtaa {dviputtaa (sii0 pii0)} ca, tenaaya.m sama.no sukhii..
[22] sotta.m paadena bodheti, tenaaya.m sama.no sukhii..
[22] detha dethaati codenti, tenaaya.m sama.no sukhii''ti..
[22] ajjasa.t.thi.m na dissanti, tenaaha.m braahma.naa sukhii..
[22] ekapa.n.naa dupa.n.naa ca, tenaaha.m braahma.naa sukhii..
[21] ``na hi mayha.m braahma.na, vidhavaa satta dhiitaro.
[22] ekaputtaa duputtaa ca, tenaaha.m braahma.naa sukhii..
[22] sotta.m paadena bodheti, tenaaha.m braahma.naa sukhii..
[22] detha dethaati codenti, tenaaha.m braahma.naa sukhii''ti..

[03] eva.m vutte, bhaaradvaajagotto braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama! seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti; evameva bhotaa gotamena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. labheyyaaha.m bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajja.m, labheyya.m upasampada''nti.

[03] alattha kho bhaaradvaajagotto braahma.no bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, alattha upasampada.m. aciruupasampanno panaayasmaa bhaaradvaajo eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m ^a^T1.0252^ea^ di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m ^a^M1.0174^ea^ itthattaayaa''ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa bhaaradvaajo arahata.m ahosiiti.

[03] 197^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0253^ea^ ^a^V1.0201^ea^ ^a^P1.0172^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa magadhesu viharati dakkhi.naagirismi.m ekanaa.laaya.m braahma.nagaame. tena kho pana samayena kasibhaaradvaajassa {kasikabhaaradvaajassa (ka0)} braahma.nassa pa~ncamattaani na"ngalasataani payuttaani honti vappakaale. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena kasibhaaradvaajassa braahma.nassa kammanto tenupasa"nkami.

[01] tena kho pana samayena kasibhaaradvaajassa braahma.nassa parivesanaa vattati. atha kho bhagavaa yena parivesanaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. addasaa kho kasibhaaradvaajo braahma.no bhagavanta.m pi.n.daaya .thita.m. disvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aha.m kho, sama.na, kasaami ca vapaami ca, kasitvaa ca vapitvaa ca bhu~njaami. tvampi, sama.na, kasassu ca vapassu ca, kasitvaa ca vapitvaa ca bhu~njassuu''ti. ``ahampi kho, braahma.na, kasaami ca vapaami ca, kasitvaa ca vapitvaa ca bhu~njaamii''ti. na kho maya.m passaama bhoto gotamassa yuga.m vaa na"ngala.m vaa phaala.m vaa paacana.m vaa baliibadde vaa, atha ca pana ^a^T1.0254^ea^ bhava.m gotamo evamaaha -- ``ahampi kho, braahma.na, kasaami ca vapaami ca, kasitvaa ca vapitvaa ca bhu~njaamii''ti ^a^M1.0175^ea^. atha kho kasibhaaradvaajo braahma.no bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``kassako pa.tijaanaasi, na ca passaami te kasi.m.
[22] kassako pucchito bruuhi, katha.m jaanemu ta.m kasi''nti..
[21] ``saddhaa biija.m tapo vu.t.thi, pa~n~naa me yugana"ngala.m.
[22] hirii iisaa mano yotta.m, sati me phaalapaacana.m..
[22] sacca.m karomi niddaana.m, soracca.m me pamocana.m..
[22] gacchati anivattanta.m, yattha gantvaa na socati..
[03] ``bhu~njatu bhava.m gotamo. kassako bhava.m. ya~nhi bhava.m gotamo amatapphalampi kasi.m kasatii''ti {bhaasatiiti (ka0)}.
[03] eva.m vutte, kasibhaaradvaajo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.

[03] 198^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena ^a^V1.0203^ea^ udayassa braahma.nassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami. atha ^a^M1.0176^ea^ kho udayo braahma.no bhagavato patta.m odanena puuresi. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena udayassa braahma.nassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami...pe0... tatiyampi kho udayo braahma.no bhagavato patta.m odanena ^a^P1.0174^ea^ puuretvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``paka.t.thakoya.m sama.no gotamo punappuna.m aagacchatii''ti.
[22] punappuna.m khetta.m kasanti kassakaa, punappuna.m dha~n~namupeti ra.t.tha.m..
[21] ``punappuna.m khiiranikaa duhanti, punappuna.m vaccho upeti maatara.m.
[22] punappuna.m kilamati phandati ca, punappuna.m gabbhamupeti mando..
[21] ``punappuna.m jaayati miiyati ca, punappuna.m sivathika.m {siivathika.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} haranti.
[22] magga~nca laddhaa apunabbhavaaya, na punappuna.m jaayati bhuuripa~n~no''ti {punappuna.m jaayati bhuuripa~n~noti (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}..
[03] eva.m vutte, udayo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.

[03] 199^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T1.0257^ea^. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa vaatehaabaadhiko hoti; aayasmaa ca upavaa.no bhagavato upa.t.thaako hoti. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m upavaa.na.m aamantesi -- ``i"ngha me tva.m, upavaa.na, u.nhodaka.m jaanaahii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa upavaa.no bhagavato pa.tissutvaa nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena devahitassa braahma.nassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa tu.nhiibhuuto ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. addasaa kho devahito braahma.no aayasmanta.m ^a^V1.0204^ea^ upavaa.na.m tu.nhiibhuuta.m ekamanta.m .thita.m. disvaana aayasmanta.m upavaa.na.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[22] ki.m patthayaano ki.m esa.m, ki.m nu yaacitumaagato''ti..
[22] sace u.nhodaka.m atthi, munino dehi braahma.na..
[22] apacito apaceyyaana.m {apacineyyaana.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0) .tiikaa oloketabbaa}, tassa icchaami haatave''ti..

[03] atha kho devahito braahma.no u.nhodakassa kaaja.m purisena gaahaapetvaa phaa.nitassa ca pu.ta.m aayasmato upavaa.nassa paadaasi. atha kho aayasmaa upavaa.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m ^a^T1.0258^ea^ u.nhodakena nhaapetvaa {nahaapetvaa (sii0 pii0)} u.nhodakena phaa.nita.m aaloletvaa bhagavato paadaasi. atha kho bhagavato aabaadho pa.tippassambhi.

[03] atha kho devahito braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho devahito braahma.no bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[03] eva.m vutte, devahito braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.

[03] 200^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M1.0178^ea^. atha kho a~n~nataro braahma.namahaasaalo luukho luukhapaavura.no ^a^P1.0176^ea^ {luukhapaapura.no (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ta.m braahma.namahaasaala.m bhagavaa ^a^T1.0259^ea^ etadavoca -- ``kinnu tva.m, braahma.na, luukho luukhapaavura.no''ti? ``idha me, bho gotama, cattaaro puttaa. te ma.m daarehi sa.mpuccha gharaa nikkhaamentii''ti. ``tena hi tva.m, braahma.na, imaa gaathaayo pariyaapu.nitvaa sabhaaya.m mahaajanakaaye sannipatite puttesu ca sannisinnesu bhaasassu --
[22] te ma.m daarehi sa.mpuccha, saava vaarenti suukara.m..
[21] ``asantaa kira ma.m jammaa, taata taataati bhaasare.
[21] ``da.n.dova kira me seyyo, ya~nce puttaa anassavaa.
[22] ca.n.dampi go.na.m vaareti, atho ca.n.dampi kukkura.m..
[03] atha kho so braahma.namahaasaalo bhagavato santike imaa gaathaayo pariyaapu.nitvaa sabhaaya.m mahaajanakaaye sannipatite puttesu ca sannisinnesu abhaasi --
[22] te ^a^T1.0260^ea^ ma.m daarehi sa.mpuccha, saava vaarenti suukara.m..
[21] ``asantaa kira ma.m jammaa, taata taataati bhaasare.
[21] ``da.n.dova kira me seyyo, ya~nce puttaa anassavaa.
[22] ca.n.dampi go.na.m vaareti, atho ca.n.dampi kukkura.m..

[03] atha ^a^P1.0177^ea^ kho na.m braahma.namahaasaala.m puttaa ghara.m netvaa nhaapetvaa pacceka.m dussayugena acchaadesu.m. atha kho so braahma.namahaasaalo eka.m dussayuga.m aadaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho braahma.namahaasaalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``maya.m, bho gotama, braahma.naa naama aacariyassa aacariyadhana.m pariyesaama. pa.tigga.nhatu me bhava.m gotamo aacariyadhana''nti. pa.tiggahesi bhagavaa anukampa.m upaadaaya. atha kho so braahma.namahaasaalo bhagavanta.m ^a^V1.0207^ea^ etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.

[03] 201^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T1.0261^ea^. tena kho pana samayena maanatthaddho naama braahma.no saavatthiya.m pa.tivasati. so neva maatara.m abhivaadeti, na pitara.m abhivaadeti, na aacariya.m abhivaadeti, na je.t.thabhaatara.m abhivaadeti. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa mahatiyaa parisaaya parivuto dhamma.m deseti. atha kho maanatthaddhassa braahma.nassa etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho sama.no gotamo mahatiyaa parisaaya parivuto dhamma.m deseti. ya.mnuunaaha.m yena sama.no gotamo tenupasa"nkameyya.m. sace ma.m sama.no gotamo aalapissati, ahampi ta.m aalapissaami. no ce ma.m sama.no gotamo aalapissati, ahampi naalapissaamii''ti. atha kho maanatthaddho braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa tu.nhiibhuuto ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. atha kho bhagavaa ta.m naalapi. atha kho maanatthaddho braahma.no -- `naaya.m sama.no ^a^M1.0180^ea^ gotamo ki~nci jaanaatii'ti tatova puna nivattitukaamo ahosi. atha ^a^P1.0178^ea^ kho bhagavaa maanatthaddhassa braahma.nassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya maanatthaddha.m braahma.na.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
