[03] atha kho maanatthaddho braahma.no -- ``citta.m me sama.no gotamo jaanaatii''ti tattheva bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavato paadaani ^a^T1.0262^ea^ mukhena ca paricumbati paa.niihi ca parisambaahati, naama~nca saaveti -- ``maanatthaddhaaha.m, bho gotama, maanatthaddhaaha.m, bho gotamaa''ti. atha kho saa parisaa abbhutacittajaataa {abbhutacittajaataa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), acchariyabbhutacittajaataa (ka0)} ahosi -- `acchariya.m vata bho, abbhuta.m vata bho! aya~nhi maanatthaddho braahma.no neva maatara.m abhivaadeti, na pitara.m abhivaadeti, na aacariya.m abhivaadeti, na je.t.thabhaatara.m abhivaadeti; atha ca pana sama.ne gotame evaruupa.m paramanipaccakaara.m karotii'ti. atha kho bhagavaa maanatthaddha.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- ``ala.m, braahma.na ^a^V1.0208^ea^, u.t.thehi, sake aasane nisiida. yato te mayi citta.m pasanna''nti. atha kho maanatthaddho braahma.no sake aasane nisiiditvaa bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``kesu na maana.m kayiraatha, kesu cassa sagaaravo.
[22] kyassa apacitaa assu, kyassu saadhu supuujitaa''ti..
[22] nihacca maana.m athaddho, te namasse anuttare''ti..

[03] eva.m ^a^M1.0181^ea^ vutte, maanatthaddho braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.

[03] 202^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^T1.0263^ea^ ^a^P1.0179^ea^. tena kho pana samayena paccaniikasaato naama braahma.no saavatthiya.m pa.tivasati. atha kho paccaniikasaatassa braahma.nassa etadahosi -- ``ya.mnuunaaha.m yena sama.no gotamo tenupasa"nkameyya.m. ya.m yadeva sama.no gotamo bhaasissati ta.m tadevassaaha.m {tadeva saaha.m (ka0)} paccaniikaassa''nti {paccaniikassanti (pii0), paccaniikasaatanti (ka0)}. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa abbhokaase ca"nkamati. atha kho paccaniikasaato braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m ca"nkamanta.m etadavoca -- `bha.na sama.nadhamma'nti.
[22] aaghaata.m pa.tinissajja, sa ve {sace (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} ja~n~naa subhaasita''nti..

[03] eva.m vutte, paccaniikasaato braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.

[03] 203^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu viharati a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de ^a^T1.0264^ea^. tena kho pana samayena navakammikabhaaradvaajo braahma.no tasmi.m vanasa.n.de kammanta.m kaaraapeti. addasaa kho navakammikabhaaradvaajo braahma.no bhagavanta.m a~n~natarasmi.m saalarukkhamuule nisinna.m palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. disvaanassa etadahosi -- ``aha.m kho imasmi.m vanasa.n.de kammanta.m kaaraapento ramaami. aya.m sama.no gotamo ki.m kaaraapento ramatii''ti? atha ^a^M1.0182^ea^ kho navakammikabhaaradvaajo braahma.no yena bhagavaa ^a^P1.0180^ea^ tenupasa"nkami. upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``ke nu kammantaa kariiyanti, bhikkhu saalavane tava.

[01] eva.m ^a^V1.0210^ea^ vutte, navakammikabhaaradvaajo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.

[03] 204^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu viharati a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de. tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa bhaaradvaajagottassa braahma.nassa ^a^T1.0265^ea^ sambahulaa antevaasikaa ka.t.thahaarakaa maa.navakaa yena vanasa.n.do tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa addasa.msu bhagavanta.m tasmi.m vanasa.n.de nisinna.m palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. disvaana yena bhaaradvaajagotto braahma.no tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhaaradvaajagotta.m braahma.na.m etadavocu.m -- ``yagghe, bhava.m jaaneyyaasi! asukasmi.m vanasa.n.de sama.no nisinno palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa''. atha kho bhaaradvaajagotto braahma.no tehi maa.navakehi saddhi.m yena so vanasa.n.do tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho bhagavanta.m tasmi.m vanasa.n.de nisinna.m palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. disvaana yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[03] eva.m vutte, bhaaradvaajagotto braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.

[03] 205^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho maatuposako braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho maatuposako braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aha~nhi, bho ^a^T1.0267^ea^ gotama, dhammena bhikkha.m pariyesaami, dhammena bhikkha.m pariyesitvaa maataapitaro posemi. kaccaaha.m, bho gotama, eva.mkaarii kiccakaarii homii''ti? ``taggha tva.m, braahma.na, eva.mkaarii kiccakaarii hosi. yo kho, braahma.na, dhammena bhikkha.m pariyesati, dhammena bhikkha.m ^a^P1.0182^ea^ pariyesitvaa maataapitaro poseti, bahu.m so pu~n~na.m pasavatii''ti.
[21] ``yo ^a^V1.0212^ea^ ^a^M1.0184^ea^ maatara.m pitara.m vaa, macco dhammena posati.
[22] idheva na.m pasa.msanti, pecca sagge pamodatii''ti..

[03] eva.m vutte, maatuposako braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.

[03] 206^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha kho bhikkhako braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho bhikkhako braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ahampi kho, bho gotama, bhikkhako, bhavampi bhikkhako, idha no ki.m naanaakara.na''nti?
[21] ``na tena bhikkhako hoti, yaavataa bhikkhate pare.
[22] vissa.m dhamma.m samaadaaya, bhikkhu hoti na taavataa..
[22] sa"nkhaaya loke carati, sa ve bhikkhuuti vuccatii''ti..

[03] eva.m vutte, bhikkhako braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.

[03] 207^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. tena kho pana samayena sa"ngaaravo naama braahma.no saavatthiya.m pa.tivasati udakasuddhiko, udakena parisuddhi.m pacceti, saaya.m paata.m udakorohanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati. atha kho aayasmaa aanando pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya ^a^V1.0213^ea^ paavisi. saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m ^a^P1.0183^ea^ nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idha, bhante, sa"ngaaravo naama braahma.no saavatthiya.m pa.tivasati udakasuddhiko ^a^M1.0185^ea^, udakena suddhi.m pacceti, saaya.m paata.m udakorohanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati. saadhu, bhante, bhagavaa yena sa"ngaaravassa braahma.nassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena sa"ngaaravassa braahma.nassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami ^a^T1.0269^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho sa"ngaaravo braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho sa"ngaarava.m braahma.na.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sacca.m kira tva.m, braahma.na, udakasuddhiko, udakena suddhi.m paccesi, saaya.m paata.m udakorohanaanuyogamanuyutto viharasii''ti? ``eva.m, bho gotama''. ``ki.m pana tva.m, braahma.na, atthavasa.m sampassamaano udakasuddhiko, udakasuddhi.m paccesi, saaya.m paata.m udakorohanaanuyogamanuyutto viharasii''ti? ``idha me, bho gotama {idha me bho gotama aha.m (pii0 ka0)}, ya.m divaa paapakamma.m kata.m hoti, ta.m saaya.m nhaanena {nahaanena (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pavaahemi, ya.m ratti.m paapakamma.m kata.m hoti ta.m paata.m nhaanena pavaahemi. ima.m khvaaha.m, bho gotama, atthavasa.m sampassamaano udakasuddhiko, udakena suddhi.m paccemi, saaya.m paata.m udakorohanaanuyogamanuyutto viharaamii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, sa"ngaaravo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.

[03] 208^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0270^ea^ ^a^V1.0214^ea^ ^a^P1.0184^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati khomadussa.m naama.m sakyaana.m nigamo. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa ^a^M1.0186^ea^ pattaciivaramaadaaya khomadussa.m nigama.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. tena kho pana samayena khomadussakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa sabhaaya.m sannipatitaa honti kenacideva kara.niiyena, devo ca ekameka.m phusaayati. atha kho bhagavaa yena saa sabhaa tenupasa"nkami. addasa.msu khomadussakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa bhagavanta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana etadavocu.m -- ``ke ca mu.n.dakaa sama.nakaa, ke ca sabhaadhamma.m jaanissantii''ti? atha kho bhagavaa khomadussake braahma.nagahapatike gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[27] santo na te ye na vadanti dhamma.m.

[01] eva.m vutte, khomadussakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama; seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti, evameva.m bhotaa gotamena anekapariyaayena ^a^T1.0271^ea^ dhammo pakaasito. ete maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaama dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasake no bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupete sara.na.m gate''ti.
[22] maatuposaka.m bhikkhako, sa"ngaaravo ca khomadussena dvaadasaati..

[03] 209^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0272^ea^ ^a^V1.0215^ea^ ^a^M1.0187^ea^ ^a^P1.0185^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa va"ngiiso aa.laviya.m viharati aggaa.lave cetiye aayasmataa nigrodhakappena upajjhaayena saddhi.m. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa va"ngiiso navako hoti acirapabbajito ohiyyako vihaarapaalo. atha kho sambahulaa itthiyo samala"nkaritvaa yena aggaa.lavako aaraamo tenupasa"nkami.msu vihaarapekkhikaayo. atha kho aayasmato va"ngiisassa taa itthiyo disvaa anabhirati uppajjati, raago citta.m anuddha.mseti. atha kho aayasmato va"ngiisassa etadahosi -- ``alaabhaa vata me, na vata me laabhaa; dulladdha.m vata me, na vata me suladdha.m; yassa me anabhirati uppannaa, raago citta.m anuddha.mseti, ta.m kutettha labbhaa, ya.m me paro anabhirati.m vinodetvaa abhirati.m uppaadeyya. ya.mnuunaaha.m attanaava attano anabhirati.m vinodetvaa abhirati.m uppaadeyya''nti. atha kho aayasmaa va"ngiiso attanaava attano anabhirati.m vinodetvaa abhirati.m uppaadetvaa taaya.m velaaya.m imaa gaathaayo abhaasi --
[21] ``sacepi etato {ettato (sii0 pii0 ka0), ettakaa (syaa0 ka.m0)} bhiyyo, aagamissanti itthiyo.
[22] neva ma.m byaadhayissanti {byaathayissanti (?)}, dhamme samhi pati.t.thita.m..
[22] nibbaanagamana.m magga.m, tattha me nirato mano..
[22] tathaa maccu karissaami, na me maggampi dakkhasii''ti..

[03] 210^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M1.0188^ea^ samaya.m...pe0... aayasmaa va"ngiiso aa.laviya.m viharati aggaa.lave cetiye aayasmataa nigrodhakappena upajjhaayena saddhi.m. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa nigrodhakappo pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto vihaara.m pavisati, saaya.m vaa nikkhamati aparajju vaa kaale. tena kho pana samayena aayasmato va"ngiisassa anabhirati uppannaa hoti, raago citta.m anuddha.mseti. atha kho aayasmato va"ngiisassa etadahosi -- ``alaabhaa vata me, na vata me laabhaa; dulladdha.m vata me, na vata me suladdha.m; yassa me anabhirati uppannaa, raago citta.m anuddha.mseti; ta.m kutettha labbhaa, ya.m me paro anabhirati.m vinodetvaa abhirati.m uppaadeyya. ya.mnuunaaha.m attanaava attano anabhirati.m vinodetvaa abhirati.m uppaadeyya''nti. atha ^a^T1.0274^ea^ kho aayasmaa va"ngiiso attanaava attano anabhirati.m vinodetvaa abhirati.m uppaadetvaa taaya.m velaaya.m imaa gaathaayo abhaasi --
[22] vanatha.m na kareyya kuhi~nci, nibbanatho arato sa hi bhikkhu {sa bhikkhu (ka0)}..
[22] ki~nci parijiiyati sabbamanicca.m, eva.m samecca caranti mutattaa..
[21] ``upadhiisu janaa gadhitaase {gathitaase (sii0)}, di.t.thasute pa.tighe ca mute ca.
[22] ettha vinodaya chandamanejo, yo ettha na limpati ta.m munimaahu..
[21] ``atha ^a^V1.0217^ea^ ^a^P1.0187^ea^ sa.t.thinissitaa savitakkaa, puthuu janataaya adhammaa nivi.t.thaa.
[22] na ca vaggagatassa kuhi~nci, no pana du.t.thullabhaa.nii sa bhikkhu..
[22] santa.m ^a^T1.0275^ea^ pada.m ajjhagamaa muni pa.ticca, parinibbuto ka"nkhati kaala''ntntti..

[03] 211^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa va"ngiiso aa.laviya.m viharati aggaa.lave cetiye aayasmataa nigrodhakappena upajjhaayena saddhi.m. tena kho pana samayena ^a^M1.0189^ea^ aayasmaa va"ngiiso attano pa.tibhaanena a~n~ne pesale bhikkhuu atima~n~nati. atha kho aayasmato va"ngiisassa etadahosi -- ``alaabhaa vata me, na vata me laabhaa; dulladdha.m vata me, na vata me suladdha.m; yvaaha.m attano pa.tibhaanena a~n~ne pesale bhikkhuu atima~n~naamii''ti. atha kho aayasmaa va"ngiiso attanaava attano vippa.tisaara.m uppaadetvaa taaya.m velaaya.m imaa gaathaayo abhaasi --

[22] kitti~nca sukha~nca anubhoti, dhammadasoti tamaahu pahitatta.m..

[03] 212^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V1.0218^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa aanando saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho aayasmaa aanando pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi aayasmataa va"ngiisena pacchaasama.nena. tena kho pana samayena aayasmato va"ngiisassa anabhirati uppannaa hoti, raago citta.m anuddha.mseti. atha kho aayasmaa va"ngiiso aayasmanta.m aananda.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``sa"nkhaare parato passa, dukkhato maa ca attato.
[03] 213^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``catuuhi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagataa vaacaa subhaasitaa hoti, no dubbhaasitaa; anavajjaa ca ananuvajjaa ca vi~n~nuuna.m. katamehi catuuhi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ^a^V1.0219^ea^ subhaasita.myeva bhaasati no dubbhaasita.m, dhamma.myeva bhaasati no adhamma.m, piya.myeva ^a^P1.0189^ea^ bhaasati no appiya.m, sacca.myeva bhaasati no alika.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi a"ngehi samannaagataa vaacaa subhaasitaa hoti, no dubbhaasitaa, anavajjaa ca ananuvajjaa ca vi~n~nuuna''nti. idamavoca bhagavaa, ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --

[03] atha kho aayasmaa va"ngiiso u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``pa.tibhaati ma.m bhagavaa, pa.tibhaati ma.m sugataa''ti. ``pa.tibhaatu ta.m va"ngiisaa''ti bhagavaa avoca. atha kho aayasmaa va"ngiiso bhagavanta.m sammukhaa saaruppaahi gaathaahi abhitthavi --
[22] pare ca na vihi.mseyya, saa ve vaacaa subhaasitaa..
[22] ya.m anaadaaya paapaani, paresa.m bhaasate piya.m..
[21] ``sacca.m ^a^M1.0191^ea^ ve amataa vaacaa, esa dhammo sanantano.
[22] sacce atthe ca dhamme ca, aahu santo pati.t.thitaa..

[03] 214^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T1.0279^ea^ ^a^V1.0220^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa saariputto saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu dhammiyaa kathaaya sandasseti samaadapeti samuttejeti sampaha.mseti poriyaa vaacaaya vissa.t.thaaya anelagalaaya {ane.lagalaaya (sii0 ka0), anelaga.laaya (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa. te ca bhikkhuu a.t.thi.m katvaa manasi katvaa sabbacetasaa samannaaharitvaa ohitasotaa dhamma.m su.nanti. atha kho aayasmato va"ngiisassa etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho aayasmaa ^a^P1.0190^ea^ saariputto bhikkhuu dhammiyaa kathaaya sandasseti samaadapeti samuttejeti sampaha.mseti poriyaa vaacaaya vissa.t.thaaya anelagalaaya atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa. te ca bhikkhuu a.t.thi.m katvaa manasi katvaa sabbacetasaa samannaaharitvaa ohitasotaa dhamma.m su.nanti. ya.mnuunaaha.m aayasmanta.m saariputta.m sammukhaa saaruppaahi gaathaahi abhitthaveyya''nti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa va"ngiiso u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yenaayasmaa saariputto tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``pa.tibhaati ma.m, aavuso saariputta, pa.tibhaati ma.m, aavuso saariputtaa''ti. ``pa.tibhaatu ta.m, aavuso va"ngiisaa''ti. atha kho aayasmaa va"ngiiso aayasmanta.m saariputta.m sammukhaa saaruppaahi gaathaahi abhitthavi --
[22] saa.likaayiva nigghoso, pa.tibhaana.m udiirayi {udiiriyi (syaa0 ka.m0) udiiriyati (saama~n~naphalasutta.tiikaanuruupa.m)}..

[03] 215^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V1.0221^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati pubbaaraame migaaramaatupaasaade mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi sabbeheva arahantehi. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa tadahuposathe pannarase pavaara.naaya bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto abbhokaase nisinno hoti. atha kho bhagavaa tu.nhiibhuuta.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m anuviloketvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``handa daani, bhikkhave, pavaaremi vo. na ca me ki~nci garahatha kaayika.m vaa vaacasika.m vaa''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, aayasmaa saariputto u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``na kho maya.m, bhante, bhagavato ki~nci garahaama kaayika.m vaa vaacasika.m vaa. bhagavaa hi ^a^P1.0191^ea^, bhante, anuppannassa maggassa uppaadetaa, asa~njaatassa maggassa sa~njanetaa, anakkhaatassa maggassa akkhaataa, magga~n~nuu maggaviduu maggakovido. maggaanugaa ca, bhante, etarahi saavakaa viharanti pacchaa samannaagataa; aha~nca kho, bhante, bhagavanta.m pavaaremi. na ca me bhagavaa ki~nci garahati kaayika.m vaa vaacasika.m vaa''ti.

[03] ``na khvaaha.m te, saariputta, ki~nci garahaami kaayika.m vaa vaacasika.m vaa. pa.n.dito tva.m, saariputta, mahaapa~n~no tva.m, saariputta ^a^T1.0281^ea^, puthupa~n~no tva.m, saariputta, haasapa~n~no tva.m, saariputta, javanapa~n~no tva.m, saariputta, tikkhapa~n~no tva.m, saariputta, nibbedhikapa~n~no tva.m, saariputta. seyyathaapi, saariputta, ra~n~no cakkavattissa je.t.thaputto pitaraa pavattita.m cakka.m sammadeva anuppavatteti; evameva kho tva.m, saariputta, mayaa anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavattita.m sammadeva anuppavattesii''ti.

[03] ``no ce kira me, bhante, bhagavaa ki~nci garahati kaayika.m vaa vaacasika.m vaa. imesa.m pana, bhante, bhagavaa pa~ncanna.m bhikkhusataana.m na ki~nci garahati kaayika.m vaa vaacasika.m vaa''ti. ``imesampi khvaaha.m, saariputta, pa~ncanna.m bhikkhusataana.m na ^a^M1.0193^ea^ ki~nci garahaami kaayika.m vaa vaacasika.m vaa. imesa~nhi, saariputta, pa~ncanna.m bhikkhusataana.m sa.t.thi bhikkhuu tevijjaa, sa.t.thi bhikkhuu cha.labhi~n~naa, sa.t.thi bhikkhuu ubhatobhaagavimuttaa, atha itare pa~n~naavimuttaa''ti.

[03] atha ^a^V1.0222^ea^ kho aayasmaa va"ngiiso u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``pa.tibhaati ma.m bhagavaa, pa.tibhaati ma.m sugataa''ti. ``pa.tibhaatu ta.m, va"ngiisaa''ti bhagavaa avoca. atha kho aayasmaa va"ngiiso bhagavanta.m sammukhaa saaruppaahi gaathaahi abhitthavi --

[03] 216^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m a.d.dhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa bhikkhuu nibbaanapa.tisa.myuttaaya dhammiyaa kathaaya sandasseti samaadapeti samuttejeti sampaha.mseti. te ca bhikkhuu a.t.thi.m katvaa manasi katvaa sabbacetasaa samannaaharitvaa ohitasotaa dhamma.m su.nanti. atha kho aayasmato va"ngiisassa etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu nibbaanapa.tisa.myuttaaya dhammiyaa kathaaya sandasseti samaadapeti samuttejeti sampaha.mseti. te ca bhikkhuu a.t.thi.m katvaa manasi katvaa sabbacetasaa samannaaharitvaa ohitasotaa dhamma.m su.nanti. ya.mnuunaaha.m bhagavanta.m sammukhaa saaruppaahi gaathaahi abhitthaveyya''nti.

[03] atha ^a^T1.0283^ea^ ^a^V1.0223^ea^ ^a^M1.0194^ea^ kho aayasmaa va"ngiiso u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``pa.tibhaati ma.m bhagavaa, pa.tibhaati ma.m sugataa''ti. ``pa.tibhaatu ta.m, va"ngiisaa''ti bhagavaa avoca. atha kho aayasmaa va"ngiiso bhagavanta.m sammukhaa saaruppaahi gaathaahi abhitthavi --
[22] saavako te mahaaviira, paade vandati va"ngiiso''ti..

[03] ``ki.m nu te, va"ngiisa, imaa gaathaayo pubbe parivitakkitaa, udaahu .thaanasova ta.m pa.tibhantii''ti? `na kho me, bhante, imaa gaathaayo pubbe parivitakkitaa, atha kho .thaanasova ma.m pa.tibhantii'ti. `tena hi ta.m, va"ngiisa, bhiyyosomattaaya pubbe aparivitakkitaa gaathaayo pa.tibhantuu'ti. `eva.m, bhante'ti kho aayasmaa va"ngiiso bhagavato pa.tissutvaa bhiyyosomattaaya ^a^T1.0284^ea^ bhagavanta.m pubbe aparivitakkitaahi gaathaahi abhitthavi --
[21] ``ummaggapatha.m {ummaggasata.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} maarassa abhibhuyya, carati pabhijja khilaani.
[22] ta.m passatha bandhapamu~ncakara.m, asita.m bhaagaso pavibhaja.m..
[21] ``pajjotakaro ^a^V1.0224^ea^ ativijjha {ativijjha dhamma.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}, sabba.t.thitiina.m atikkamamaddasa.
[22] ~natvaa ca sacchikatvaa ca, agga.m so desayi dasaddhaana.m..
[27] ko pamaado vijaanata.m dhamma.m {ko pamaado vijaanata.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}.

[03] 217^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho aayasmaa a~n~naasiko.n.da~n~no {a~n~naako.n.da~n~no (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} sucirasseva yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa ^a^T1.0285^ea^ bhagavato paadaani mukhena ca paricumbati, paa.niihi ^a^P1.0194^ea^ ca parisambaahati, naama~nca saaveti -- ``ko.n.da~n~noha.m, bhagavaa, ko.n.da~n~noha.m, sugataa''ti. atha kho aayasmato va"ngiisassa etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho aayasmaa a~n~naasiko.n.da~n~no sucirasseva yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavato paadaani mukhena ca paricumbati, paa.niihi ca parisambaahati, naama~nca saaveti -- `ko.n.da~n~noha.m, bhagavaa, ko.n.da~n~noha.m, sugataa'ti. ya.mnuunaaha.m aayasmanta.m a~n~naasiko.n.da~n~na.m bhagavato sammukhaa saaruppaahi gaathaahi abhitthaveyya''nti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa va"ngiiso u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``pa.tibhaati ma.m, bhagavaa, pa.tibhaati ma.m, sugataa''ti. ``pa.tibhaatu ta.m, va"ngiisaa''ti bhagavaa avoca. atha kho aayasmaa va"ngiiso aayasmanta.m a~n~naasiko.n.da~n~na.m bhagavato sammukhaa saaruppaahi gaathaahi abhitthavi --

[03] 218^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M1.0196^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati isigilipasse kaa.lasilaaya.m mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi sabbeheva arahantehi. tesa.m suda.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano cetasaa citta.m samannesati {samanvesati (syaa0 a.t.tha0)} vippamutta.m nirupadhi.m. atha kho aayasmato va"ngiisassa etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho bhagavaa raajagahe viharati isigilipasse kaa.lasilaaya.m mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi sabbeheva arahantehi. tesa.m suda.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano cetasaa citta.m samannesati vippamutta.m nirupadhi.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m bhagavato sammukhaa saaruppaahi gaathaahi abhitthaveyya''nti.

[03] atha ^a^P1.0195^ea^ kho aayasmaa va"ngiiso u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``pa.tibhaati ma.m, bhagavaa, pa.tibhaati ma.m, sugataa''ti. ``pa.tibhaatu ta.m, va"ngiisaa''ti bhagavaa avoca. atha kho aayasmaa va"ngiiso aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m bhagavato sammukhaa saaruppaahi gaathaahi abhitthavi --
[21] ``te ^a^T1.0287^ea^ cetasaa anupariyeti {anupariyesati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}, moggallaano mahiddhiko.
[22] citta.m nesa.m samannesa.m {samanvesa.m (syaa0 a.t.tha0)}, vippamutta.m niruupadhi.m..

[03] 219^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa campaaya.m viharati gaggaraaya pokkhara.niyaa tiire mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi sattahi ca upaasakasatehi sattahi ca upaasikaasatehi anekehi ca devataasahassehi. tyaassuda.m bhagavaa atirocati {ativirocati (ka0)} va.n.nena ceva yasasaa ca. atha kho aayasmato va"ngiisassa etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho ^a^M1.0197^ea^ bhagavaa campaaya.m viharati gaggaraaya pokkhara.niyaa tiire mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi sattahi ca upaasakasatehi sattahi ca upaasikaasatehi anekehi ca devataasahassehi. tyaassuda.m bhagavaa atirocati va.n.nena ceva yasasaa ca. ya.mnuunaaha.m bhagavanta.m sammukhaa saaruppaaya gaathaaya abhitthaveyya''nti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa va"ngiiso u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``pa.tibhaati ma.m, bhagavaa, pa.tibhaati ma.m, sugataa''ti. ``pa.tibhaatu ta.m, va"ngiisaa''ti bhagavaa avoca. atha kho aayasmaa va"ngiiso bhagavanta.m sammukhaa saaruppaaya gaathaaya abhitthavi --

[03] 220^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa va"ngiiso saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame ^a^V1.0227^ea^. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa va"ngiiso aciraarahattappatto hutvaa {hoti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} vimuttisukha.m pa.tisa.mvedii {vimuttisukhapa.tisa.mvedii (sii0 pii0)} taaya.m velaaya.m imaa gaathaayo abhaasi --
[21] ``kaaveyyamattaa vicarimha pubbe, gaamaa gaama.m puraa pura.m.
[21] ``so me dhammamadesesi, khandhaayatanadhaatuyo {khandhe aayatanaani dhaatuyo (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)}.
[21] ``svaagata.m ^a^M1.0198^ea^ vata me aasi, mama buddhassa santike.
[22] tisso vijjaa anuppattaa, kata.m buddhassa saasana.m..

[03] 221^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0290^ea^ ^a^V1.0228^ea^ ^a^P1.0197^ea^ ^a^M1.0199^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m a~n~nataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de. tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu divaavihaaragato paapake akusale vitakke vitakketi gehanissite. atha kho yaa tasmi.m vanasa.n.de adhivatthaa devataa tassa bhikkhuno anukampikaa atthakaamaa ta.m bhikkhu.m sa.mvejetukaamaa yena so bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``arati.m pajahaasi sato, bhavaasi sata.m ta.m saarayaamase.
[22] paataalarajo hi duttaro, maa ta.m kaamarajo avaahari..
[21] ``saku.no yathaa pa.msukunthito {pa.msuku.n.thito (ka0), pa.msuku.n.dito (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, vidhuna.m paatayati sita.m raja.m.
[22] eva.m ^a^T1.0291^ea^ bhikkhu padhaanavaa satimaa, vidhuna.m paatayati sita.m raja''ntntti..
[03] atha kho so bhikkhu taaya devataaya sa.mvejito sa.mvegamaapaadiiti.

[03] 222^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V1.0229^ea^ samaya.m a~n~nataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de. tena ^a^P1.0198^ea^ kho pana samayena so bhikkhu divaavihaaragato supati. atha kho yaa tasmi.m vanasa.n.de adhivatthaa devataa tassa bhikkhuno anukampikaa atthakaamaa ta.m bhikkhu.m sa.mvejetukaamaa yena so bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``u.t.thehi bhikkhu ki.m sesi, ko attho supitena {supinena (sii0)} te.
[22] aaturassa hi kaa niddaa, sallaviddhassa ruppato..
[21] ``yaaya ^a^M1.0200^ea^ saddhaaya pabbajito {yaaya saddhaapabbajito (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}, agaarasmaanagaariya.m.
[22] tameva saddha.m bruuhehi, maa niddaaya vasa.m gamii''ti..
[22] baddhesu {khandhesu (sii0)} mutta.m asita.m, kasmaa pabbajita.m tape..
[22] ta.m ~naa.na.m paramodaana.m {pariyodaata.m (sii0 pii0), paramodaata.m (syaa0 ka.m0), paramavodaana.m (sii0 a.t.tha0)}, kasmaa pabbajita.m tape..
[21] ``chetvaa ^a^T1.0292^ea^ {bhetvaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} avijja.m vijjaaya, aasavaana.m parikkhayaa.

[03] 223^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa kassapagotto kosalesu viharati a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de. tena ^a^V1.0230^ea^ kho pana samayena aayasmaa kassapagotto divaavihaaragato a~n~natara.m cheta.m ovadati. atha kho yaa tasmi.m vanasa.n.de adhivatthaa devataa aayasmanta.m kassapagotta.m sa.mvejetukaamaa yenaayasmaa kassapagotto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m kassapagotta.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[22] akaale ovada.m bhikkhu, mandova pa.tibhaati ma.m..
[22] dhammasmi.m bha~n~namaanasmi.m, attha.m baalo na bujjhati..
[22] neva dakkhati ruupaani, cakkhu hissa na vijjatii''ti..
[03] atha kho aayasmaa kassapagotto taaya devataaya sa.mvejito sa.mvegamaapaadiiti.

[03] 224^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T1.0293^ea^ ^a^M1.0201^ea^ samaya.m sambahulaa bhikkhuu kosalesu viharanti a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de. atha kho te bhikkhuu vassa.mvu.t.thaa {vassa.mvutthaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} temaasaccayena caarika.m pakkami.msu. atha kho yaa tasmi.m vanasa.n.de adhivatthaa devataa te bhikkhuu apassantii paridevamaanaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[03] eva.m vutte, a~n~nataraa devataa ta.m devata.m gaathaaya paccabhaasi --
[21] ``maagadha.m ^a^V1.0231^ea^ gataa kosala.m gataa, ekacciyaa pana vajjibhuumiyaa.
[22] magaa viya asa"ngacaarino, aniketaa viharanti bhikkhavo''ti..

[03] 225^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa aanando kosalesu viharati a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa aanando ativela.m gihisa~n~nattibahulo viharati. atha kho yaa tasmi.m vanasa.n.de adhivatthaa devataa aayasmato aanandassa ^a^T1.0294^ea^ anukampikaa atthakaamaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m sa.mvejetukaamaa yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[22] jhaa ^a^P1.0200^ea^ gotama maa pamaado {maa ca pamaado (sii0 pii0)}, ki.m te bi.libi.likaa karissatii''ti..
[03] atha kho aayasmaa aanando taaya devataaya sa.mvejito sa.mvegamaapaadiiti.

[03] 226^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa anuruddho kosalesu viharati a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de. atha kho a~n~nataraa taavati.msakaayikaa devataa jaalinii ^a^M1.0202^ea^ naama aayasmato anuruddhassa puraa.nadutiyikaa yenaayasmaa anuruddho tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``tattha citta.m pa.nidhehi, yattha te vusita.m pure.
[22] te caapi duggataa sattaa, devaka~n~naahi patthitaa''ti..
[21] ``na ^a^T1.0295^ea^ te sukha.m pajaananti, ye na passanti nandana.m.
[21] ``na tva.m baale vijaanaasi, yathaa arahata.m vaco.

[03] 227^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa naagadatto kosalesu viharati a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa naagadatto atikaalena gaama.m pavisati, atidivaa pa.tikkamati. atha kho yaa tasmi.m vanasa.n.de adhivatthaa devataa aayasmato naagadattassa anukampikaa atthakaamaa aayasmanta.m naagadatta.m sa.mvejetukaamaa yenaayasmaa naagadatto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^P1.0201^ea^ aayasmanta.m naagadatta.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``kaale pavisa naagadatta, divaa ca aagantvaa ativelacaarii.
[22] maa heva maccura~n~no balavato, antakassa vasa.m upesii''ti {vasameyyaati (sii0 pii0), vasamesiiti (syaa0 ka.m0)}..
[03] atha ^a^M1.0203^ea^ kho aayasmaa naagadatto taaya devataaya sa.mvejito sa.mvegamaapaadiiti.

[03] 228^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T1.0296^ea^ ^a^V1.0233^ea^ samaya.m a~n~nataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de. tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu a~n~natarasmi.m kule ativela.m ajjhogaa.lhappatto viharati. atha kho yaa tasmi.m vanasa.n.de adhivatthaa devataa tassa bhikkhuno anukampikaa atthakaamaa ta.m bhikkhu.m sa.mvejetukaamaa yaa tasmi.m kule kulaghara.nii, tassaa va.n.na.m abhinimminitvaa yena so bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[22] janaa sa"ngamma mantenti, ma~nca ta~nca {tva~nca (ka0)} kimantara''nti..
[22] na tena ma"nku hotabba.m, na hi tena kilissati..
[22] lahucittoti ta.m aahu, naassa sampajjate vata''nti..

[03] 229^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m a~n~nataro vajjiputtako bhikkhu vesaaliya.m viharati a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de. tena kho pana samayena vesaaliya.m vajjiputtako sabbaratticaaro hoti. atha ^a^P1.0202^ea^ kho so bhikkhu vesaaliyaa tuuriya-taa.lita-vaadita-nigghosasadda.m ^a^T1.0297^ea^ sutvaa paridevamaano taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[22] ko su naamamhehi {naama amhehi (sii0 pii0)} paapiyo''ti..

[03] atha ^a^V1.0234^ea^ kho yaa tasmi.m vanasa.n.de adhivatthaa devataa tassa bhikkhuno anukampikaa atthakaamaa ta.m bhikkhu.m sa.mvejetukaamaa yena so bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``ekakova ^a^M1.0204^ea^ tva.m ara~n~ne viharasi, apaviddha.mva vanasmi.m daaruka.m.
[22] tassa te bahukaa pihayanti, nerayikaa viya saggagaamina''nti..
[03] atha kho so bhikkhu taaya devataaya sa.mvejito sa.mvegamaapaadiiti.

[03] 230^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m a~n~nataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de. tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu ya.m suda.m pubbe ativela.m sajjhaayabahulo viharati so aparena samayena appossukko tu.nhiibhuuto sa"nkasaayati. atha kho yaa tasmi.m vanasa.n.de adhivatthaa devataa tassa bhikkhuno dhamma.m asu.nantii yena so bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m ^a^T1.0298^ea^ bhikkhu.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``kasmaa tuva.m dhammapadaani bhikkhu, naadhiiyasi bhikkhuuhi sa.mvasanto.
[22] sutvaana dhamma.m labhatippasaada.m, di.t.theva dhamme labhatippasa.msa''nti..
[21] ``ahu pure dhammapadesu chando, yaava viraagena samaagamimha.
[27] yato ^a^P1.0203^ea^ viraagena samaagamimha, ya.m ki~nci di.t.tha.mva suta.m muta.m vaa.

[03] 231^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m a~n~nataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de. tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu divaavihaaragato paapake akusale vitakke vitakketi, seyyathida.m ^a^V1.0235^ea^ -- kaamavitakka.m, byaapaadavitakka.m, vihi.msaavitakka.m. atha kho yaa tasmi.m vanasa.n.de adhivatthaa devataa tassa bhikkhuno anukampikaa atthakaamaa ta.m bhikkhu.m sa.mvejetukaamaa yena so bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[03] atha kho so bhikkhu taaya devataaya sa.mvejito sa.mvegamaapaadiiti.

[03] 232^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m a~n~nataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de. atha kho tasmi.m vanasa.n.de adhivatthaa devataa yena so bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa tassa bhikkhuno santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``.thite majjhanhike kaale, sannisiivesu {sannisinnesu (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pakkhisu.
[22] sa.nateva brahaara~n~na.m, ta.m bhaya.m pa.tibhaati ma.m..
[22] sa.nateva brahaara~n~na.m, saa rati pa.tibhaati ma''nti..

[03] 233^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m sambahulaa bhikkhuu kosalesu viharanti a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de uddhataa unna.laa capalaa mukharaa viki.n.navaacaa ^a^P1.0204^ea^ mu.t.thassatino asampajaanaa asamaahitaa vibbhantacittaa ^a^V1.0236^ea^ paakatindriyaa. atha ^a^T1.0300^ea^ kho yaa tasmi.m vanasa.n.de adhivatthaa devataa tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m anukampikaa atthakaamaa te bhikkhuu sa.mvejetukaamaa yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[22] apaviddhaa {apavi.t.thaa (syaa0 ka.m0)} anaathaa te, yathaa petaa tatheva te..
[21] ``ye kho pamattaa viharanti, te me sandhaaya bhaasita.m.
[22] ye appamattaa viharanti, namo tesa.m karomaha''nti..
[03] atha kho te bhikkhuu taaya devataaya sa.mvejitaa sa.mvegamaapaadunti.

[03] 234^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m a~n~nataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de. tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto pokkhara.ni.m ogaahetvaa paduma.m upasi"nghati. atha kho yaa tasmi.m vanasa.n.de adhivatthaa devataa tassa bhikkhuno anukampikaa atthakaamaa ta.m bhikkhu.m sa.mvejetukaamaa yena ^a^T1.0301^ea^ so bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``na ^a^V1.0237^ea^ haraami na bha~njaami, aaraa si"nghaami vaarija.m.
[22] atha kena nu va.n.nena, gandhatthenoti vuccati..
[22] eva.m aaki.n.nakammanto, kasmaa eso na vuccatii''ti..
[22] tasmi.m me vacana.m natthi, tva~ncaarahaami vattave..
[21] ``addhaa ma.m yakkha jaanaasi, atho me anukampasi.
[22] punapi yakkha vajjaasi, yadaa passasi edisa''nti..
[22] tvameva bhikkhu jaaneyya, yena gaccheyya suggati''nti..
[03] atha kho so bhikkhu taaya devataaya sa.mvejito sa.mvegamaapaadiiti.

[03] 235^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0303^ea^ ^a^V1.0238^ea^ ^a^M1.0208^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m ^a^P1.0206^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati indakuu.te pabbate, indakassa yakkhassa bhavane. atha kho indako yakkho yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``ruupa.m na jiivanti vadanti buddhaa, katha.m nvaya.m vindatima.m sariira.m.
[22] kutassa a.t.thiiyakapi.n.dameti, katha.m nvaya.m sajjati gabbharasmi''nti..
[27] abbudaa jaayate pesi, pesi nibbattatii ghano.
[22] ghanaa pasaakhaa jaayanti, kesaa lomaa nakhaapi ca..
[22] tena so tattha yaapeti, maatukucchigato naro''ti..

[03] 236^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate. atha kho sakkanaamako yakkho yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^T1.0304^ea^ bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[22] sama.nassa na ta.m saadhu, yada~n~namanusaasasii''ti {yada~n~namanusaasatiiti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}..
[22] na ta.m arahati sappa~n~no, manasaa anukampitu.m..
[22] na tena hoti sa.myutto, yaanukampaa {saanukampaa (sii0 pii0)} anuddayaa''ti..

[03] 237^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^P1.0207^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa gayaaya.m viharati .ta"nkitama~nce suucilomassa yakkhassa bhavane. tena kho pana samayena kharo ca yakkho suucilomo ^a^M1.0209^ea^ ca yakkho bhagavato aviduure atikkamanti. atha kho kharo yakkho suuciloma.m yakkha.m etadavoca -- ``eso sama.no''ti! ``neso sama.no, sama.nako eso''. ``yaava jaanaami yadi vaa so sama.no yadi vaa pana so sama.nako''ti.

[03] atha kho suucilomo yakkho yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato kaaya.m upanaamesi. atha kho bhagavaa kaaya.m apanaamesi. atha kho suucilomo yakkho bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``bhaayasi ma.m sama.naa''ti? ``na khvaaha.m ta.m, aavuso, bhaayaami; api ca te samphasso paapako''ti. ``pa~nha.m ta.m, sama.na pucchissaami. sace me na byaakarissasi, citta.m vaa te khipissaami, hadaya.m vaa te phaalessaami, paadesu ^a^T1.0305^ea^ vaa gahetvaa paaraga"ngaaya {paara.m ga"ngaaya (ka0)} khipissaamii''ti. ``na khvaaha.m ta.m, aavuso, passaami sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya, yo me citta.m vaa khipeyya hadaya.m vaa phaaleyya paadesu vaa gahetvaa paaraga"ngaaya khipeyya; api ca tva.m, aavuso, puccha yadaa ka"nkhasii''ti. atha kho suucilomo yakkho bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi -- ( ) {(atha kho suucilomo yakkho bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi.) (sii0)}
[22] puthuu visattaa kaamesu, maaluvaava vitataa {vitthataa (syaa0 ka.m0)} vane..

[03] 238^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T1.0306^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa magadhesu viharati ma.nimaalike cetiye ma.nibhaddassa yakkhassa bhavane. atha kho ma.nibhaddo yakkho yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[22] satiimato suve seyyo, veraa ca parimuccatii''ti..
[22] satiimato suve seyyo, veraa na parimuccati..
[21] ``yassa sabbamahoratta.m {ratti.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, ahi.msaaya rato mano.
[22] metta.m so sabbabhuutesu, vera.m tassa na kenacii''ti..

[03] 239^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarissaa upaasikaaya saanu naama putto yakkhena gahito hoti. atha kho saa upaasikaa paridevamaanaa taaya.m velaaya.m imaa gaathaayo abhaasi --
[27] na tehi yakkhaa kii.lanti, iti me arahata.m suta.m.
[22] saa daani ajja passaami, yakkhaa kii.lanti saanunaa''ti..
[21] ``na tehi yakkhaa kii.lanti, saahu te arahata.m suta.m.
[27] saanu.m pabuddha.m vajjaasi, yakkhaana.m vacana.m ida.m.
[22] maakaasi paapaka.m kamma.m, aavi vaa yadi vaa raho..
[21] ``sace ^a^V1.0242^ea^ ca {saceva (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0), ya~nceva (sii0)} paapaka.m kamma.m, karissasi karosi vaa.
[22] na te dukkhaa pamutyatthi, uppaccaapi palaayato''ti..
[21] ``mata.m vaa amma rodanti, yo vaa jiiva.m na dissati.
[22] jiivanta.m amma passantii, kasmaa ma.m amma rodasii''ti..
[21] ``mata.m vaa putta rodanti, yo vaa jiiva.m na dissati.
[27] yo ca kaame cajitvaana, punaraagacchate idha.
[22] ta.m vaapi putta rodanti, puna jiiva.m mato hi so..
[22] aadittaa niihata.m {nibbhata.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0), nibhata.m (pii0 ka0)} bha.n.da.m, puna .dayhitumicchasii''ti..

[03] 240^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa anuruddho saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa anuruddho rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya dhammapadaani bhaasati. atha kho piya"nkaramaataa yakkhinii puttaka.m eva.m tosesi --
[21] ``maa sadda.m kari piya"nkara, bhikkhu dhammapadaani bhaasati.
[22] api {api (sii0)} ca dhammapada.m vijaaniya, pa.tipajjema hitaaya no siyaa..
[22] sikkhema susiilyamattano {susiilamattano (sii0 ka0)}, api muccema pisaacayoniyaa''ti..

[03] 241^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V1.0243^ea^ ^a^M1.0212^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena ^a^P1.0210^ea^ kho pana samayena bhagavaa bhikkhuu nibbaanapa.tisa.myuttaaya dhammiyaa kathaaya sandasseti samaadapeti samuttejeti sampaha.mseti. te ca bhikkhuu a.t.thi.m katvaa manasi katvaa sabbacetasaa ^a^T1.0309^ea^ samannaaharitvaa ohitasotaa dhamma.m su.nanti. atha kho punabbasumaataa yakkhinii puttake eva.m tosesi --
[22] ativelaa ca me hoti, asmi.m dhamme piyaayanaa..
[21] ``piyo loke sako putto, piyo loke sako pati.
[22] tato piyataraa mayha.m, assa dhammassa magganaa..
[21] ``na hi putto pati vaapi, piyo dukkhaa pamocaye.
[22] ta.m dhamma.m sotumicchaami, tu.nhii hohi punabbasuu''ti..
[21] ``saadhu kho pa.n.dito naama, putto jaato uresayo.
[22] putto me buddhase.t.thassa, dhamma.m suddha.m piyaayati..

[03] 242^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M1.0213^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati siitavane. tena kho pana samayena anaathapi.n.diko gahapati raajagaha.m anuppatto hoti kenacideva kara.niiyena. assosi kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati -- ``buddho kira loke uppanno''ti. taavadeva ca pana bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitukaamo hoti. athassa ^a^P1.0211^ea^ anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa etadahosi -- ``akaalo kho ajja bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. sve daanaaha.m kaalena bhagavanta.m dassanaaya gamissaamii''ti buddhagataaya satiyaa nipajji. rattiyaa suda.m tikkhattu.m vu.t.thaasi pabhaatanti ma~n~namaano. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati yena sivathikadvaara.m {siivathikadvaara.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} tenupasa"nkami. amanussaa dvaara.m vivari.msu. atha kho anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa nagaramhaa nikkhamantassa aaloko antaradhaayi, andhakaaro paaturahosi, bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.mso udapaadi, tatova puna nivattitukaamo ahosi. atha kho sivako {siivako (sii0 pii0)} yakkho antarahito saddamanussaavesi --

[03] atha ^a^V1.0245^ea^ kho anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa andhakaaro antaradhaayi, aaloko paaturahosi, ya.m ahosi bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.mso, so pa.tippassambhi. dutiyampi kho anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa aaloko antaradhaayi, andhakaaro paaturahosi, bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.mso udapaadi, tatova puna nivattitukaamo ahosi. dutiyampi kho sivako yakkho antarahito saddamanussaavesi --

[03] atha ^a^T1.0312^ea^ kho anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa andhakaaro antaradhaayi ^a^P1.0212^ea^, aaloko paaturahosi, ya.m ahosi bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.mso, so pa.tippassambhi. tatiyampi kho anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa aaloko antaradhaayi, andhakaaro paaturahosi, bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.mso udapaadi, tatova puna nivattitukaamo ahosi. tatiyampi kho sivako yakkho antarahito saddamanussaavesi --

[03] atha kho anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa andhakaaro antaradhaayi, aaloko paaturahosi, ya.m ^a^V1.0246^ea^ ahosi bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.mso, so pa.tippassambhi. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati yena siitavana.m yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.

[03] tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya abbhokaase ca"nkamati. addasaa kho bhagavaa anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana ca"nkamaa orohitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``ehi sudattaa''ti. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati, naamena ma.m bhagavaa aalapatiiti, ha.t.tho udaggo tattheva bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kacci, bhante, bhagavaa sukhamasayitthaa''ti?
[22] yo na limpati kaamesu, siitibhuuto niruupadhi..
[22] upasanto sukha.m seti, santi.m pappuyya cetasaa''ti {cetasoti (sii0)}..

[03] 243^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M1.0215^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena sukkaa bhikkhunii mahatiyaa parisaaya parivutaa dhamma.m deseti. atha kho sukkaaya bhikkhuniyaa abhippasanno yakkho raajagahe rathikaaya ^a^T1.0313^ea^ rathika.m si"nghaa.takena si"nghaa.taka.m upasa"nkamitvaa taaya.m velaaya.m imaa gaathaayo abhaasi --
[21] ``ki.m me kataa raajagahe manussaa, madhupiitaava seyare.
[22] ye sukka.m na payirupaasanti, desenti.m amata.m pada.m..

[03] 244^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V1.0247^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena ^a^P1.0213^ea^ kho pana samayena a~n~nataro upaasako sukkaaya bhikkhuniyaa bhojana.m adaasi. atha kho sukkaaya bhikkhuniyaa abhippasanno yakkho raajagahe rathikaaya rathika.m si"nghaa.takena si"nghaa.taka.m upasa"nkamitvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``pu~n~na.m vata pasavi bahu.m, sappa~n~no vataaya.m upaasako.
[22] yo sukkaaya adaasi bhojana.m, sabbaganthehi vippamuttiyaa''ti {vippamuttaayaati (syaa0 ka.m0)}..

[03] 245^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro upaasako ciiraaya {ciraaya (ka0)} bhikkhuniyaa ciivara.m adaasi. atha ^a^T1.0314^ea^ kho ciiraaya bhikkhuniyaa abhippasanno yakkho raajagahe rathikaaya rathika.m si"nghaa.takena si"nghaa.taka.m upasa"nkamitvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``pu~n~na.m ^a^M1.0216^ea^ vata pasavi bahu.m, sappa~n~no vataaya.m upaasako.
[22] yo ciiraaya adaasi ciivara.m, sabbayogehi vippamuttiyaa''ti {vippamuttaayaati (syaa0 ka.m0)}..

[03] 246^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa aa.laviya.m viharati aa.lavakassa yakkhassa bhavane. atha kho aa.lavako yakkho yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``nikkhama, sama.naa''ti. ``saadhaavuso''ti bhagavaa nikkhami. ``pavisa, sama.naa''ti. ``saadhaavuso''ti bhagavaa paavisi. dutiyampi kho aa.lavako yakkho bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``nikkhama, sama.naa''ti. ``saadhaavuso''ti bhagavaa nikkhami. ``pavisa, sama.naa''ti. ``saadhaavuso''ti bhagavaa paavisi. tatiyampi ^a^P1.0214^ea^ kho aa.lavako yakkho bhagavanta.m etadavoca ^a^V1.0248^ea^ -- ``nikkhama, sama.naa''ti. ``saadhaavuso''ti bhagavaa nikkhami. ``pavisa, sama.naa''ti. ``saadhaavuso''ti bhagavaa paavisi. catutthampi kho aa.lavako yakkho bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``nikkhama, sama.naa''ti. ``na khvaaha.m ta.m, aavuso, nikkhamissaami. ya.m te kara.niiya.m ta.m karohii''ti. ``pa~nha.m ta.m, sama.na, pucchissaami. sace me na byaakarissasi, citta.m vaa te khipissaami, hadaya.m vaa te phaalessaami, paadesu vaa gahetvaa paaraga"ngaaya khipissaamii''ti. ``na khvaaha.m ta.m, aavuso, passaami sadevake loke samaarake ^a^T1.0315^ea^ sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya, ye me citta.m vaa khipeyya hadaya.m vaa phaaleyya, paadesu vaa gahetvaa paaraga"ngaaya khipeyya. api ca tva.m, aavuso, puccha yadaa ka"nkhasii''ti {(atha kho aa.lavako yakkho bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi.) (sii0)}.
[21] ``ki.msuudha vitta.m purisassa se.t.tha.m, ki.msu suci.n.na.m sukhamaavahaati.
[22] ki.msu have saadutara.m rasaana.m, katha.mjiivi.m jiivitamaahu se.t.tha''nti..
[21] ``saddhiidha vitta.m purissa se.t.tha.m, dhammo suci.n.no sukhamaavahaati.
[22] sacca.m have saadutara.m rasaana.m, pa~n~naajiivi.m jiivitamaahu se.t.tha''nti..
[27] katha.msu kitti.m pappoti, katha.m mittaani ganthati.
[22] asmaa lokaa para.m loka.m, katha.m pecca na socatii''ti..
[22] sussuusa.m ^a^T1.0316^ea^ {sussuusaa (sii0 pii0)} labhate pa~n~na.m, appamatto vicakkha.no..
[27] saccena ^a^P1.0215^ea^ kitti.m pappoti, dada.m mittaani ganthati.
[22] asmaa lokaa para.m loka.m, eva.m pecca na socati..
[22] sacca.m dammo dhiti caago, sa ve pecca na socati..
[22] yadi saccaa dammaa caagaa, khantyaa bhiyyodha vijjatii''ti..
[22] yoha.m {soha.m (sii0), svaaha.m (ka0)} ajja pajaanaami, yo attho samparaayiko..
[22] yoha.m {soha.m (sii0)} ajja pajaanaami, yattha dinna.m mahapphala.m..
[21] ``so aha.m vicarissaami, gaamaa gaama.m puraa pura.m.
[21] indako sakka suuci ca, ma.nibhaddo ca saanu ca.
[22] piya"nkara punabbasu sudatto ca, dve sukkaa ciiraaa.laviiti dvaadasa..

[03] 247^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0317^ea^ ^a^V1.0250^ea^ ^a^P1.0216^ea^ ^a^M1.0218^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, asuraa deve abhiya.msu. atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo suviira.m devaputta.m aamantesi -- `ete, taata suviira, asuraa deve abhiyanti. gaccha, taata suviira, asure paccuyyaahii'ti. `eva.m bhaddantavaa'ti kho, bhikkhave, suviiro devaputto sakkassa devaanamindassa pa.tissutvaa pamaada.m aapaadesi {aaharesi (katthaci) nava"nguttare siihanaadasuttepi}. dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo suviira.m devaputta.m aamantesi -- `ete, taata suviira, asuraa deve abhiyanti. gaccha, taata suviira, asure paccuyyaahii'ti. `eva.m bhaddantavaa'ti kho, bhikkhave, suviiro devaputto sakkassa devaanamindassa pa.tissutvaa dutiyampi pamaada.m aapaadesi. tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo suviira.m devaputta.m aamantesi -- `ete, taata suviira, asuraa deve abhiyanti. gaccha, taata suviira, asure paccuyyaahii'ti ^a^T1.0318^ea^. `eva.m bhaddantavaa'ti kho, bhikkhave, suviiro devaputto sakkassa devaanamindassa pa.tissutvaa tatiyampi pamaada.m aapaadesi. atha ^a^P1.0217^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo suviira.m devaputta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[22] suviira tattha gacchaahi, ma~nca tattheva paapayaa''ti..
[21] ``alasvassa ^a^V1.0251^ea^ {alasa'ssa (sii0 pii0), alasvaaya.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} anu.t.thaataa, na ca kiccaani kaaraye.
[22] sabbakaamasamiddhassa, ta.m me sakka vara.m disaa''ti..
[22] suviira tattha gacchaahi, ma~nca tattheva paapayaa''ti..
[21] ``akammunaa {akammanaa (sii0 pii0)} devase.t.tha, sakka vindemu ya.m sukha.m.
[22] asoka.m anupaayaasa.m, ta.m me sakka vara.m disaa''ti..
[21] ``sace atthi akammena, koci kvaci na jiivati.
[27] nibbaanassa hi so maggo, suviira tattha gacchaahi.

[03] ``so hi naama, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo saka.m pu~n~naphala.m upajiivamaano devaana.m taavati.msaana.m issariyaadhipacca.m rajja.m kaarento u.t.thaanaviiriyassa va.n.navaadii bhavissati. idha kho ta.m, bhikkhave, sobhetha, ya.m tumhe eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye pabbajitaa samaanaa u.t.thaheyyaatha ^a^T1.0319^ea^ gha.teyyaatha vaayameyyaatha appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya, asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti.
[03] 248^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, asuraa deve abhiya.msu. atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo susiima.m {susima.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} devaputta.m aamantesi -- `ete, taata susiima, asuraa deve abhiyanti. gaccha, taata susiima, asure paccuyyaahii'ti. `eva.m bhaddantavaa'ti kho, bhikkhave, susiimo devaputto sakkassa devaanamindassa pa.tissutvaa pamaada.m aapaadesi. dutiyampi ^a^P1.0218^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, sakko ^a^V1.0252^ea^ devaanamindo susiima.m devaputta.m aamantesi...pe0... dutiyampi pamaada.m aapaadesi. tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo susiima.m devaputta.m aamantesi...pe0... tatiyampi pamaada.m aapaadesi. atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo susiima.m devaputta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[22] susiima tattha gacchaahi, ma~nca tattheva paapayaa''ti..
[22] sabbakaamasamiddhassa, ta.m me sakka vara.m disaa''ti..
[22] susiima tattha gacchaahi, ma~nca tattheva paapayaa''ti..
[22] asoka.m anupaayaasa.m, ta.m me sakka vara.m disaa''ti..
[21] ``sace atthi akammena, koci kvaci na jiivati.
[27] nibbaanassa hi so maggo, susiima tattha gacchaahi.

[03] ``so hi naama, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo saka.m pu~n~naphala.m upajiivamaano devaana.m taavati.msaana.m issariyaadhipacca.m rajja.m kaarento u.t.thaanaviiriyassa va.n.navaadii bhavissati. idha kho ta.m, bhikkhave, sobhetha, ya.m tumhe eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye pabbajitaa samaanaa u.t.thaheyyaatha gha.teyyaatha vaayameyyaatha appattassa pattiyaa, anadhigatassa adhigamaaya, asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti.
[03] 249^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^V1.0253^ea^. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti ^a^T1.0321^ea^. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
[03] ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, devaasurasa"ngaamo samupabyuu.lho ahosi. atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo deve taavati.mse aamantesi --

[03] `sace, maarisaa, devaana.m sa"ngaamagataana.m uppajjeyya ^a^P1.0219^ea^ bhaya.m vaa chambhitatta.m vaa lomaha.mso vaa, mameva tasmi.m samaye dhajagga.m ullokeyyaatha. mama~nhi vo dhajagga.m ullokayata.m ya.m bhavissati bhaya.m vaa chambhitatta.m vaa lomaha.mso vaa, so pahiiyissati'.

[03] `no ce me dhajagga.m ullokeyyaatha, atha pajaapatissa devaraajassa dhajagga.m ullokeyyaatha. pajaapatissa hi vo devaraajassa dhajagga.m ullokayata.m ya.m bhavissati bhaya.m vaa chambhitatta.m vaa lomaha.mso vaa, so pahiiyissati'.

[03] `no ^a^M1.0221^ea^ ce pajaapatissa devaraajassa dhajagga.m ullokeyyaatha, atha varu.nassa devaraajassa dhajagga.m ullokeyyaatha. varu.nassa hi vo devaraajassa dhajagga.m ullokayata.m ya.m bhavissati bhaya.m vaa chambhitatta.m vaa lomaha.mso vaa, so pahiiyissati'.

[03] `no ce varu.nassa devaraajassa dhajagga.m ullokeyyaatha, atha iisaanassa devaraajassa dhajagga.m ullokeyyaatha. iisaanassa hi vo devaraajassa dhajagga.m ullokayata.m ya.m bhavissati bhaya.m vaa chambhitatta.m vaa lomaha.mso vaa, so pahiiyissatii'''ti.

[03] ``ta.m kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkassa vaa devaanamindassa dhajagga.m ullokayata.m, pajaapatissa vaa devaraajassa dhajagga.m ullokayata.m, varu.nassa vaa devaraajassa dhajagga.m ullokayata.m, iisaanassa vaa devaraajassa dhajagga.m ullokayata.m ya.m ^a^T1.0322^ea^ bhavissati bhaya.m vaa chambhitatta.m vaa lomaha.mso vaa, so pahiiyethaapi nopi pahiiyetha {no pahiiyetha (ka0)}.
[03] ``ta.m ^a^V1.0254^ea^ kissa hetu? sakko hi, bhikkhave, devaanamindo aviitaraago aviitadoso aviitamoho bhiiru chambhii utraasii palaayiiti.

[03] ``aha~nca kho, bhikkhave, eva.m vadaami -- `sace tumhaaka.m, bhikkhave, ara~n~nagataana.m vaa rukkhamuulagataana.m vaa su~n~naagaaragataana.m vaa uppajjeyya bhaya.m vaa chambhitatta.m vaa lomaha.mso vaa, mameva tasmi.m samaye anussareyyaatha -- itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. mama~nhi vo, bhikkhave, anussarata.m ya.m bhavissati bhaya.m vaa chambhitatta.m vaa lomaha.mso vaa, so pahiiyissati.

[03] ``no ^a^P1.0220^ea^ ce ma.m anussareyyaatha, atha dhamma.m anussareyyaatha -- `svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo sandi.t.thiko akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii'ti. dhamma~nhi vo, bhikkhave, anussarata.m ya.m bhavissati bhaya.m vaa chambhitatta.m vaa lomaha.mso vaa, so pahiiyissati.

[03] ``no ce dhamma.m anussareyyaatha, atha sa"ngha.m anussareyyaatha -- `suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho ujuppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho ^a^M1.0222^ea^ ~naayappa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho saamiicippa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, yadida.m cattaari purisayugaani a.t.tha purisapuggalaa esa bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, aahuneyyo paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa'ti. sa"ngha~nhi vo, bhikkhave, anussarata.m ^a^T1.0323^ea^ ya.m bhavissati bhaya.m vaa chambhitatta.m vaa lomaha.mso vaa, so pahiiyissati.

[03] ``ta.m kissa hetu? tathaagato hi, bhikkhave, araha.m sammaasambuddho viitaraago viitadoso viitamoho abhiiru acchambhii anutraasii apalaayii''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[22] anussaretha {anussareyyaatha (ka0) padasiddhi pana cintetabbaa} sambuddha.m, bhaya.m tumhaaka no siyaa..
[22] bhaya.m vaa chambhitatta.m vaa, lomaha.mso na hessatii''ti..

[03] 250^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``bhuutapubba.m ^a^P1.0221^ea^, bhikkhave, devaasurasa"ngaamo samupabyuu.lho ahosi. atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo asure aamantesi -- `sace, maarisaa, devaana.m asurasa"ngaame samupabyuu.lhe asuraa ^a^T1.0324^ea^ jineyyu.m devaa paraajineyyu.m {paraajeyyu.m (sii0 pii0)}, yena na.m sakka.m devaanaminda.m ka.n.thapa~ncamehi bandhanehi bandhitvaa mama santike aaneyyaatha asurapura'nti. sakkopi kho, bhikkhave, devaanamindo deve taavati.mse aamantesi -- `sace, maarisaa, devaana.m asurasa"ngaame samupabyuu.lhe devaa jineyyu.m asuraa paraajineyyu.m, yena na.m vepacitti.m asurinda.m ka.n.thapa~ncamehi bandhanehi bandhitvaa mama santike aaneyyaatha sudhammasabha'''nti. tasmi.m kho pana, bhikkhave, sa"ngaame devaa jini.msu ^a^M1.0223^ea^, asuraa paraajini.msu {paraaji.msu (sii0 pii0)}. atha kho, bhikkhave, devaa taavati.msaa vepacitti.m asurinda.m ka.n.thapa~ncamehi bandhanehi bandhitvaa sakkassa devaanamindassa santike aanesu.m sudhammasabha.m. tatra suda.m, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo ka.n.thapa~ncamehi bandhanehi baddho sakka.m devaanaminda.m sudhammasabha.m pavisanta~nca nikkhamanta~nca asabbhaahi pharusaahi vaacaahi akkosati paribhaasati. atha kho, bhikkhave, maatali sa"ngaahako sakka.m devaanaminda.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``bhayaa nu maghavaa sakka, dubbalyaa no titikkhasi.
[22] tasmaa bhusena da.n.dena, dhiiro baala.m nisedhaye''ti..
[27] yadaa na.m ma~n~nati baalo, bhayaa myaaya.m titikkhati.
[21] ``kaama.m ^a^P1.0222^ea^ ma~n~natu vaa maa vaa, bhayaa myaaya.m titikkhati.
[22] sadatthaparamaa atthaa, khantyaa bhiyyo na vijjati..
[22] tamaahu parama.m khanti.m, nicca.m khamati dubbalo..
[21] ``abala.m ta.m bala.m aahu, yassa baalabala.m bala.m.
[22] janaa ma~n~nanti baaloti, ye dhammassa akovidaa''ti..

[03] ``so hi naama, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo saka.m pu~n~naphala.m upajiivamaano devaana.m taavati.msaana.m issariyaadhipacca.m rajja.m kaarento khantisoraccassa va.n.navaadii bhavissati. idha kho ta.m, bhikkhave, sobhetha ya.m ^a^T1.0326^ea^ tumhe eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye pabbajitaa samaanaa khamaa ca bhaveyyaatha sorataa caa''ti.

[03] 251^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, devaasurasa"ngaamo samupabyuu.lho ahosi. atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakka.m devaanaminda.m etadavoca -- `hotu, devaanaminda, subhaasitena jayo'ti. `hotu, vepacitti, subhaasitena jayo'ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, devaa ca asuraa ca paarisajje .thapesu.m -- `ime no subhaasitadubbhaasita.m aajaanissantii'ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti.m asurindo sakka.m devaanaminda.m etadavoca -- `bha.na, devaanaminda, gaatha'nti. eva.m vutte, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo vepacitti asurinda.m etadavoca -- `tumhe khvettha, vepacitti, pubbadevaa. bha.na, vepacitti, gaatha'nti. eva.m ^a^P1.0223^ea^ vutte, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[22] tasmaa bhusena da.n.dena, dhiiro baala.m nisedhaye''ti..

[03] ``bhaasitaaya kho pana, bhikkhave, vepacittinaa asurindena gaathaaya asuraa anumodi.msu, devaa tu.nhii ahesu.m. atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakka.m devaanaminda.m etadavoca -- `bha.na, devaanaminda, gaatha'nti. eva.m ^a^T1.0327^ea^ vutte, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --

[03] ``bhaasitaaya ^a^M1.0225^ea^ kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkena devaanamindena gaathaaya, devaa anumodi.msu, asuraa tu.nhii ahesu.m. atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo vepacitti.m asurinda.m etadavoca -- `bha.na, vepacitti, gaatha'nti. eva.m vutte, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[27] yadaa na.m ma~n~nati baalo, bhayaa myaaya.m titikkhati.

[03] ``bhaasitaaya kho pana, bhikkhave, vepacittinaa asurindena gaathaaya asuraa anumodi.msu, devaa tu.nhii ahesu.m. atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakka.m devaanaminda.m etadavoca -- `bha.na, devaanaminda, gaatha'nti. eva.m vutte, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo imaa gaathaayo abhaasi --
[21] ``kaama.m ma~n~natu vaa maa vaa, bhayaa myaaya.m titikkhati.
[22] sadatthaparamaa atthaa, khantyaa bhiyyo na vijjati..
[22] tamaahu parama.m khanti.m, nicca.m khamati dubbalo..
[21] ``abala.m ^a^T1.0328^ea^ ta.m bala.m aahu, yassa baalabala.m bala.m.
[22] janaa ma~n~nanti baaloti, ye dhammassa akovidaa''ti..

[03] ``bhaasitaasu kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkena devaanamindena gaathaasu, devaa anumodi.msu, asuraa tu.nhii ahesu.m. atha kho, bhikkhave, devaana~nca asuraana~nca paarisajjaa etadavocu.m -- `bhaasitaa kho vepacittinaa asurindena gaathaayo. taa ca kho sada.n.daavacaraa sasatthaavacaraa, iti bha.n.dana.m iti ^a^M1.0226^ea^ viggaho iti kalaho. bhaasitaa kho {bhaasitaa kho pana (sii0)} sakkena devaanamindena gaathaayo. taa ca kho ada.n.daavacaraa asatthaavacaraa, iti abha.n.dana.m iti aviggaho iti akalaho. sakkassa devaanamindassa subhaasitena jayo'ti. iti kho, bhikkhave sakkassa devaanamindassa subhaasitena jayo ahosii''ti.

[03] 252^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m. ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, devaasurasa"ngaamo samupabyuu.lho ahosi. tasmi.m kho pana, bhikkhave, sa"ngaame asuraa jini.msu ^a^T1.0329^ea^, devaa paraajini.msu. paraajitaa ca kho, bhikkhave, devaa apaaya.msveva uttarenamukhaa, abhiya.msveva ne asuraa. atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo maatali sa"ngaahaka.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
[22] maayime dijaa vikulaavakaa {vikulaavaa (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} ahesu''nti..

[03] ```eva.m bhaddantavaa'ti kho, bhikkhave, maatali sa"ngaahako sakkassa devaanamindassa pa.tissutvaa sahassayutta.m aaja~n~naratha.m paccudaavattesi. atha kho, bhikkhave, asuraana.m etadahosi ^a^V1.0260^ea^ -- `paccudaavatto kho daani sakkassa devaanamindassa sahassayutto aaja~n~naratho ^a^P1.0225^ea^. dutiyampi kho devaa asurehi sa"ngaamessantiiti bhiitaa asurapurameva paavisi.msu. iti kho, bhikkhave, sakkassa devaanamindassa dhammena jayo ahosii'''ti.

[03] 253^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m. ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, sakkassa devaanamindassa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `yopi me assa supaccatthiko tassapaaha.m na dubbheyya'nti. atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakkassa devaanamindassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya ^a^T1.0330^ea^ yena sakko devaanamindo tenupasa"nkami. addasaa ^a^M1.0227^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo vepacitti.m asurinda.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana vepacitti.m asurinda.m etadavoca -- `ti.t.tha, vepacitti, gahitosii'''ti.
[03] ``yadeva te, maarisa, pubbe citta.m, tadeva tva.m maa pajahaasii''ti {tadeva tva.m maarisa pahaasiiti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}.

[22] tameva paapa.m phusatu {phusati (sii0 pii0)}, yo te dubbhe sujampatii''ti..

[03] 255^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^M1.0228^ea^. ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, sambahulaa isayo siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa ara~n~naayatane pa.n.naku.tiisu sammanti. atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko ca devaanamindo vepacitti ca asurindo yena te isayo siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa tenupasa"nkami.msu. atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo pa.taliyo {a.taliyo (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), aa.taliyo (ka0) ma0 ni0 2.410} upaahanaa aarohitvaa khagga.m olaggetvaa chattena dhaariyamaanena aggadvaarena assama.m pavisitvaa te isayo siilavante kalyaa.nadhamme apabyaamato karitvaa atikkami. atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo pa.taliyo upaahanaa orohitvaa khagga.m a~n~nesa.m datvaa chatta.m apanaametvaa dvaareneva assama.m pavisitvaa te isayo siilavante kalyaa.nadhamme anuvaata.m pa~njaliko namassamaano a.t.thaasi''. atha kho, bhikkhave, te isayo siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa sakka.m devaanaminda.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi.msu --

[03] 256^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m. ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, sambahulaa isayo siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa samuddatiire pa.n.naku.tiisu sammanti. tena kho pana samayena devaasurasa"ngaamo samupabyuu.lho ahosi. atha kho, bhikkhave, tesa.m isiina.m siilavantaana.m kalyaa.nadhammaana.m etadahosi -- `dhammikaa kho devaa, adhammikaa asuraa. siyaapi no asurato bhaya.m. ya.mnuuna maya.m sambara.m asurinda.m upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^M1.0229^ea^ abhayadakkhi.na.m yaaceyyaamaa'''ti. ``atha kho, bhikkhave, te isayo siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa -- seyyathaapi ^a^T1.0333^ea^ naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya evameva -- samuddatiire pa.n.naku.tiisu antarahitaa sambarassa asurindassa sammukhe paaturahesu.m. atha kho, bhikkhave, te isayo siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa sambara.m asurinda.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi.msu --
[22] kaama.mkaro hi te daatu.m, bhayassa abhayassa vaa''ti..
[22] pa.tigga.nhaama te eta.m, akkhaya.m hotu te bhaya.m..
[22] pavutta.m taata te biija.m, phala.m paccanubhossasii''ti..

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, te isayo siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa sambara.m asurinda.m abhisapitvaa -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya evameva -- sambarassa asurindassa sammukhe antarahitaa samuddatiire pa.n.naku.tiisu paaturahesu.m. atha ^a^T1.0334^ea^ ^a^P1.0228^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, sambaro asurindo tehi isiihi siilavantehi kalyaa.nadhammehi abhisapito rattiyaa suda.m tikkhattu.m ubbijjii''ti.

[03] 260^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, a~n~nataro puriso imasmi.myeva ^a^T1.0340^ea^ raajagahe manussadaliddo {manussada.liddo (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} ahosi manussakapa.no ^a^V1.0268^ea^ manussavaraako. so tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye saddha.m samaadiyi, siila.m samaadiyi, suta.m samaadiyi, caaga.m samaadiyi, pa~n~na.m samaadiyi. so tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye saddha.m samaadiyitvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa suta.m samaadiyitvaa caaga.m samaadiyitvaa pa~n~na.m samaadiyitvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m ^a^P1.0232^ea^ sagga.m loka.m upapajji devaana.m taavati.msaana.m sahabyata.m. so a~n~ne deve atirocati va.n.nena ceva yasasaa ca. tatra suda.m, bhikkhave, devaa taavati.msaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- `acchariya.m vata bho, abbhuta.m vata bho! aya~nhi devaputto pubbe manussabhuuto samaano manussadaliddo ahosi manussakapa.no manussavaraako; so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapanno devaana.m taavati.msaana.m sahabyata.m. so a~n~ne deve atirocati va.n.nena ceva yasasaa caa'''ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo deve taavati.mse aamantesi -- `maa kho tumhe, maarisaa, etassa devaputtassa ujjhaayittha. eso kho, maarisaa, devaputto pubbe manussabhuuto samaano tathaagatappavedite ^a^M1.0234^ea^ dhammavinaye saddha.m samaadiyi, siila.m samaadiyi, suta.m samaadiyi, caaga.m samaadiyi, pa~n~na.m samaadiyi. so tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye saddha.m samaadiyitvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa suta.m samaadiyitvaa caaga.m samaadiyitvaa pa~n~na.m samaadiyitvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapanno devaana.m taavati.msaana.m sahabyata.m ^a^T1.0341^ea^. so a~n~ne deve atirocati va.n.nena ceva yasasaa caa'''ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo deve taavati.mse anunayamaano taaya.m velaaya.m imaa gaathaayo abhaasi --
[22] adaliddoti ta.m aahu, amogha.m tassa jiivita.m..

[22] vadha.m ariyaa pasa.msanti, ta~nhi chetvaa na socatii''ti..

[03] 268^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m ^a^V1.0275^ea^ jetavane. tatra kho...pe0... etadavoca -- ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, a~n~nataro yakkho dubba.n.no oko.timako sakkassa devaanamindassa aasane nisinno ahosi. tatra suda.m, bhikkhave, devaa taavati.msaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- `acchariya.m vata bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho! aya.m yakkho dubba.n.no oko.timako sakkassa devaanamindassa aasane nisinno'''ti! yathaa ^a^T1.0349^ea^ yathaa kho, bhikkhave, devaa taavati.msaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti, tathaa tathaa so yakkho abhiruupataro ceva hoti dassaniiyataro ca paasaadikataro ca.

[01] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, devaa taavati.msaa yena sakko devaanamindo tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa sakka.m devaanaminda.m etadavocu.m -- `idha te, maarisa, a~n~nataro yakkho dubba.n.no oko.timako sakkassa devaanamindassa aasane nisinno. tatra suda.m, maarisa, devaa taavati.msaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti -- acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho! aya.m yakkho dubba.n.no oko.timako ^a^P1.0238^ea^ sakkassa devaanamindassa aasane nisinnoti. yathaa yathaa kho, maarisa, devaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti, tathaa tathaa so yakkho abhiruupataro ceva hoti dassaniiyataro ^a^M1.0240^ea^ ca paasaadikataro caati. so hi nuuna, maarisa, kodhabhakkho yakkho bhavissatii'''ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo yena so kodhabhakkho yakkho tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa dakkhi.najaa.numa.n.dala.m pathaviya.m nihantvaa yena so kodhabhakkho yakkho tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa tikkhattu.m naama.m saaveti -- `sakkoha.m maarisa, devaanamindo, sakkoha.m, maarisa, devaanamindo'ti. yathaa yathaa kho, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo naama.m saavesi, tathaa tathaa so yakkho dubba.n.nataro ceva ahosi oko.timakataro ca. dubba.n.nataro ceva ^a^T1.0350^ea^ hutvaa oko.timakataro ca tatthevantaradhaayii''ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo sake aasane nisiiditvaa deve taavati.mse anunayamaano taaya.m velaaya.m imaa gaathaayo abhaasi --
[22] na vo ciraaha.m kujjhaami, kodho mayi naavati.t.thati..
[21] ``kuddhaaha.m na pharusa.m bruumi, na ca dhammaani kittaye.

[03] 269^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m...pe0... bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo aabaadhiko ahosi dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. atha kho bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo yena vepacitti asurindo tenupasa"nkami gilaanapucchako. addasaa kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakka.m devaanaminda.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana sakka.m devaanaminda.m etadavoca -- `tikiccha ma.m devaanamindaa'ti. `vaacehi ^a^P1.0239^ea^ ma.m, vepacitti, sambarimaaya'nti. `na taavaaha.m vaacemi, yaavaaha.m, maarisa, asure pa.tipucchaamii'''ti. ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo asure pa.tipucchi -- `vaacemaha.m, maarisaa, sakka.m devaanaminda.m sambarimaaya'nti? `maa kho tva.m, maarisa, vaacesi sakka.m devaanaminda.m sambarimaaya'''nti. atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakka.m devaanaminda.m gaathaaya ^a^T1.0351^ea^ ajjhabhaasi --
[22] upeti niraya.m ghora.m, sambarova sata.m sama''nti..

[03] 270^b^.^eb^ saavatthiya.m...pe0... aaraame. tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhuu sampayojesu.m. tatreko bhikkhu accasaraa. atha kho so bhikkhu tassa bhikkhuno santike accaya.m accayato deseti; so bhikkhu nappa.tigga.nhaati. atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``idha, bhante, dve bhikkhuu sampayojesu.m, tatreko bhikkhu accasaraa ^a^V1.0277^ea^. atha kho so, bhante, bhikkhu tassa bhikkhuno santike accaya.m accayato deseti, so bhikkhu nappa.tigga.nhaatii''ti.

[03] ``dveme, bhikkhave, baalaa. yo ca accaya.m accayato na passati, yo ca accaya.m desentassa yathaadhamma.m nappa.tigga.nhaa''ti -- ime kho, bhikkhave, dve baalaa. ``dveme, bhikkhave, pa.n.ditaa. yo ca accaya.m accayato passati, yo ca accaya.m desentassa yathaadhamma.m pa.tigga.nhaa''ti -- ime kho, bhikkhave, dve pa.n.ditaa.
[03] ``bhuutapubba.m ^a^T1.0352^ea^, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo sudhammaaya.m sabhaaya.m deve taavati.mse anunayamaano taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``kodho ^a^P1.0240^ea^ vo vasamaayaatu, maa ca mittehi vo jaraa.
[21] agarahiya.m maa garahittha, maa ca bhaasittha pesu.na.m.

[03] 271^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu...pe0... bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo sudhammaaya.m sabhaaya.m deve taavati.mse anunayamaano taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``maa ^a^M1.0242^ea^ vo kodho ajjhabhavi, maa ca kujjhittha kujjhata.m.
[27] akkodho avihi.msaa ca, ariyesu ca pa.tipadaa {vasatii sadaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}.
[21] devataa ^a^T1.0353^ea^ devaputto ca, raajaa maaro ca bhikkhunii.
